XXhvsatssu:3518: yadi kharagataṃ pṛthivīti āpaḥ kharagatā iti tā api pṛthivī syuḥ |

XXhvsatssu:3526: yathoktaṃ sūtre yatkiñcidrūpaṃ sarvaṃ tat caturmahābhūtakṛtamiti |

XXhvsatssu:3639: yo dharmo yaṃ hetumanuvartyotpadyate sa tasya hetuḥ |
XXhvsatssu:3640: yaccittaṃ yadindriyāṇyupādāya bhavati sa tadupādāya dharmaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:3651: (u) na vayaṃ vadāmaḥ asarūpahetorna jāyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:3652: kintu sarūpahetau ca sati jāyata iti vadāmaḥ |

XXhvsatssu:3660: saukumāryādestu aniyataḥ kadācit khakkhaṭabahule saṅghāte vartate |
XXhvsatssu:3669: yathoktaṃ sūtre- khakkhaṭā[di]gatānīti caturṇāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ vibhāgā

XXhvsatssu:3686: prajñaptitaḥ prasiddhe hetau prajñaptitaḥ saṃjñā bhavati yathā vadanti- paśyāmyahaṃ vṛkṣasya

XXhvsatssu:3704: uktañcabīja sūtre yataḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ syāt nābdhātuḥ na bījāni vṛddhiṃ [virūḍhiṃ vipulatā]

XXhvsatssu:3708: ekasya dharmasya dravyatvaṃ prajñaptitvamiti dviprakāro 'pi nopalabhyate |

XXhvsatssu:3715: coktam- keśā lomā nakhā ityādīni ayamucyate pṛthivīdhāturiti |

XXhvsatssu:3723: tatpratyākhyānāya bhagavānāha- cakṣurādīndriyāṇi caturmahābhūtasamavāyātmakāni śūnyānyavastūni iti |
XXhvsatssu:3726: asmin māṃsapiṇḍe santi catvāro bhāgāḥ khakkhaṭaṃ kharagatamityādi vacanena bhagavān pradarśayati sarvapadārthāḥ caturmahābhūtasambhūtā iti |

XXhvsatssu:3802: tatra na pratīmo- ayamāśrayārthaḥ, [ta]danyo yaḥ sa prajñaptisan iti |

XXhvsatssu:3810: yo vināpi sudṛḍhahetupratyayaiḥ saṃjñāṃ karoti so 'śvaṃ dṛṣṭvā puruṣa ityāhvayet |
XXhvsatssu:3813: laukikāḥ sadā [pṛthag] vadanti pṛthivīti śabda iti |
XXhvsatssu:3820: yathārūpamidaṃ prajñapterhetuṃ sādhayati tatra puruṣa iti saṃjñā |
XXhvsatssu:3823: evaṃ rūpādiṣu dharmeṣu catvāri mahābhūtānīti saṃjñāṃ vadanti |
XXhvsatssu:3824: yadavocaḥ- yadi vā ṣaṭ sparśāyatanāni yadi vā ṣaṭ sparśāyatanānyupādāya siddhā [dharmā] iti |
XXhvsatssu:3826: yathā bhavatāṃ śāsane bhautikaṃ rūpaṃ na kasyacijjanakam |
XXhvsatssu:3827: tathā mama śāsane 'pi prajñaptau na [tat]kasyacit janyam |
XXhvsatssu:3836: yadyupyuktaṃ bhavatā dharme dharmo vartate nirāśrayo niradhiṣṭhātā ceti |
XXhvsatssu:3855: (1) yo mṛtpiṇḍaḥ khakkhaṭaḥ sa eva [kadācit] mṛduḥ |
XXhvsatssu:3862: yena khakkhaṭaḥ kāyaḥ mṛduḥ kāya iti buddhirbhavet
XXhvsatssu:3873: anenaiva kāraṇena mṛdvādayaḥ sparśā api na santi ||
XXhvsatssu:3877: yadyapyāha bhavān- yo mṛtpiṇḍaḥ khakkhaṭaḥ sa eva [kadācit] mṛduriti (1) |
XXhvsatssu:3881: bahūnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kalāpaḥ prajñaptyā mṛtpiṇḍa ityucyate |
XXhvsatssu:3884: mama saṃśliṣṭasaṃṅghātāṇuṣu idaṃ khakkhaṭalakṣaṇaṃ labhyata iti asti khakkhaṭatā |
XXhvsatssu:3885: asaṃśliṣṭeṣu tanmṛdulakṣaṇaṃ labhyate, ityato nāsti doṣaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:3890: upalabhyante kilāsmābhiḥ ekasminneva dharme bahavaḥ sparśāḥ khakkhaṭo 'pi mṛdurapīti |
XXhvsatssu:3891: yadapyuktam- khakkhaṭatā mṛdutā cānyonyamapekṣata iti nāsti niyateti (4) tannayujyate |
XXhvsatssu:3903: yathāgniṃ dṛṣṭvā ūṣma jñāyate iti noṣma dṛśyaṃ bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:3904: yathā puruṣaḥ kambalaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃśete kimidaṃ kaṭhinaṃ kiṃ vā mṛdu iti |
XXhvsatssu:3931: yo dharmaḥ khakkhaṭaḥ kharagataḥ sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ |
XXhvsatssu:3935: āpaḥ snigdhā atiśaityāt karakā bhāvanti iti kathaṃ mahābhūtāni na svalakṣaṇaṃ jahati |
XXhvsatssu:3936: yathāha sūtram- caturṇāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kadācit vikāryaṃ catvāraḥ śrāddhā nānyathopalabhyante
XXhvsatssu:3944: (pṛ) abhidharma uktam- apāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sneha iti |
XXhvsatssu:3950: ato drava eva [lakṣaṇam] na tu snehaḥ syandanaṃ vā |
XXhvsatssu:3971: vadāmaḥ na tu paramārthataḥ laghudharmamupādāya deśāntare jananadharmaḥ karmeti saṃjñāṃ labhate
XXhvsatssu:3977: yathā daśapalaṃ vastu viṃśatipalavastvapekṣya laghu pañcapalavastvapekṣa tu guru |
XXhvsatssu:3995: gurutvavarjitā anye rūpādayo dharmā atulyatvāt laghavaḥ syuḥ |
XXhvsatssu:3998: (u) na vayamaṅgīkurmo rūpādīn vihāya dharmāntaraṃ guru bhavatīti |
XXhvsatssu:3999: rūpādaya eva dharmāḥ (SSS_115) kecit tulyasvabhāvā utpadyante |
XXhvsatssu:4000: yathā khakkhaṭamakhakkhaṭaṃ balamabalaṃ navaṃ purāṇamupacitamanucitaṃ kṣīṇamakṣīṇaṃ sthūlaṃ sūkṣmam ityādayaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:4003: ayaṃ rūpādisaṅghāto yadi pārthiva āpyo vā |
XXhvsatssu:4015: (u) te ca khakkhaṭādayaḥ kadācit cakṣuṣā kadācit śrotrādīnā vikalpyante |
XXhvsatssu:4016: te ca khakkhaṭādayaḥ padārthā na rūpādīn vihāya santi |
XXhvsatssu:4023: (pṛ) na tasmin samaye jñāyata idaṃ gurulakṣaṇamiti |
XXhvsatssu:4036: kecitsparśāḥ sadākāyagatāḥ na śītoṣṇādivat bāhyamapekṣyāgāminaḥ yaduta praśrabdhisukhaṃ styānaprakarṣaḥ astyānaprakarṣaḥ rogo viśeṣovā kāyataikṣṇyaṃ kāyamāndyam ālasyagurutā mūrchā unmādaḥ pakṣavāyujṛmbhaṇabubhukṣāparitarṣaṇaparitarpaṇasukhāsukhalolupatājaḍatādayaḥ sparśāḥ |
XXhvsatssu:4045: yathā ca praśrabdhisukhādayo rūpādisaṅghātātmakakāyenāpi vijñāya vikalpyante |
XXhvsatssu:4047: yadi gururlaghuḥ sparśamātram [ityabhyupagamyate] ko doṣaḥ kimanayā
XXhvsatssu:4067: kiṃntu yo laghuḥ san samudīraṇasya hetuṃ karoti |
XXhvsatssu:4071: tatra laghutvaṃ vāyorlakṣaṇaṃ samudīraṇatvaṃ vāyoḥ karma |
XXhvsatssu:4084: kadācit kevalaṃ rūpasparśau staḥ yathā suvarṇajatādiṣu |
XXhvsatssu:4086: kadācit trayo rūparasasparśāḥ santi tejasi kadācit rūparasagandhasparśāḥ santi |
XXhvsatssu:4091: (u) śītoṣṇakaṭhinasukumārādayaḥ sparśāḥ yanmahābhūtasantatāvavinirbhāgavartinaḥ tasya mahābhūtasya sparśā iti jñātavyam |
XXhvsatssu:4095: yathā vātarogiṇo mukhe tiktaraso 'stīti na sa bhiṣagvavati vāyau raso 'stīti |
XXhvsatssu:4097: (pṛ) kecidvadanti vāyuḥ śīto na tu laghuriti |
XXhvsatssu:4100: yathā himaṃ śītaṃ sat na vāyurbhavati |
XXhvsatssu:4109: sattve 'pi saukṣmyānnopalabhyata iti vaktuścitta eva saṃjñānusmaraṇavikalpaḥ syāt yaduta vāyau rūparasau sta iti |
XXhvsatssu:4112: tasmāt yatphala upalabhyate nāvaśyaṃ taddhetau pūrvamasti |
XXhvsatssu:4120: cakṣurvikalpayan bhagavānevaṃ vacanamāha yaccakṣuṣi māṃsapiṇḍe khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sa pṛthivīdhāturiti
XXhvsatssu:4123: bhagavān cakṣuḥ śūnyamiti janānāṃ jijñāpayiṣayaivedṛśaṃ vacanamāha |
XXhvsatssu:4124: tathā no cet cakṣuṣi khakkhaṭādikamanyadasti khakkhaṭādau vā anyadāsti cakṣuḥ
XXhvsatssu:4130: tadā cakṣurādīni na puruṣapratyayā iti sidhyati |
XXhvsatssu:4137: catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpi anidarśanaṃ sapratighaṃ cakṣuḥ iti |
XXhvsatssu:4141: laukikāḥ sarve prajānanti rūpadarśanaṃ cakṣuryāvat sparśanaṃ kāya iti |
XXhvsatssu:4149: yo dharmo dravyasan na sa upādāyāsti |
XXhvsatssu:4157: tathā nocet asya bhikṣoścakṣurādiṣu indriyeṣu śaṅkā naivocchidyeta |
XXhvsatssu:4163: bhagavān cakṣuṣaḥ śūnyatvapradarśanāya tatra catvāri mahābhūtāni vikalpayati |
XXhvsatssu:4165: ayaṃ kāyaḥ ṣaṭsu dhātuṣu vibhaktaḥ yat khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sa pṛthivīdhāturityādi pratyavekṣeteti
XXhvsatssu:4168: hastipadopamasūtre catvāri mahābhūtāni vikalpitāni na punaścakṣuḥ |
XXhvsatssu:4171: vātsaputrīyādaya abhidharmikā api īdṛśaṃ vacanaṃ kurvanti |
XXhvsatssu:4185: yāni catvāri mahābhūtāni karmajāni cakṣurādisaṅgṛhītāni [tāni] ādhyātmikamāyātanam indriyam iti ca kathyante |
XXhvsatssu:4196: āpa eva prasannā āpa iti prasāda āpa eva |
XXhvsatssu:4202: na ca prajñaptiḥ tatsādhanahetoranyeti vaktuṃ śakyate |
XXhvsatssu:4227: pratyakṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ khalu anindriyāṇāṃ vijñānaṃ notpadyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:4232: dharmatā ca tathā- ya indriyavirahitāḥ teṣāṃ vijñānaṃ notpadyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:4233: na bāhyāni catvāri mahābhūtāni anindriyāṇi janayanti iti dharmatā tadapekṣeta |
XXhvsatssu:4235: yathā dhānyakāraṇakarmapratilambhāt dhānyaṃ bījāṅkurakāṇḍanālapatrāṇyapekṣyāpi kramaśo jāyate
XXhvsatssu:4238: yathā cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurindriyakaṃ samanantaraniruddhacittamupādāya ca bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:4244: cittadharmaśca tathā syāt- yat samanantaraniruddhacittendriyakaṃ bhavati nānyatkiñcidapekṣata iti |
XXhvsatssu:4265: yathoktaṃ sūtre- manaḥ pratītya dharmāṃśca manovijñānamutpadyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:4295: vadanti ca mriyamāṇasya cakṣuḥ sūryaṃ pratigacchatīti |
XXhvsatssu:4312: yathā vadanti- annaṃ datvā pañcavastu- vipākān labhata iti |
XXhvsatssu:4322: yathā kṣālitacakṣuṣkasya puruṣasya cakṣuḥ sphuṭameva pratyeti |
XXhvsatssu:4334: yathā cakṣurākāśādipratyayaṃ labdhvā rūpamaprāpyāpi sudūraṃ paśyati |
XXhvsatssu:4336: ato na kāryaḥ saṃjñānusmaraṇavikalpoi yaduta tejobahulaṃ [cakṣu]riti |
XXhvsatssu:4341: yathā ulūkādayaḥ pakṣiṇo viḍālasṛgālādayastīryañca bāhyāmālokamanapekṣyāpi draṣṭuṃ śaknuvanti
XXhvsatssu:4345: yadbhavānavādīḥ- cakṣuḥ saprabhatvāt sudūraṃ rūpaṃ patihantīti |
XXhvsatssu:4355: upari devānāṃ mriyamāṇānāṃ cakṣuḥ kutra pratigacchati |
XXhvsatssu:4365: tasmādindriyeṣu mahābhūtāni nyūnādhikāni bhavantīti bhavadvacanaṃ dūṣitameva |
XXhvsatssu:4370: abtejovāyuṣu rūparasasparśāḥ santi iti rūparasasparśajñānotpādakā bhavanti |
XXhvsatssu:4385: apāṃ śītasparśamātraṃ tejasa uṣṇasparśamātraṃ jivhācakṣurbhyāṃ jñātuṃ śaknuyāt |
XXhvsatssu:4393: (pṛ) indriyāṇi viṣayān kiṃ prāpya vijānanti utāprāpya vijānanti |
XXhvsatssu:4401: | bhavato hṛdayam- yatkecidvadanti indriyaṃ vijñānamapekṣya saha vijānāti na tu vijñānaviyuktaṃ vijānātīti |
XXhvsatssu:4407: yadīndriyaṃ vijānāti idamindriyakarma idaṃ vijñānakarma iti vivektavyam |
XXhvsatssu:4412: bhavatāṃ śāsane śrotrādīnīndriyāṇi na tejaḥprakṛtikāni iti na prakāśayeyuḥ |
XXhvsatssu:4416: tadā prakāśakasya punaḥ prakāśaka ityevamanavasthā syāt |
XXhvsatssu:4417: yadi punaḥ prakāśakaṃ vināpi indriyamātraṃ prakāśayati |
XXhvsatssu:4427: yathā sati tejasi ūṣma nāsati iti |
XXhvsatssu:4428: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ- cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī syāditi |
XXhvsatssu:4433: uktañca sūtre- vayaṃ māṇavakāḥ susūkṣmamaṣi vastu jānīmaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:4439: indriyeṇa viṣayo gṛhyate vijñānena vikalpyate ityayamevendriyavijñānayorbhedaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:4440: (u) sūtre bhagavān svayamāha- cakṣu[brāhmaṇa]dvāraṃ[yāvadeva] rūpāṇāṃ darśanāya iti |
XXhvsatssu:4444: (pṛ) āha ca- mano dvāraṃ [yāvadeva] dharmāṇāṃ vijñānāye ti |
XXhvsatssu:4458: kiñca laukikā vyavaharanti- cakṣuḥ paśyati śrotraṃ śṛṇoti iti |
XXhvsatssu:4461: āha ca bhagavān- paśyāmi rāgādīn doṣān iti |
XXhvsatssu:4462: candraḥ kṣīṇa iti laukikānāṃ vacanaṃ bhagavānapyanuvadati |
XXhvsatssu:4469: (u) cakṣuṣo vijñānāśrayahetutāmanusṛtya tasmin hetau paśyatīti vadanti |
XXhvsatssu:4470: yathā vadanti sa puruṣaḥ paśyati ayaṃ puruṣaḥ paśyatīti |
XXhvsatssu:4471: yathā ca vadanti janāḥ puṇyapāpādīni kurvanti |
XXhvsatssu:4473: yathā ca vadanti vāmacakṣuṣā paśyati dakṣiṇacakṣuṣā paśyatīti |
XXhvsatssu:4474: vadanti ca sūryācandramasābhyāṃ paśyati sūryācandramasau paśyataḥ |
XXhvsatssu:4476: kadācinmadhyaṃ paśyati (SSS_126) yat dvāramadhyaṃ [tat] paśyati iti |
XXhvsatssu:4491: cakṣurupādāya vijñāne paśyati cakṣuḥ paśyatīti vyavahāraḥ |
XXhvsatssu:4492: yathā mañcastheṣu puruṣeṣu krośatsu mañcāḥ krośantīti vyavahāraḥ |
XXhvsatssu:4493: cakṣuḥpratisaṃyuktaṃ vijñānakarma ityatastatra cakṣuṣi vijñānakarma vyavaharanti |
XXhvsatssu:4494: yathā hastapādapratisaṃyukte puruṣe vartamānaṃ puruṣakarma hastakarmeti vyavaharanti |
XXhvsatssu:4497: yathā vadanti amukaḥ puruṣo 'mukaṃ grāmaṃ dahatīti |
XXhvsatssu:4502: evaṃ cakṣurbhyomutpannaṃ vijñānaṃ rūpaṃ paśyatītyataścakṣuḥ paśyatīti vyavaharanti |
XXhvsatssu:4503: cakṣuḥsannikṛṣṭe vijñāne rūpaṃ paśyati cakṣuḥ paśyatīti vyavahāraḥ |
XXhvsatssu:4506: cakṣuṣā cākṣuṣaṃ vijñānaṃ vivicyata ityataścakṣuṣi cākṣuṣavijñānakarmāropyate |
XXhvsatssu:4509: yathā dhane prahīṇe puruṣaḥ prahīṇa iti vadanti |
XXhvsatssu:4510: pravivṛddhe ca dhane pravivṛddhaḥ puruṣa iti |
XXhvsatssu:4511: cakṣurvijñāne cakṣuṣā saṃyujya paśyati sati cakṣuḥ paśyatīti vadanti |
XXhvsatssu:4512: yathā vṛkṣe puruṣeṇa saṃyujya chidyamāne sati puruṣo vṛkṣaṃ chinnattīti vyavahāraḥ |
XXhvsatssu:4513: yathā vā kṛṣṇavarṇasaṃyukte paṭe kṛṣṇaḥ paṭa iti vyavahāraḥ |
XXhvsatssu:4514: sarve ca dharmā mithaḥ saṃkīrya vyavahriyante
XXhvsatssu:4516: cakṣūṣā rūpaṃ paśyatīti vaktavye saṃkṣipya vyavaharantaḥ kevalamāhuḥ cakṣuḥ paśyatīti |
XXhvsatssu:4519: bhavānidaṃ prativaktavyaḥ cakṣurādayaḥ pañcadharmā stadanyarūpādīnatiśerata ityata indriyamiti vyavahriyante |
XXhvsatssu:4522: yathā cakṣurādīnāṃ viyoge vijñānaṃ notpadyate, tathā yadi rūpādīnāṃ viyoge 'pi vijñānaṃ notpadyate
XXhvsatssu:4533: rūpavijñānamityukte saṃśayaḥ prasajyate kimidaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ kiṃ vā rūpaṃ pratītya manovijñānamiti
XXhvsatssu:4541: prasanne tu indriye vijñānaṃ viśadaṃ bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:4545: eko viṣayo bahūnāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ sādhāraṇa upalabhyate |
XXhvsatssu:4554: yadbhavānavādīḥ- vayaṃ māṇavakāḥ susūkṣmamapi vastu jānīmaḥ tadyathā
XXhvsatssu:4557: laukikāścakṣuḥ paśyatīti vadantītyata āhuḥ tadyathā cakṣurbhyāṃ dṛśyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:4561: acetanāpi jihvā tu na darvībhājanopamā || iti |
XXhvsatssu:4562: jihvāśritaṃ mano jihvāvijñānaṃ janayatītyata āha jihvā [sūpa]rasaṃ vettīti
XXhvsatssu:4563: | tathā cakṣurāśritya samutpanne vijñāne cakṣuḥ paśyatīti vadanti |
XXhvsatssu:4565: āha- jinaurasāḥ paśyanti tadyathā cakṣurbhyāṃ dṛśyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:4566: yadbhavānavādīḥ- indriyeṇa viṣayo gṛhyate vijñānena vikalpyate iti |
XXhvsatssu:4569: na ca yūyaṃ bravītha indriyasyaivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ viśiṣṭalakṣaṇa iti |
XXhvsatssu:4583: idānīṃ kiṃ viṣayendriyasaṃyogādvijñānamutpadyate kiṃ vā tadviyogāt |
XXhvsatssu:4593: ato jñātavyaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ na prāpya vijānāti |
XXhvsatssu:4595: śrotrādivijñānaṃ dvividham- kiñcitprāpya vijānāti kiñcidaprāpya vijānāti |
XXhvsatssu:4600: dṛṣṭaṃ khalu trayāṇāmeṣāmindriyāṇāṃ viṣayaiḥ saṃyogāt vijñānaṃ labhyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:4615: yathoktaṃ sūtre- trayāṇāṃ sannipātaḥ sparśa iti |
XXhvsatssu:4620: ghrāṇaṃ gandhe jihvā rase kāyaḥ spraṣṭavye cakṣūrūpe śrotraṃ śabde yadyaprāptam |
XXhvsatssu:4626: bahupratyayasāmagryā ca jñānamutpadyate iti cakṣūraśmirviṣayasaṃyogāya gacchati |
XXhvsatssu:4630: viprakṛṣṭadeśavartini puruṣe mandaṃ bhāṣamāṇe na śrūyate |
XXhvsatssu:4640: aprāpya śravaṇe tu sa vibhāgo na syāt |
XXhvsatssu:4641: ato jñāyate śabdaḥ prāpya śrūyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:4646: aprāpya śravaṇe tu na sākalyena śrūyeta |
XXhvsatssu:4647: yathā rūpasyāprāptyā darśānāt na sākalyena darśanam |
XXhvsatssu:4648: ato jñāyate na rūpasamaḥ śabda iti |
XXhvsatssu:4650: yathā rūpasyekadeśaṃ dṛṣṭvā avaśiṣṭamapi ālokamapekṣya paśyati |
XXhvsatssu:4662: śabdaṃ yadi ghananibiḍaṃ jalādyāvṛtamapi śrotraṃ śrotuṃ śaknoti |
XXhvsatssu:4669: ekāṃ diśaṃ draṣṭuṃ śaknoti naikasmin samaye sarvā diśo draṣṭuṃ śaknoti |
XXhvsatssu:4670: yathā pūrvābhimukhaḥ puruṣaḥ pūrvāṃ diśaṃ rūpañca paśyati nānyā diśaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:4675: dūraṅgamamekacaramaśarīraṃ guhāśayam sūryasya raśmiriva cittaṃ carati viprakīrṇataḥ |
XXhvsatssu:4677: parispandatīdaṃ cittaṃ svābhīṣṭañca yathā caratyadaḥ || iti |
XXhvsatssu:4682: yathā puruṣo dūrataḥ sthāṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃśete kimayaṃ puruṣa iti |
XXhvsatssu:4689: kasmāt sthūlaṃ paśyati na sūkṣmaṃ (SSS_131) vivecayati |
XXhvsatssu:4690: rūpadarśane 'sti dvibhāgaḥ yaduta pūrvasyāṃ paścimāyāṃ vā diśi rūpamiti |
XXhvsatssu:4713: tasya nayanaraśme rasati draṣṭari sa na syāt |
XXhvsatssu:4718: rūpa dharmā avaśyaṃ bāhyaṃ prakāśamapekṣya dṛśyante |

XXhvsatssu:6578: atītaṃ vastu asadapi smṛtvā vijānanti anāgatamasadapi
XXhvsatssu:6586: samyak pratyāyakātmakaṃ hi cittam, rūpapratyāyanaṃ śabdapratyāyanādanyat |
XXhvsatssu:6596: evaṃ cakṣūrūpayoḥ kṣaṇikatvāt tadāśrityotpannaṃ vijñānamapi kṣaṇikam |
XXhvsatssu:6600: yadavādiḥ- vijñānaṃ cakṣuṣi lagnaṃ sat ālokamapekṣya paśyati |
XXhvsatssu:6601: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ paśyati śṛṇoti ityādi |
XXhvsatssu:6609: saṃśayajñānādīni niścayajñānādibhyo 'nyāni na saṃśayajñānādīnyeva niścayajñānādīni ityapi vadāmaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:6623: ghaṭādi dravyamapi [paśyati] gaṇakastu ātmarūpamapi jānāti pararūpamapi jānāti |
XXhvsatssu:6634: tathā bandhamokṣādirapi yadavādīḥ- anyat karoti anyadvedayata iti |
XXhvsatssu:6638: saṃvṛtisaṃjñayā karmādīnāṃ vacanaṃ na tu paramārthataḥ |
XXhvsatssu:6651: yadi kṣaṇikaṃ [cittaṃ] tadā rūpādīni na kadāpi pratīyeran |
XXhvsatssu:6653: yathā vidyutprabhā kiñcitsthāyinyapi na punaḥ sujñeyā bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:6673: ekaikasmin tantau pratyekamasti kiñcidvalam iti tatsamavāyaḥ prabhavati |
XXhvsatssu:6689: tathā no cet śabdakarmaṇo na syātpratyāyanam |
XXhvsatssu:6691: pratyakṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ khalvidaṃ kṣaṇikamatha ca pratyāyakamiti |
XXhvsatssu:6708: vijñānañca viṣayaṃ gṛhṇāti mandaṃ vā kṣipraṃ vā iti cittasya nāsti niyamaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:6730: puruṣasya kadāciccittaṃ bhavati yadahamekakālaṃ sarvānalambanān gṛhṇāmīti |
XXhvsatssu:6742: tasyaikameva jñānaṃ samyaṅ mithyā ca sambhavet |
XXhvsatssu:6743: ayaṃ puruṣa iti graha eva ayaṃ na puruṣa iti graha iti yathā darśanaṃ bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:6769: ato jñāyate bahūni vijñānāni yugapadekakālamutpannāni sarvān spraṣṭavyān gṛhṇanti iti |
XXhvsatssu:6775: vahūni vijñānānīti kāyāvayaveṣu ca śīghrataraṃ jñānamutpadyate |
XXhvsatssu:6778: na hi sambhavatyekameva vijñānaṃ sarvānavayavān gṛhṇātīti |
XXhvsatssu:6779: ato ekakālamutpannāni bahūni vijñānāni sarvānavayavān gṛhṇantīti ||
XXhvsatssu:6792: ato jñāyate vijñānāni manaskāramapekṣya bhavanti naikakālikānīti |
XXhvsatssu:6806: tathā ca sarvadharmāṇāmutpattaye nāvaśyaṃ yatnaṃ kuryāt |
XXhvsatssu:6816: cakṣuṣā paśyāmaḥ khalu bāhyān bījāṅkurādīn kalamāṃsapeśyādirūpāṇi kaumārayauvanajarākārān kramikān |
XXhvsatssu:6818: uktañca sūtre- yadā sukhā vedanā bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:6820: yaduta duḥkhā vedanā aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā ityādi |
XXhvsatssu:6821: yadi vijñānānāṃ yugapadutpādaḥ tadā tisro vedanā ekakālaṃ vedyeran |
XXhvsatssu:6823: ato jñāyate vijñānāni naikakāla mutpadyanta iti |
XXhvsatssu:6824: ekasmin kāya ekacittotpattyā ekaḥ puruṣa ityucyate |
XXhvsatssu:6825: vijñānānāṃ yaugapadya ekasmin kāye bahavaḥ puruṣāḥ syuḥ |
XXhvsatssu:6827: ata ekasmin kāye vijñānānāṃ yaugapadyaṃ na sambhavati |
XXhvsatssu:6828: yaugapadye hi ekakālaṃ sarvān dharmān jānīyuḥ
XXhvsatssu:6840: tathā mamāpi ekasya manasa ekaḥ samanantarapratyayaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:6852: yathoktaṃ sūtre- kecitparīttasaṃjñāḥ kecidbahusaṃjñāḥ kecidapramāṇasaṃjñāḥ kecidakiñcanasaṃjñā iti |
XXhvsatssu:6853: vastutastu te bahu kiñcidādidharmā na santi |
XXhvsatssu:6862: saṃjñā tridhā vibhaktā grahālambanā yaduta priyadvepyodāsīnāḥ |
XXhvsatssu:6868: cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā mā nimittaṃ gṛhvīta iti |
XXhvsatssu:6872: tathā saṃjñayā hi sarvān kleśān prajahāti |
XXhvsatssu:6873: yathoktaṃ sūtre- anityasaṃjñā sādhu bhāvitā sarvaṃ kāmarāgaṃ paryādāpayati |
XXhvsatssu:6887: yathā ca vadanti akṛṣṇāśuklakarmaṇā sarvāṇi karmāṇi kṣapayatīti |
XXhvsatssu:6892: vastutastu prajñayā tarati na tu śraddhādinā |
XXhvsatssu:6896: āryāstadantevāsino vā prajñābalena sarvān kleśān prajahatīti |
XXhvsatssu:6905: āha ca bhagavān- prajñāskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandho bhavati iti |
XXhvsatssu:6914: āha ca bhagavān- sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathābhūtajñānamanuttarā prajñā ityucyate |
XXhvsatssu:6916: prajñaiva sarvakleśānāṃ samucchedini na tu saṃjñeti yogo nyānyāḥ |
XXhvsatssu:6918: | yathāha mahānidānasūtram- yacca sūtre 'vatarati vinaye ca sandṛśyate
XXhvsatssu:6919: dharmatāñca na vilomayati tat grāhyam iti |
XXhvsatssu:6920: api cāha- samyagarthe sthāpanā yathārtha [grahaṇam] samyak rute sthāpanā yathārūta [grahaṇam] iti |
XXhvsatssu:6921: ataḥ sūtre yadyapyuktam anityasaṃjñādayaḥ kleśānāṃ samucchedakā (SSS_185) iti |
XXhvsatssu:6926: ato jñāyate prajñayā sarve kleśāḥ prahīyanta iti |
XXhvsatssu:6930: prajñaptidharmāḥ pañca atītaḥ anāgataḥ saṅketaḥ saṃyogaḥ pudgala iti |
XXhvsatssu:6940: nadītīre sthitastratra tīre nimittaṃ gṛhītvā oghaṃ tīrtvā niṣkrāmati |
XXhvsatssu:6941: tatra yadi nimittaṃ nāsti tadā idaṃ tīraṃ pratinivṛtya [tannimitta]māmaraṇaṃ na muñcati iti |
XXhvsatssu:6957: tatra pañca dharmā eva nimittāni bhavanti |
XXhvsatssu:6962: cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi (SSS_186) dṛṣṭvā mā nimittaṃ gṛhṇīteti |
XXhvsatssu:6963: dharmamudrāyāñcoktam- yo bhikṣuḥ rūpaśabdādinimittaṃ prahīṇaṃ paśyati |
XXhvsatssu:6970: āha ca rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā mā nimittaṃ gṛhṇīteti |
XXhvsatssu:6972: kathaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā na nimittaṃ gṛhṇāti |
XXhvsatssu:6974: duṣṭanimittaniṣedhārthamāha- rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā na nimittaṃ gṛhṇātīti |
XXhvsatssu:6975: animitta[samādhe]rālambanamapi duṣṭamiti paścānnirodhasatya [varge]vakṣyate yat trividha cittanirodhī animittamādāvupasampadya viharatīti |
XXhvsatssu:6981: yathoktaṃ- dharmanimittasya grāhī na duṣyati iti |
XXhvsatssu:7015: yathā kaścit yadā śītārtaḥ tadoṣṇasparśaḥ sukhamutpādayati |
XXhvsatssu:7026: yadi pūrvameva duḥkhaviyogaḥ tadoṣṇasparśo na sukhakaraḥ |
XXhvsatssu:7036: kiñcāha- rūpasya ka āsvādāḥ ye rūpamupādāya prītisukhajananā iti |
XXhvsatssu:7037: kiñcāha- sukhavedanāyā utpadyamānāyāḥ sukhe sthite sukham |
XXhvsatssu:7039: duḥkhavedanāyā utpadyamānāyā na duḥkhe sthite duḥkham |
XXhvsatssu:7041: aduḥkhāsukhavedanāyā na duḥkhaṃ jñāyate na sukhaṃ jñāyate iti |
XXhvsatssu:7048: yadi nāsti paramārthataḥ sā, rūpārūpyadhātū na [sukha]vedanāvantau syātām |
XXhvsatssu:7051: yadi nāsti sukhā vedanā, kutra rāgo 'nuśayīta |
XXhvsatssu:7052: na vaktavyaṃ duḥkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgo 'nuśeta iti |
XXhvsatssu:7059: sarvo lokadhātu ā mahānarakamā ca bhavāgraṃ sarvaṃ duḥkhalakṣaṇam |
XXhvsatssu:7061: yathā kaścit dharmataptaḥ śītasparśaṃ sukhaṃ manyate |
XXhvsatssu:7065: tathā no cet duḥkhālpatve sukhasaṃjñotpadyata ityapi na vaktuṃ śakyate |
XXhvsatssu:7070: na hi paśyāmaḥ kathamapi sūkṣmaṃ sukhamanubhavantaṃ puruṣaṃ bāhumudyamya sudīrghamucchvasantam
XXhvsatssu:7071: sukhā ca vedanā sūkṣmā pravṛttā upaśamalakṣaṇamityucyate |
XXhvsatssu:7073: ato yaduktaṃ sūkṣme sukhe duḥkhasaṃjñotpadyata iti tat vacanamātram |
XXhvsatssu:7074: bālapṛthagjanānāmalpaduḥkhe sukhasaṃjñā mithyā prādurbhavati iti tu nyāyyam ||
XXhvsatssu:7078: cīvarabhojanādayo hi sarve dūḥkhahetavaḥ na sukhahetavaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:7080: annavastrādiṣūtkaṭeṣu duḥkhamapi vardhata iti pratyakṣaṃ khalu |
XXhvsatssu:7087: yathā janā maraṇabhītāḥ [anyaṃ] daṇḍaṃ sukhaṃ manyante |
XXhvsatssu:7088: daṇḍādānaśastrādānakṣuraśaktayo duḥkhahetutayā niyatāḥ na tathā sukhahetutayā |
XXhvsatssu:7100: yasya yatra sukhamabhūt tasya tadeva paścādduḥkhacittajanakamityato jñāyate nāsti sukhamiti
XXhvsatssu:7105: kiñca janā duḥkhe sukhaviparyāsamutpādya paścāttatrābhiṣvajante sukhaṃ yadi kiñcidasti |
XXhvsatssu:7107: yathā nitya ātmā viśuddhaḥ kimapi vastu nāsti |
XXhvsatssu:7113: sūtre ca bhagavatoktam- sukhā bhikṣavo vedanā duḥkhato draṣṭavyā |
XXhvsatssu:7121: yatra pṛthagjanānāṃ sukhasaṃjñotpadyate tat duḥkhato draṣṭavyamiti |
XXhvsatssu:7135: apara ādau mṛdurapi ante puruṣaṃ hinasti |
XXhvsatssu:7136: tadvatpadārthā api kecidādau subhakarā ante tu hiṃsrāḥ |
XXhvsatssu:7144: sarve sattvāḥ kāyikaduḥkhena vā caitasikaduḥkhena vā sadānugamyanta ityataḥ kāyo duḥkhamiti jñāyate |
XXhvsatssu:7155: kāyasya ca bahavaḥ śatravo yadutāśīviṣakāraṇḍaḥ pañcotkṣiptāsikā vadhakāḥ kalyāṇamitravañcanāścorāḥ śūnyagrāme grāmaghātakāścorā mahānadyā avaratīram iti |
XXhvsatssu:7158: kiñca jānīmaḥ sattvānāṃ kāyaḥ sarvaduḥkhairanugamyate yaduta jātiduḥkhaṃ, jarāduḥkhaṃ vyādhiduḥkhaṃ
XXhvsatssu:7165: yathoktaṃ sūtre- rūpaṃ duḥkhaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāṃ vijñānañca duḥkhaṃ iti |
XXhvsatssu:7166: rūpa utpadyamāne jarāvyādhimaraṇādayaḥ sarva upadravā utpadyeran |
XXhvsatssu:7185: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā sūtre- rūpārāmā[bhikṣavo] devamanuṣyā rūparatā rūpamuditā
XXhvsatssu:7203: | yathā vanyapakṣiṇāmāhāraḥ matsyānāṃ bhakṣaṇapraskandanañca sarvaṃ grahaṇāya bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:7216: yathoktaṃ sūtre- tṛṣṇā duḥkhasya mūlam iti |
XXhvsatssu:7227: lābhakāle na tṛpyati srotaḥ kabalayan sāgara iva |
XXhvsatssu:7231: sattvāḥ sukhasādhanānveṣaṇakāle prapātacaṅkramaṇā[di]doṣamapi sukhato matvā na
XXhvsatssu:7248: uktañca sūtre- dve ime bhikṣava āśe duṣprajahe |
XXhvsatssu:7251: eṣāṃ kāmānāmupabhogāya yā jīvita pratilābhāyāśā sā jīvitasyāśā |
XXhvsatssu:7253: ataḥ prajñāvatā yathābhūtaṃ sukhavedanālakṣaṇaṃ bhāvayatā duṣprahajā[pi] praheyā |
XXhvsatssu:7260: loke hi prājñā avaśyamuttamabhūmyāsvādamupādāyādharāṃ bhūmiṃ tyajanti |
XXhvsatssu:7269: idānīṃ kena vibhaṅgena santi tisro vedanā iti |
XXhvsatssu:7270: (u) ekasyā eva duḥkhavedanāyā kālabhedena trayaḥ prakārā
XXhvsatssu:7286: yadbhavato matam- aduḥkhāsukhasparśe na vedanotpadyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:7292: puruṣaṃ prati ālambanaṃ tridhā vibhaktaṃ priyaṃ dveṣyamudāsīnamiti |
XXhvsatssu:7306: pratikūlaṃ yatra cittaṃ tatra duḥkhā vedanā |
XXhvsatssu:7307: yatra na pratikūlaṃ nānukūlaṃ tatrāduḥkhāsukhā vedanā |
XXhvsatssu:7308: lokadharmāścāṣṭau lābho 'lābho nindā praśaṃsā yaśo 'yaśaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhamiti |
XXhvsatssu:7318: ye cittopavicārāḥ kāyavartinaḥ te sarve 'pi sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā vā bhavanti |
XXhvsatssu:7322: uktaṃ hi sūtre- aṣṭādaśa manaupavicārāḥ iti tatra kevalamekaṃ manaḥ aṣṭādaśadhāvibhaktaṃ yaduta
XXhvsatssu:7325: ato jñāyate sarve 'pi cittopavicārā (SSS_194) nāvedanā bhavantīti |
XXhvsatssu:7328: ato jñāyate cittopavicāreṣu dehagateṣu sarvaṃ duḥkhamityucyate |
XXhvsatssu:7329: āha ca yo rūpasyotpādaḥ sa duḥkhasyotpāda iti |
XXhvsatssu:7333: ataḥ sarve 'pi cittopavicārā vedanā ityucyanta iti |
XXhvsatssu:7335: vipariṇāme duḥkhatvāt sukhāṃ vedanāṃ duḥkhato bhāvayet |
XXhvsatssu:7337: itīmāstisro vedanā duḥkhāḥ pratyayasāmagryāṃ samutpannāḥ kṣaṇikāḥ |
XXhvsatssu:7343: anāsravā vedanā api āryā anantaraṃ tyajanti |
XXhvsatssu:7349: ya āryā anāsravacittavihāriṇaḥ te sarvatra paraṃ nirvidyante |
XXhvsatssu:7358: te tasmin samaye sarve saṃskṛtā duḥkhamiti vyaktaṃ paśyanti |
XXhvsatssu:7359: yadyanāsravā vedanā sukhā tadā sukhe prāmodyeran na nirvāṇonmukhacittā bhaveyuḥ |
XXhvsatssu:7363: (u) ekaiva vedanā ālambane nānopavicaratīti vibhaktā bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:7367: imeṣu sarvadharmeṣu kāyagateṣu santi (SSS_195) hitādayo viśeṣā ityato
XXhvsatssu:7374: aduḥkhāsukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ moho 'nuśete iti tasmātsaṃjñāvikalpitā ālambane saumanasyādayo dharmā vedanā ityucyante |
XXhvsatssu:7386: puruṣasya tatra sukhaduḥkhasaṃjñānutpādādvastuno jñānadarśanābhāvācca kevalaṃ mohānuśayaḥ sambhavati |
XXhvsatssu:7387: upekṣālambane yadi rāgadveṣau na samudācarataḥ pṛthagjanāstadutkṛṣṭālambanamiti vadanti |
XXhvsatssu:7391: yathoktaṃ sūtre- prākṛtānāṃ yadrupe bhavatyupekṣā sa sarvā rūpaniścitā |
XXhvsatssu:7393: yo nikṛṣṭaṃ karoti tasya punā rāgadveṣau samudbhavata iti |
XXhvsatssu:7400: yo jānāti tadālambanaṃ tasya sukhaduḥkhe spaṣṭaṃ pratīyete |
XXhvsatssu:7404: (u) puruṣasyāsya tadā tadālambane na sukhacittamutpadyate na ca duḥkhacittam |
XXhvsatssu:7412: puruṣasyāsya tasmin ālambane pūrvaṃ nimittagrahāt tatrālambane yadyavidyānuśayo yadi vā rāgadveṣānuśayo 'sti |
XXhvsatssu:7417: tasya tāsāṃ vedanānāṃ samudayañcāstagamañcāsvādañcādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtamaprajānato yo 'duḥkhāsukhasyāvedanāyā
XXhvsatssu:7439: aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā yathākālaṃ tridhā vibhaktā bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:7440: yadā duḥkhāyāḥ samudayādyaprajñānam, tasmin samaye duḥkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ sukhasaṃjñotpadyate aduḥkhāsukhasaṃjñā cotpadyate |
XXhvsatssu:7445: (pṛ) uktaṃ hi sūtre- tasya cet sukhā vedanotpadyate |
XXhvsatssu:7447: utpannā khalu ma iyaṃ sukhā vedanā iti |
XXhvsatssu:7451: (u) sūtrasyāsya puruṣo (SSS_197) vedayata ityābhiprāyikaṃ vacanaṃ ityadoṣaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:7452: sukhādivedanā kāya āgamya mana ālambate ityato
XXhvsatssu:7457: ata ucyate sukhā vedanotpadyate cet sa yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti iti |
XXhvsatssu:7461: sūtre tūktam- sukhā vedanā duḥkhā vedanā aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā iti |
XXhvsatssu:7463: kena tadvedyata iti vedayatīti vedanā bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:7468: ato vedayatīti vedanā bhavati (pṛ) na sattvānāṃ vedanā |
XXhvsatssu:7470: (u) ayaṃ padasyārthaḥ yat sanimittaṃ tat sakāritram |
XXhvsatssu:7471: prajñaptau sanimittāmimāṃ sukhāṃ duḥkhāmaduḥkhāsukhāṃ [vedanāṃ] kāyagatāṃ cittamanubhavati
XXhvsatssu:7475: kiṃ tasya tasmin samaye duḥkhasaṃjñā notpadyate |
XXhvsatssu:7476: (u) sarvaṃ duḥkhamityalabdhvā sa tisro vedanā anusmarati |
XXhvsatssu:7480: smṛtyunubandhāt syāt idaṃ kāyikaṃ sukham idaṃ caitasikaṃ sukhamiti |
XXhvsatssu:7487: tīrthikā hi vadanti vedanā ātmaniśritā iti |
XXhvsatssu:7489: bhagavānāha- vedanāḥ kāyaṃ cittañca niśritā iti |
XXhvsatssu:7492: ṣaṣṭhamindriyamupādāyotpadyamānā vedanā caitasikī (pṛ) āsāṃ katamā sāmiṣā
XXhvsatssu:7499: (u) prahīṇāmiṣasya yā duḥkhā vedanā sā nirāmiṣā |
XXhvsatssu:7500: āmiṣāṇāṃ viruddhā duḥkhā vedanā itīyaṃ nirāmiṣetyucyate |
XXhvsatssu:7506: yathocyate sūtre- asti sāmiṣā prītiḥ asti nirāmiṣā prītiḥ |
XXhvsatssu:7508: sāmiṣā prītiriti pañcakāma guṇān pratītyotpadyate prītiḥ |
XXhvsatssu:7514: (pṛ) pañcasvindriyeṣu kasmādduḥkhā vedanā sukhā vedaneti pratyaṅgaṃ dvidhā vibhaktā |
XXhvsatssu:7523: atastṛtīyadhyāne prītiviśeṣaṃ niśrityocyate kāyena sukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayatīti |
XXhvsatssu:7531: sattvāḥ duḥkhābhihatāḥ sukhārthitvāt ghaniṣṭhaṃ kleśamutpādayanti iti |

XXhvsatssu:8479: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- hetukṛtaṃ karma ahetukṛtaṃ karmeti |
XXhvsatssu:8491: yadi yodhājīvo vyavaharasi na tadā gaṇayiṣyāmīti yāvat tridhā pṛcchati |
XXhvsatssu:8493: karoti- yathā kaścidviharan pādanikṣepaṇena kīṭaṃ hanti |
XXhvsatssu:8496: karmāṇi caturvidhāni- kṛtānupacitaṃ, upacittākṛtaṃ, kṛtopacitaṃ akṛtānupacitam iti |
XXhvsatssu:8502: upacitākṛtamiti- yat anyaṃ hananādi kārayitvā pramuditacitto bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:8503: anyaṃ dānādi kārayitvā ca pramuditacitto bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:8504: kṛtopacitamiti- yat hananādi pāpaṃ kṛtvā dānādipuṇyaṃ kṛtvā ca pramuditacitto bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:8505: akṛtānupacitamiti- na ca karoti nāpi muditacitto bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:8507: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yat karma kṛtamupacitaṃ tasya karmaṇo 'vaśyamasti vipākapratisaṃvedanā iti |
XXhvsatssu:8508: ataḥ kṛtopacitakarmaṇo dṛṣṭadharme vā vipāko vedyate |
XXhvsatssu:8511: (pṛ) yadi hetukṛtopacitakarmaṇo 'vaśyamasti vipākapratisaṃvedanā tadā nāsti vimuktiḥ |
XXhvsatssu:8515: bhagavānāha- ekatyaḥ(śca) puruṣo [bhāvitakāyo] (SSS_227) narakavedanīyaṃ karma karoti |
XXhvsatssu:8541: niyatavipākaṃ karma bahu vā alpaṃ vā avaśyavedanīyavipākam |
XXhvsatssu:8550: yathā bhagavati tacchrāvake vā satkāraḥ athavālpamātrānindā |
XXhvsatssu:8561: yathā rājadharme gurupātakī daṇḍya eva na kṣantavyaḥ ||
XXhvsatssu:8563: 98 gurulaghupāpavargaḥ sūtra uktam- asti gurulaghupāpaṃ karmeti |
XXhvsatssu:8577: dharmo dharma iti [yat] tannāstīti tasmin vadati kuśaladharmāṇāmacaritāro bahavaḥ sattvāḥ pratihanyanta ityato
XXhvsatssu:8583: nāsti pāpaṃ nāsti puṇyaṃ nāsti mātāpitṛsajjānānāṃ satkāravipāka iti yadvacanaṃ tadādimithyādṛṣṭirapi tadvipākaprāpiṇī |
XXhvsatssu:8584: anyaṃ mithyādṛṣṭau pātayan bahūn sattvānakuśalāni kārayaṃśca tadvipākaṃ vedayate |
XXhvsatssu:8585: īdṛśamithyādṛṣṭisūtrāṇi racayanti yathā pūraṇādayo mithyādṛṣṭināmācāryāḥ samyagdṛṣṭivihiṃsayā bahūnāṃ sattvānāmakuśalāya hetupratyayaṃ prakāśayanti |
XXhvsatssu:8593: śataṃ sahasrāṇāṃ nirarbudānāṃ ṣaṭ triṃśacca pañca ca arbudānām yadāryagarhī nirayamupaiti vācaṃ manaḥ praṇidhāya pāpakam |
XXhvsatssu:8596: guruviparītaṃ laghu yaduta tapanapratapanādiṣu hīnanarakeṣu tīryakṣu preteṣu devamanuṣyeṣu cākuśalavipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayate |
XXhvsatssu:8616: evaṃ manuṣyeṣu caturmahārājikānāmadhaḥ pratyekaṃ karmavaśādvipākaṃ vedayate |
XXhvsatssu:8625: (SSS_230) tato jaghanyabhūteṣu caturapramāṇacitteṣu viharan śīlasamādhipratyayavaśācca rūpadhātāvutpadyate |
XXhvsatssu:8630: (pṛ) puṇyakṣetraṃ kiṃ bodhyotkṛṣṭaṃ kiṃ vā prahāṇena |
XXhvsatssu:8641: ato yadbodhisattvānāṃ saṃsāre dīrghakālāvāsaḥ sa samyak prahāṇārthaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:8650: āha ca- dandhānāṃ hiṃsayā kāmarāgakalahacittaṃ prarohati |
XXhvsatssu:8658: tasminneva sūtra uktaṃ- tiraścāṃ dānaṃ śataguṇaṃ hitaṃ prāpayati iti |
XXhvsatssu:8659: vastutastu pārāvatapakṣyādīnāṃ dānena pratilabdho vipākaḥ tīrthikānāṃ pañcābhijñānāṃ dānamatiśete
XXhvsatssu:8661: sūtraṃ tat bahunā hetunāha- nissaraṇārthā prajñā iti |
XXhvsatssu:8669: asmin śrāmaṇere utpannānuttara [bodhi]citte tu arhanneva tatpātracīvaramādāya
XXhvsatssu:8677: (u) yat karma pareṣāṃ priyaṃ prayacchati tat kuśalam |
XXhvsatssu:8683: yat pareṣāṃ duḥkhaprāpakaṃ tena pāpena bhavitavyam |
XXhvsatssu:8684: yathā āñjanauṣadhaśalyavedhāḥ pareṣāṃ duḥkhajanakāḥ pāpāḥ syuḥ |
XXhvsatssu:8688: yathā paradāragamanaṃ tat tasya sukhajanakaṃ tat puṇyakaramapi syāt |
XXhvsatssu:8690: yat parānukuśaladharme pravartayati tat duḥkhāya bhavati na sukhāya |
XXhvsatssu:8695: tadannapānaṃ kadācidajīryamāṇaṃ sat puruṣasya maraṇaṃ prāpayati |
XXhvsatssu:8696: tadannadāyakaḥ kiṃ pāpaṃ labheta kiṃ vā puṇyam |
XXhvsatssu:8703: idaṃ pūrvameva pratyuktaṃ yadabrahmacaryaṃ niyamena akuśalamiti |
XXhvsatssu:8712: yathā corāṇāṃ nigrahe rāṣṭraṃ nirīti bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:8726: yat karma kuśalākuśalahetusamuddhitaṃ, tataḥ puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vyāmiśraṃ labhate |
XXhvsatssu:8733: iti prāṇātipātāt kathaṃ puṇyaṃ na bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:8739: āha ca ca sūtram- yo yuddhe hanyate
XXhvsatssu:8745: hanyādeva na vai pāpaṃ āhantā vindate tu tat || iti
XXhvsatssu:8748: brāhmaṇasya ṣaḍdharmāḥ kṣatriyasya catvāro vaiśyasya trayaḥ śūdrasyaikaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:8749: ṣaḍ dharmā iti yajanamārvijya madhyayatamadhyāpanaṃ dānaṃ pratigrahaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:8750: catvāro dharmā iti yajanaṃ nārtvijyaṃ, parato vedādhyayanaṃ nādhyāpanaṃ, dānaṃ na pratigrahaḥ prajāpālanam |
XXhvsatssu:8751: trayo dharmā iti yajanaṃ nārtvijyaṃ, adhyayanaṃ nādhyāpanaṃ dānaṃ na pratigrahaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:8753: kṣatriyasya prajāpālanāya prāṇivadhe puṇyameva na pāpam |
XXhvsatssu:8754: veda uktam- prāṇivadhaḥ puṇyaprāpakaḥ yaduta vaidikamantreṇa hatāḥ paśavaḥ svarga utpadyanta iti |
XXhvsatssu:8756: kiñcāha yadvastuto martavyaṃ taddhanane nāsti pāpam- yathā pañcābhijña ṛṣirmantreṇa puruṣaṃ hanti |
XXhvsatssu:8759: ato jñāyate prāṇivadho na pāpaprāpaka iti |
XXhvsatssu:8781: kecitsattvā api pratyarpaṇīyajīvitadhanā ityato vadhahiṃsayā yadabhīpsitaṃ tallabhate |
XXhvsatssu:8795: yadbravīṣi sūtra uktaṃ- yo yuddhe hanyate sa svarga utpadyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:8802: yadāha bhavān- caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ pṛthak santi svadharmāḥ |
XXhvsatssu:8806: yathā sūnakādīnāṃ lokānāṃ gṛhyadharmāḥ prāṇivadhāḥ sadā kriyamāṇā na pāpavimuktāḥ |
XXhvsatssu:8809: yadi kṣatriyo rājadharmatvena prāṇān vadhyan apāpo bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:8811: kṣatriyaḥ paraṃ prajāsu karuṇārdracittatayā vairamutsṛjya tadadhīnaṃ puṇyaṃ labhate |
XXhvsatssu:8820: yo mumūrṣuḥ sa brāhmaṇādapyupādānaṃ labhate iti |
XXhvsatssu:8826: (u) ukta brāhmaṇa dharma eva- cauryakāle dhanasvāmyāgatya rakṣati |
XXhvsatssu:8833: tadā ātmahanane parahanane vā tatpāpamapi tulyam |
XXhvsatssu:8839: corahanane 'pyevaṃ syāt duṣkarmaṇā jīvanta iti yaduktaṃ tatra duṣkarmasattvātkathaṃ puṇyaṃ bhavet |
XXhvsatssu:8840: yadavocaḥ coraṃ purata āgataṃ hanyādeva na vai pāpamahantā tu vindate tat iti |
XXhvsatssu:8847: yadabravīḥ veda uktaṃ prāṇivadhaḥ puṇyaprāpaka iti |
XXhvsatssu:8849: yaduktaṃ vastuto martavyasya kasyacidvadhe nāsti pāpamiti |
XXhvsatssu:8862: evaṃ yaḥ parasmai dadāti tasyāpi na puṇyaṃ syāt |
XXhvsatssu:8863: pratigrahītā pūrvādhvani svācaritadānakarmaka idānīṃ tadvipākaṃ labhate |
XXhvsatssu:8864: na hi sambhavati nāsti puṇyaṃ pāpamiti |
XXhvsatssu:8865: ato jñātavyaṃ sattvānāṃ pūrvādhvakṛtavadhakarmaṇāmapi vadhitā pāpaṃ labhata iti |
XXhvsatssu:8871: tathā nocedṛṣayo rāgadveṣādikleśānāmudaye ṛddhe na hīyeran |
XXhvsatssu:8874: jñātavyaṃ pūrvādhvakṛtapratyayānāmapi sattvānāṃ vadhitā pāpavān syāditi |
XXhvsatssu:8881: yadabravīḥ- kaściccittabalena prāṇātipātaṃ kurvan puṇyaṃ prasūte |
XXhvsatssu:8887: yaḥ kuśalacittena gurutalpago brāhmaṇahantā vā bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:8889: pārasīkādi paryantabhūmigatānāṃ janānāṃ puṇyabuddhayā mātṛbhaginyādigāmināṃ kiṃ puṇyaṃ bhavet
XXhvsatssu:8897: paśyāmaḥ khalu pratyakṣaṃ bahavaḥ sattvā vadhādīnācaranto bhūyasā tisṛṣu gatiṣu manuṣyagatau ca duḥkhapīḍā anubhavantīti |
XXhvsatssu:8903: devā api sadā yuddhe 'suraiḥ saha vadhyante |
XXhvsatssu:8908: gatiṣu, iti jñātavyaṃ tatra pāpaṃ tīvraduḥkhamiti |
XXhvsatssu:8917: yo vadhahiṃsādibhyo viramati sa punarlābhasukhāyuḥpauṣkalyaṃ labhate |
XXhvsatssu:8920: idānīmauttarā vadanti taṇḍulaṃ svābhāvikaṃ vasanaṃ vṛkṣajam |
XXhvsatssu:8925: ye buddhā bodhisattvāḥ pratyekabuddhāḥ śrāvakā anye ca bhadantāḥ te sarve tān parityajya viramanti
XXhvsatssu:8950: yadanena hetunā janavidviṣṭaṃ kathaṃ tadakuśalaṃ na bhavet |
XXhvsatssu:8951: yaḥ prāṇātipātavirataḥ sa bahūnāṃ (SSS_237) janānāṃ priyo bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:8955: yathā kaścidrājārthaṃ duṣṭacorāṇāṃ hantā rājapriyo bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:8958: yathā vadanti yo duṣkarmaṇā rājacittaṃ tarpayati |
XXhvsatssu:8966: vadhādidharmāḥ tāḍanahiṃsanavandhanādīnāṃ duḥkho padravāṇāṃ hetava ityato jñāyate 'kuśalā iti |
XXhvsatssu:8969: yo na vadhyati taṃ rājā hanti |
XXhvsatssu:8970: (u) yo na hanti sa hanyata ityahantāraḥ sarve mariṣyamāṇā bhaveyuḥ |
XXhvsatssu:8972: yadi rājā jānāti ayamavadhacitta iti tadā avadhitā pratyuta satkriyate |
XXhvsatssu:8973: ato jñāyate vadhādayo duḥkhahetavo na tvavadhādayaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:8984: yathā sūnako na kadāpīdṛśakarmaṇā satkāraṃ labhate |
XXhvsatssu:8988: dṛṣṭe paśyāmaḥ khalu hiṃsādīnāṃ vipriyaṃ phalaṃ bhavatīti |
XXhvsatssu:8996: gatāgate pādotkṣepaṇe pādāvakṣepaṇe vā sadā sūkṣmasattvān vihanti |
XXhvsatssu:9004: sattvāḥ, teṣu sattvasaṃjñāmutpādya jighatsābuddhyā tān hatvā hananapāpaṃ
XXhvsatssu:9012: jñātavyaṃ prāṇihiṃsā hetāvahetau ca pāpaṃ prāpayati |
XXhvsatssu:9020: sati tu vijñāne budhyate evamasati hetucitte na karma sidhyati |
XXhvsatssu:9029: yathā mātustanagrahaṇe bālako na pāpaṃ labhate |
XXhvsatssu:9032: puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ sarvaṃ cittādhīnaṃ jāyata iti jñātavyam |
XXhvsatssu:9034: tadā vimuktilabdho 'pi asati hetau sattvān pīḍayan pāpaṃ labheta |
XXhvsatssu:9039: yathā kaścitpuṇyaṃ karma kurvan sattvaṃ hatavānasmīti bhrānto bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:9042: hetāvasati puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā nāstīti jñātavyam |
XXhvsatssu:9044: tadā kathamidaṃ kuśalaṃ idamakuśalaṃ idamavyākṛtamiti vibhāgaḥ syāt |
XXhvsatssu:9046: yathā trayaḥ puruṣāḥ sambhūya stūpapradakṣiṇaṃ kurvanti |
XXhvsatssu:9056: yadi cittavyatiriktaṃ karmāsti asattvasaṃkhyeṣvapi puṇyapāpaṃ syāt |
XXhvsatssu:9057: yathā sabhīraṇonmūlitaparvatopadruteṣu sattveṣu samīraṇe pāpaṃ syāt |
XXhvsatssu:9065: tathā cennārakāḥ sattvāḥ sadā dahyante pacyante ca |
XXhvsatssu:9072: avaśyaṃ hetucittena tadduḥkhamanubhavatāṃ puṇyaṃ bhavati natvahetucittena |
XXhvsatssu:9080: yadi hetucittaṃ vinā puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vāsti |
XXhvsatssu:9088: vastutastu santi brahmakāyikādīnāṃ surucirāḥ kāyā ato jñāyate na hetuṃ vinā puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vāstīti
XXhvsatssu:9093: pariśuddhena cittena bhojane na punarasti pāpamiti śrutaṃ dṛṣṭavānasi |
XXhvsatssu:9094: tadā cittaṃ vinā nāsti puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā iti jñātavyam |
XXhvsatssu:9098: tathā no cet sarve prāṇivadhāḥ puṇyaprāpakāḥ pāpaprāpakā vā syuḥ |
XXhvsatssu:9105: ato jñāyate yo hetuṃ vinānyasya viṣaṃ prayacchati |
XXhvsatssu:9121: yaḥ (SSS_240) prājñaḥ sa pañcakāmaguṇeṣu vasannapi na pāpamāk bhavatīti manaso balam |
XXhvsatssu:9123: na hi prājño rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā mithyāsaṃjñāmutpādayati |
XXhvsatssu:9128: tathā ca mānasaṃ karma niṣprayojanaṃ syāt |
XXhvsatssu:9144: annavastrābhyāṃ paramupakurvatā tasmin samaye puṇyaṃ labhyate |
XXhvsatssu:9151: anyapuruṣe ca duṣṭacittamātramutpādayati na kāyavākkarma karoti |
XXhvsatssu:9166: ato jñāyate ātmārthatā na puṇyavatī syāditi |
XXhvsatssu:9171: yadbravīṣi caityavihārā vasattvabhūtau, tayoḥ secanaśodhane api
XXhvsatssu:9173: tat bhagavadguṇāḥ sattveṣu pūjyā iti smṛtvā janāḥ secante śodhayanti ca |
XXhvsatssu:9177: uktañca sūtre- na tathāgataḥ san nāsan,
XXhvsatssu:9178: nāpi sadasat nāpi ca na san nāsan iti |
XXhvsatssu:9181: tadā anirvṛtakālīnaṃ bhagavantaṃ smṛtvā pūjayantaḥ puṇyaṃ labhante |
XXhvsatssu:9182: yathā janāḥ pitarau jananapoṣaṇakālaṃ smṛtvā yajanti |
XXhvsatssu:9183: tathā no cet na pitṛpūjā bhavet |
XXhvsatssu:9199: yathā ca vastradānaṃ yadyapi paraṃ hāpayati |
XXhvsatssu:9201: tathā ca vastradānenāpi na puṇyaṃ bhavet |
XXhvsatssu:9203: yathoktaṃ sūtre- eko bhikṣuḥ snānagṛhe anyasya dehaṃ hastena mārjayati sma |
XXhvsatssu:9209: yadbhavānāha- na ca cittamātreṇa puṇyaṃ labhata iti |
XXhvsatssu:9211: yat kaścitparasyopakāraṃ cakāra karoti kariṣyati vā sarvaṃ tat kuśalacittamūlakam |
XXhvsatssu:9212: yacca parasyāpakāraṃ cakāra karoti kariṣyati vā sarvaṃ tadakuśalacittamūlakam |
XXhvsatssu:9213: karuṇācārī ca karuṇācittavipākena sarveṣāmupakaroti yaduta caṇḍavātavṛṣṭyanupatane 'pi
XXhvsatssu:9214: sūryācandramasau nakṣatrāṇi ca na bhraśyanti sadā caranti ca |
XXhvsatssu:9225: tatpratyayena apakarṣakaraṇe 'karaṇe vā sarvathā tadādhipatyena pāpaṃ labhate |
XXhvsatssu:9226: bhagavati piḍājananānna pāpamastīti bhavato yadi matam |
XXhvsatssu:9233: akuśalacittavattvāt tasmin śṛṇvati aśṛṇvati vāvaśyaṃ duḥkhaṃ janayet |
XXhvsatssu:9240: yadi paraprabodhito jānāti tadā tasyāvaśyaṃ duḥkhopāyāso jāyeta eva |
XXhvsatssu:9243: prabudhya yadyapi na jānāti tathāpi tasya [paścāt] pīḍāṃ karotyeva |
XXhvsatssu:9250: tathā ca sarve sattvāḥ sadā pāpaṃ labheran yathā parapīḍanā janāḥ |
XXhvsatssu:9253: ato na svadehamātrātpuṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vāstīti jñātavyam |
XXhvsatssu:9254: mārgahetutvādvinaye śīlamidaṃ paribaddhaṃ yaḥ kliṣṭacittenātmānaṃ hanti na saṃkleśātpāpaṃ labhata iti |
XXhvsatssu:9256: yatkarma na kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā na parasattvānāmupakārakaṃ nāpakārakaṃ tadavyākṛtamityucyate
XXhvsatssu:9260: yatkarma na kuśalaṃ nākuśalaṃ tadavyākṛtamiti vadanti |
XXhvsatssu:9272: (u) bhagavānāha- dvidhā vipākaḥ mithyākāyacaryā apriyavipākaprāpiṇī samyakkāyacaryā priyavipākaprāpiṇīti
XXhvsatssu:9281: bhagavānāha- trīṇi duścaritāni kāyaduścaritaṃ vāgduścaritaṃ manoduścaritaṃ iti |
XXhvsatssu:9289: pāpamidaṃ svakāyenāpi kriyate yatra svakāyena sattvān hanti |
XXhvsatssu:9290: vācāpi kriyate yatna sattvān hantuṃ paramājñāpayati |
XXhvsatssu:9291: manasāpi kriyate yat kaściccittamutpādayati yena paro mriyate |
XXhvsatssu:9295: kadāciccittotpāde paro jānāti anena pratyayenāpi pāpakaraṃ prāṇātipātādi kuryāditi |
XXhvsatssu:9300: yat kenacitpraśne sthāpite taṃ purata eva vañcayati |
XXhvsatssu:9312: yathaikameva rūpaṃ [kasyacit] priyaṃ bhavati [anyasyā] priyaṃ bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:9329: (pṛ) samyak caritāni priyavipākakarāṇīti sūtra uktvā kasmātpunarucyate
XXhvsatssu:9333: ataḥ sūtre punarucyate sucaritapratyayaṃ svarga upapadyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:9334: duścaritasucarite kuśalākuśalagatikakāyaṃ prāpayataḥ gṛhītakāyastatra sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā
XXhvsatssu:9337: sucaritapratyayaṃ deveṣu manuṣyeṣu vā sukhaṃ vedayate ||
XXhvsatssu:9345: yadvandanavastradānādi kuśalaṃ kāyikaṃ karma tat kāyasucaritam |
XXhvsatssu:9353: anye 'pi śīlasaṃvarasaṅgṛhītaṃ sucaritaṃ labhante yathā daśavarṣāyuṣkasya puruṣasya prāṇātipātaviratisamādānādviṃśativarṣāyuṣkaḥ putra utpadyate |
XXhvsatssu:9356: (u) ābhidhārmikā āhuḥ- pṛthagjanānāṃ yat kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ mānasaṃ kuśalaṃ karma tat sucaritamityucyate
XXhvsatssu:9361: kecidāhuḥ- imāni trīṇi caritāni ekasyaivārthasyavibhinnāni nāmāni |
XXhvsatssu:9366: (pṛ) ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- cittameva vyupaśamacaritaṃ na cetaneti |
XXhvsatssu:9373: sucaritadṛṣṭisampanno devadṛśo vā bhavati devasaṃkhyātadṛśo vā bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:9378: sucarītaśālī yadyapi nāvaśyaṃ deveṣūtpadyate tathāpi ya āryabahumatasthāna utpadyate |
XXhvsatssu:9382: yat samyaṅmithyāvyāmiśraṃ sucaritaṃ [tatra] mithyācaritasya prābalyānna deveṣūtpadyante |
XXhvsatssu:9384: sūtre- bhagavānānandamavocat- paśyāmyahaṃ kecana trīṇi suritāni caranto 'pi durgatāvutpadyante
XXhvsatssu:9386: idānīṃ sucaritasyāpi aparipūrṇatvānmaraṇa upasthite mithyādṛṣṭeścittābhimukhyāddargatau patanti
XXhvsatssu:9392: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ- trividhaṃ karma kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karma rūpadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karma arūpyadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karmeti |
XXhvsatssu:9394: | (u) yat karma ānarakādāca paranirmitavaśavartidevādantarāle vipākavedakaṃ tatkāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karma |
XXhvsatssu:9405: (pṛ) tathā cedidaṃ tīrthikaśāstraṃ yaduta sarvapratisaṃvedyaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhañca pūrvakarmahetupratyayaṃ bhavatīti |
XXhvsatssu:9406: pūrvakarmavipāko yaduta kuśalamakuśalaṃ karma savipākamavipākamiti vyavasāyaguṇasya nāsti yatkiñcanaprayojanam |
XXhvsatssu:9409: | yasya (SSS_246) kleśāḥ karmāṇi karmavipākāśca santi tasya vimuktirnāsti
XXhvsatssu:9414: tīrthikā hi vadanti sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ paratvamaparatvaṃ pūrvavipākamātramiti |
XXhvsatssu:9416: paśyāmastu vastutaḥ padārthāḥ pratyutpannebhyaḥ pratyayebhyaḥ samutpadyante yathā bījāṅkurādaya iti |
XXhvsatssu:9426: yathā ajātaputrasya ca caṭakacakravākādīnāñca kāmaḥ, sarpādināṃ kopaḥ, tatsarvaṃ pūrvakarmavipāka iti jñeyam |
XXhvsatssu:9433: tatra bījādaṅkura utpadyate na tu tuṣādibhyaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:9435: yaduktaṃ bhavatā prayāse na guṇa iti |
XXhvsatssu:9443: tadyathā dagdhaṃ bījaṃ na punaḥ prarohati |
XXhvsatssu:9445: kiñca ya utpannā dharmāḥ sarve te karmamūlakāḥ |
XXhvsatssu:9449: yadi nāsti karmamūlaṃ, kathamevaṃ pratiniyatavibhāgaḥ syāt |
XXhvsatssu:9456: purā kila janāḥ kuśalamācaritavanta ityataḥ śālitaṇḍulāḥ svata ajāyanta |
XXhvsatssu:9457: ato jñāyate karmabhūlakatvāt māṣānmāṣo jāyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:9461: sarvasattvānāṃ sādhāraṇakarmavipāko yaduta (SSS_247) caṅkramaṇāsthānakarmapratyayalābhāt kṣityādayo bhavanti |
XXhvsatssu:9462: prakāśakarmapratyayalābhāccandrasūryādayo bhavanti iti jñātavyaṃ janyaṃ vastu sarvaṃ karmamūlakamiti
XXhvsatssu:9481: (u) yaḥ kāmarūpārūpyadhātuṣu daśākuśalakarmāṇi samutpādayati sa kāmadhātau vipākaṃ vedayate
XXhvsatssu:9491: uktaṃ hi sūtre bhagavatā- mithyādṛṣṭirduḥkhakleśānāṃ heturiti |
XXhvsatssu:9493: yathā tiktakāravelle vidyamānāni catvāri mahābhūtāni sarvāṇi tiktarasāni bhavanti |
XXhvsatssu:9497: yathā bako brahmā brahmāṇamāmantrayāha- mopagaccha śramaṇaṃ gautamam |
XXhvsatssu:9511: yadīdamakuśalaṃ karma tadā kāmadhātau vipākaṃ vedayata ityataḥ kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktam |
XXhvsatssu:9522: kathaṃ tatra samutpāditaṃ kuśalaṃ karma kāmadhātuvedanīyavipākaṃ bhavet |
XXhvsatssu:9524: tathā tatra vikṣiptacittasamutpāditakuśalakarmaṇo 'smin loke vipākaṃ vedayate |
XXhvsatssu:9525: yathā ca rūpārūpyadhātusamutpāditākuśalakarmaṇaḥ kāmadhātau vipākaṃ vedayate |
XXhvsatssu:9527: (pṛ) yo rūpārūpyadhātugataḥ na sa utpādayati kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ
XXhvsatssu:9529: (u) tatra nāstyayaṃ hetuḥ yat kāmadhātugato rūpārūpya[pratisaṃyuktaṃ] kuśalaṃ karmaiva samutpādayati na rūpārūpyadhātugataḥ kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ kuśalaṃ karma samutpādayati
XXhvsatssu:9531: ucyate ca yuṣmābhiḥ kāmadhātugataḥ kāmadhātukamavyākṛtaṃ cittaṃ samutpādayatīti |
XXhvsatssu:9534: sūtre bhagavān hastakadevaputrametadavocat- cittaviharaṇe audārikavedanāsaṃjñāṃ manasikuru iti |
XXhvsatssu:9536: ayaṃ kuśalacittena yat dharmaṃ śṛṇoti buddhaṃ pūjayati tat sarvaṃ kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ cittam |
XXhvsatssu:9537: tathā no cet audārikasaṃjñeti nākhyā syāt |
XXhvsatssu:9539: yathāha bhagavān triṣu vastuṣu atṛpto 'smin loke āyuṣo 'nte
XXhvsatssu:9540: 'navataptadeveṣūpapatsye yaduta tathāgataṃ paśyāmi dharmaṃ śṛṇomi saṅghaṃ
XXhvsatssu:9561: (pṛ) kimetāni trīṇi karmāṇi niyatavipākāni niyatakālāni ca |
XXhvsatssu:9567: tathā cet pañcānantaryāṇi niyatavipākānīti na syāt |
XXhvsatssu:9574: dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyavipākaṃ karma nāvaśyaṃ dṛṣṭadharma eva vedyate |
XXhvsatssu:9575: vedyate cet dṛṣṭadharma eva vedanīyaṃ syāt nānyatra |
XXhvsatssu:9580: yathā tathāgata āryeṣu mātāpitrādiṣu samutpāditaṃ yat kuśalamakuśalaṃ karma tat dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyavipākam
XXhvsatssu:9584: yathā cakravartinaḥ karma bodhisattvasya vā karma |
XXhvsatssu:9589: yathā mallikādevī svānnabhāgadānena praṇidadhāti dṛṣṭa evādhvani rājamahiṣī bhaveyamiti |
XXhvsatssu:9595: (pṛ) yasmin kṣaṇe karmotpadyate tatsamanantarakṣaṇa eva kiṃ vipāko vedyate |
XXhvsatssu:9600: yo garbhamadhyastho ye ca middhonmattādayaḥ te karma sañcinvanti na vā (u)
XXhvsatssu:9604: 'syāṃ bhūmau vītarāgaḥ sa pṛthivīkarma karoti na vā |
XXhvsatssu:9614: uktañca sūtre- prahīṇapuṇyapāpakarmako 'rhanniti sa nopacinoti puṇyakarmāṇi apuṇyakarmāṇyāneñjyakarmāṇi ca |
XXhvsatssu:9615: ato vedanāparyavasannaṃ karmeti na nūtnaṃ karmābhisaṃskaroti |
XXhvsatssu:9620: hyuktaṃ- sa karmāṇi vidhvasya na sañcinoti nopacinoti niruddhaṃ na tathā
XXhvsatssu:9625: (u) sarvatra triṣvapi dhātuṣu (pṛ) aniyataṃ karma kimasti kiṃ vā nāsti |
XXhvsatssu:9627: yat karma dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyavipākaṃ vā upapadyavedanīyavipākaṃ vā tadūrdhvavedanīyavipākaṃ vā bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:9632: (u) ya imāni trividhakarmāṇi vivecayati sa samyagdṛṣṭimutpādayati |
XXhvsatssu:9636: udāsīnasya kadācinmithyādṛṣṭirbhavet yaduta kuśalasyākuśalasya vā nāsti vipāka iti |
XXhvsatssu:9640: pāpo 'pi paśyati bhadrāṇi yāvatpāpaṃ na pacyate |
XXhvsatssu:9641: yadā ca pacyate pāpamatha pāpo pāpāni paśyati ||
XXhvsatssu:9642: bhadro 'pi paśyati pāpāni yāvadbhadraṃ na pacyate |
XXhvsatssu:9643: yadā ca pacyate bhadramatha bhadro bhadrāṇi paśyati ||
XXhvsatssu:9645: yaḥ pūrvādhvani puṇyavān san āyuṣo 'nte prabalakuśalacittamutpādayati iti |
XXhvsatssu:9647: ata eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ prajānīyāt ||
XXhvsatssu:9668: hetau phalopacāraḥ yathānnasya dātā pañcārthānāṃ dāteti |
XXhvsatssu:9697: tatra saumanasyamapi saṃjñāvikalpādutpadyata iti na vipākaḥ syāt |
XXhvsatssu:9706: tacca daurmanasyaṃ jñānapraheyaṃ kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhamapi pariharati |
XXhvsatssu:9707: daurmanasya triṣvadhvasu kleśaṃ janayati yaduta pūrvamahaṃ duḥkhī idānīṃ duḥkhī āyatyāñca duḥkhīti |
XXhvsatssu:9724: rājānamapṛcchat- api tvaṃ [mahārāja] kāśīkosaleṣu priyo 'si iti |
XXhvsatssu:9726: devā rūpāsaktā rūpakāmāḥ rūpe vinaṣṭe daurmanasyajātā bhavanti |
XXhvsatssu:9733: bahavaśca sattvā daurmanasyakaraṃ parān sampīḍayantaḥ sadaurmanasyasampīḍanavipākaṃ labhante
XXhvsatssu:9736: yaduktaṃ bhavatā- vītarāgāṇāṃ vyāvṛttatvānna vipāka iti |
XXhvsatssu:9739: narakādivipāko na vipāka iti kiṃ sambhavet |
XXhvsatssu:9740: ato na sambhavati vītarāgāṇāṃ vyāvṛttamavipāka iti |
XXhvsatssu:9762: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo 'yaṃ puruṣo nitayaṃ samāpattau vedanīyavipākaṃ karmopacinoti na sa supade
XXhvsatssu:9766: yat kasyacit kleśā anivāryāḥ tadyathā ṣaṇḍādīnāṃ kāmaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:9768: yannarakādau pāpākuśalopapattyāyatane yathopapattyāyanañca na mārgaṃ bhāvayati |
XXhvsatssu:9770: (pṛ) kecit pūrvaṃ vidyāvihīnebhyaḥ pūrvapuruṣebhyo na prajānanti idaṃ kuśalamiti |
XXhvsatssu:9771: tadā te na dadanti yat sa yadi matto dānaṃ labdhvā akuśalāni karoti tadā ahaṃ bhāgī syāmiti
XXhvsatssu:9787: kūṭamānādayaḥ kuhanāyāḥ pratyayāḥ iti kretāraḥ pāpinaḥ syuḥ |
XXhvsatssu:9788: pratigrahītā dānasya pratyaya iti puṇyabhāk syāt |
XXhvsatssu:9789: ye kūpataṭākādyupabhoktāraḥ te sarve puṇyabhājaḥ syuḥ |
XXhvsatssu:9790: tathā ca svasya puṇyaṃ na syāt |
XXhvsatssu:9800: bhūyasā te trividhaviṣakaluṣitacittāḥ pañcakāmaguṇāsaktā na vyavasyanti kuśalabhāvanām |
XXhvsatssu:9803: brāhmaṇādaya ātmānaṃ sujanabhāvitadharmacaya iti kīrtayanto na samyak paśyanti samāpatticittasamādhānāni dharmān |
XXhvsatssu:9805: ato dātā avītarāgāya dadan pāpabāhulyaṃ labheta |
XXhvsatssu:9806: janāḥ pitṝn pūjayantaḥ putrabhāryābandhūn samārādhayantaḥ [yadi] jñātvā vijānanti sarve pāpaṃ prāpayeyuriti |
XXhvsatssu:9815: ataḥ puṇyārthī punaḥ prāṇinaṃ hanyāt, na śīlaṃ dhārayet |
XXhvsatssu:9823: ghanikatvahetoḥ kṛtānāṃ pāpānāmapi dātā bhāgī syāt |
XXhvsatssu:9824: tathā ca brāhmaṇā na dānaṃ pratigṛhṇīyuḥ |
XXhvsatssu:9826: idānīntu brāhmaṇāḥ kevalaṃ pratigṛhṇanti na prayacchanti |
XXhvsatssu:9827: ato jñāyate sa duṣṭaḥ panthā iti |
XXhvsatssu:9828: (SSS_255) yathā ca rājāno yathādharmaṃ prajāḥ pālayantaḥ pāpino 'pi syuḥ |
XXhvsatssu:9839: avītarāga āsvādābhiniviṣṭa ityato dātā pāpī syāt
XXhvsatssu:9840: | tathā ca dātā, tvadannaṃ bhuktvā nākuśalaṃ kariṣyāmīti bhoktāraṃ sadā
XXhvsatssu:9843: (pṛ) nanu sūtre 'pyuktam- yadi bhikṣurdānapaterannaṃ bhuktvā cīvarañca paridhāyāpramāṇasamādhimupasampadya viharati tatpratyayāt sa dānapatirapramāṇapuṇyaṃ prasūta iti |
XXhvsatssu:9844: tatpratyayena puṇyalābhī cet kathaṃ na pāpabhāk bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:9845: (u) yadi sa bhikṣurdānapaterannaṃ bhuktvā cīvarañca paridhāyāpramāṇasamādhimupasampadya viharati |
XXhvsatssu:9852: na tu pratigrahītuḥ puṇye pāpe vā dātā bhāgaṃ labhate |
XXhvsatssu:9853: ato na tatpuṇyapāpapratyayena dātā puṇyapāpabhāk bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:9855: tathāpi svaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā svakṛtatrividhakarmāpekṣya bhavati
XXhvsatssu:9856: (pṛ) avītarāgasya cittaṃ na svavaśavarti, avaśyaṃ kāmāsaktam |
XXhvsatssu:9858: (u) tathā cet pravrajinaḥ śīlādin dhṛtvā sapuṇyo bhavatīdamupekṣitaṃ syāt |
XXhvsatssu:9865: tāni hi karmāṇi hetukāla eva vāryāṇi |
XXhvsatssu:9867: | ato buddhā [bhagavanto] hetukāla eva vinayāya dharmamupadiśanti |
XXhvsatssu:9889: yena karmaṇā savyābādhye loke yathāvaivartinaraka upapadyate |
XXhvsatssu:9891: 'kuśala vipākāyatane samupapadyate yadi vā tiryañca ekatyāḥ pretā vā |
XXhvsatssu:9893: yena karmaṇā avyābādhye loka upapadyate yathā rūpārūpyadhātvoḥ kāmadhātau ca devā manuṣyā ekatyāḥ |
XXhvsatssu:9896: 'vyābādhye ca loke yadi vā tiryañcaḥ pretā devā manuṣyā ekatyāḥ |
XXhvsatssu:9898: yat karmalokadvayavigarhitaṃ iha vigarhitamamutra ca vigarhitam |
XXhvsatssu:9899: tat pāpaṃ karma puruṣaḥ kṛtvā tamasi patitaḥ san na yaśaḥ śrutavān bhavatīti kṛṣṇamityucyate
XXhvsatssu:9907: akuśalakriyā ca gurujaneṣu yanmātāpitṛṣu anyeṣu sajjaneṣu ca |
XXhvsatssu:9908: sattvānāmahitaṃ kṛtvā na kiñcidapi kṛpāṃ karoti |
XXhvsatssu:9909: yathā sattvān hanti samastaṃ taddhanaṃ vāpaharati |
XXhvsatssu:9925: tṛtīyaṃ karma durbalaṃ kuśalākuśalavyāmiśratvāt tadvipākaṃ yugapatpratisaṃvedayate |
XXhvsatssu:9927: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- yadakuśalaṃ karma durgatau vipākapratisaṃvedakaṃ tadādyaṃ karma |
XXhvsatssu:9929: yat kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ devamanuṣyeṣu vyāmiśravipākapratisaṃvedakaṃ tat tṛtīyaṃ karma
XXhvsatssu:9935: sa savyābādhyaṃ kāyasaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtya savyābādhyaṃ vāksaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtya savyābādhyaṃ manaḥsaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtya savyābādhye loke utpadyate |
XXhvsatssu:9936: tatra savyābādhye loka utpannaṃ santaṃ savyābādhyāḥ sparśāḥ spṛśanti iti |
XXhvsatssu:9937: ato jñāyate yat sattvānāṃ kṛṣṇaduḥkhalokotpādakaṃ tadādyaṃ karmeti |
XXhvsatssu:9940: yathoktaṃ sūtre- sukhināṃ manuṣyāṇāmapi santi ṣaṭ sparśā iti |
XXhvsatssu:9941: devamanuṣyairanubhūyamānā viṣayā yena amanorūpā na bhavanti tat dvitīyaṃ karma |
XXhvsatssu:9963: loke ślādhyataraṃ sāsravaṃ kuśalaṃ karma śuklamityucyate |
XXhvsatssu:9971: yadi dṛṣṭa eva dharme vedyate tadā savyābādhavipāko laghurbhavati |
XXhvsatssu:9972: tasya gurutvātkrameṇa kṣipraṃ vā avaivartike narake patati |
XXhvsatssu:9973: trīṇyānantaryāṇi puṇyakṣetraguṇagauravādānantaryāṇītyucyante yaduta saṅghabhedaḥ tathāgataśarīre duṣṭacittena lohitotpādanamarhadvadhaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:9978: (pṛ) anyeṣāmāryajanānāṃ vadha ānantaryaṃ labhate na vā |
XXhvsatssu:9981: yastathāgataṃ tāḍayati na tu lohitamutpādayati sa gurutaraṃ pāpaṃ labhate |
XXhvsatssu:9986: tadā ekasminneva kāye vipākavedanā kṣīyate na vā |
XXhvsatssu:9991: yadyadharmamadharmato jñātvā imaṃ dharmaṃ dharmato jānāti |
XXhvsatssu:9995: yat kaścit buddhātsaṅghaṃ prabhidya ātmānaṃ praśaṃsati mahān śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ pūjya iti
XXhvsatssu:10006: kecidāhuḥ imāni pañca bhikṣuśatāni pūrvādhvani parān vighnayantaḥ kuśalamūlamārgalabdhāstatpratyayamidānīṃ tadvipākaṃ vindanta iti |
XXhvsatssu:10039: ato madyapānaṃ yaḥ śāsti sa pāpāṅgaṃ labhate |
XXhvsatssu:10053: narakavedanīyavipākaṃ karmeti (SSS_260) yathā ṣaṭpādābhidharme lokaprajñaptau vistṛtam
XXhvsatssu:10056: sūtre- yaḥ prāṇātipātanirataḥ sa naraka utpadyate |
XXhvsatssu:10062: bhavāṃstu kevalamāha narakeṣu manuṣyeṣu votpadyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:10063: idānīṃ viśiṣya vaktavyaṃ kiṃ karma narakavipākamātravedakamiti |
XXhvsatssu:10069: śīlabhedinā dṛṣṭibhedinā ca kṛtamakuśalaṃ karma narakāya bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:10077: yathā kaścidakuśalaṃ karma kṛtvā paścātprīyā praśaṃsan na parityaktumicchati |
XXhvsatssu:10086: akuśalasvabhāvena janena kṛtaṃ pāpakarma narakāya bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:10088: sadākuśala karmacāriṇā kṛtamakuśalaṃ karma narakāya bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:10094: yaḥ kāyena śīlaṃ manasā ca prajñāṃ nābhyasyati |
XXhvsatssu:10107: sa gurukaṃ pāpakarma kṛtvā narakavipākaṃ vedayate |
XXhvsatssu:10108: yaḥ pāpaṃ kṛtvā na kuśalaṃ pratiśrayate |
XXhvsatssu:10116: sa duṣparipācanamāhāraṃ bhuṅktvā na paripaktuṃ śaknoti |
XXhvsatssu:10118: yathā kaściccauryaṃ kṛtvā laghutaraṃ gurutaraṃ vā badhyate |
XXhvsatssu:10119: yaḥ sarvakuśalamūlaviviktaḥ yathā hastinā yudhyamānaḥ [tasya] hastaṃ na parirakṣati |
XXhvsatssu:10128: | gaṇḍasyāntaḥ srāvavat pāpasya mrakṣaṇe narakaṃ bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:10129: yo dīrghakālaṃ cittagatamakuśalaṃ na sahasā niyacchati |
XXhvsatssu:10131: yathā cikitsāyai dattaṃ viṣameva puruṣaṃ hanti |
