XXhvsatssu:11042: akuśalakarmacaryā yadyapīdānīṃ nābhivyajyate vipāke tu adhyavasīyate |
XXhvsatssu:11045: yathā vā ṛṇamalpamapi krameṇa vṛddhyā vardhate |
XXhvsatssu:11046: parasya kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ paraḥ sadā na vismarati |
XXhvsatssu:11054: akuśalakarmaphalāt vihāyasā gatvā samudre nimajyāpi na vimuktisthānaṃ labhate |
XXhvsatssu:11058: uktañca sūtre- pramādaḥ śatruvatkuśaladharmān hanti iti |
XXhvsatssu:11060: kiñcākuśalaṃ karma buddhabodhisattvairarhadbhirāryaiḥ pañcabhijñairmaharṣibhiḥ puṇyapāpavedibhiravigītaṃ na bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:11062: paśyāmaḥ khalu pratyakṣamakuśalacittavaipulya eva bhāvavyāmohavikṣepopāyāsādhiduḥkhairvikṛtamukhavarṇaḥ pumānaprīto dṛśyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:11066: 119 trikarmagauravalāghavavargaḥ triṣu karmasu kiṃ gurutaraṃ- kiṃ kāyikaṃ karma, vācikaṃ karma kiṃ vā mānasaṃ karma |
XXhvsatssu:11073: yathā kaścidimaṃ sattvaṃ hanmīti cittamutpādya kāyavāgbhyāṃ tatkarma sādhayati |
XXhvsatssu:11084: mānasaṃ karma mahattaramiti cet [tadā] dānapuṇyaṃ labheta |
XXhvsatssu:11091: ācaritā kasmāt sulabhamidaṃ karma tyaktvā durācaraṇaṃ dānādikarma kuryāt |
XXhvsatssu:11109: | yadi mānasaṃ karma mahattaram, prāṇātipātacikīrṣācittamutpādayan narake patet |
XXhvsatssu:11122: utpadyamānaṃ vijñaptikarma sarvaṃ kāyavacasā bhavati na mānasakarmaṇā |
XXhvsatssu:11123: yathā parapuruṣanindā avaśyaṃ vākkarmādhīnā mṛṣāvādapāpaṃ gamayati |
XXhvsatssu:11124: yatpūrvamuktaṃ caturbhiḥ pratyayaiḥ (SSS_282) prāṇātipātapāpaṃ labhate yaduta sattvasattā, sattvasattājñānaṃ, jighatsācittaṃ tajjīvitoccheda iti
XXhvsatssu:11127: yathā cāha bhagavān- yo bālaka ājanma karuṇāmabhyasyati |
XXhvsatssu:11128: sa kimakuśalaṃ karmotpādayituṃ śankoti akuśalaṃ karma cetayate vā iti |
XXhvsatssu:11129: ato jñāyate kāyikaṃ karmaivotpādayati na mānasaṃ karma iti |
XXhvsatssu:11131: yat bhavānāha- kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karmaiva gurutaraṃ na mānasam
XXhvsatssu:11136: cittaṃ dharmasya vai mūlaṃ cittaṃ prabhuśca kiṅkaraḥ |
XXhvsatssu:11137: śubhāśubhaṃ tatsmarati vacanaṃ caraṇañca tat || iti |
XXhvsatssu:11141: vinā cittaṃ nāsti kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karma |
XXhvsatssu:11142: sūtre vacanācca vijñaptikarma kṛtvā niyamena vipākaṃ vedayate |
XXhvsatssu:11148: yathāha sūtram- purāhaṃ saptavarṣāṇi karuṇāsamudācaraṇānneemaṃ lokaṃ saptamahākalpān pratinivartāmīti
XXhvsatssu:11160: āha- yo lokottarāṃ samyagdṛṣṭimutpādayati sa varṣaśatasahasyāṇi saṃsāre
XXhvsatssu:11163: yathoktamupālisūtre- tīrthiko maharṣiḥ [āgatya vadet] ekena manodaṇḍena nālandaṃ bhasmīkaromīti iti |
XXhvsatssu:11166: yathoktaṃ (SSS_283) sūtre- yo 'yamatra mṛtaḥ sa eva narakaṃ praviśati |
XXhvsatssu:11173: yanmanasā kāyaṃ vācañca niśritya kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā carati tatkāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karmetyucyate
XXhvsatssu:11175: na tu vinā mānasaṃ karma kāyikasya vācikasya vā vipākaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:11176: ato jñāyate mānasaṃ karma gurutaraṃ na kāyikaṃ vācikam |
XXhvsatssu:11178: yadbhavatoktaṃ kāyikavācikakarmaṇorniyamena satyatvāt yathā pañcānantaryāṇi kāyaṃ vāca[ñcopādāya] kriyanta ityato gurutarāṇīti |
XXhvsatssu:11180: yasmāt cetanā gurvī vastu ca guru tasmātkarma guru |
XXhvsatssu:11183: yathā cittabalamātreṇa saddharmapadaṃ praviśati tathā cittabalenaiva cānantaryapāpaṃ sampādayati
XXhvsatssu:11186: uktaṃ bhavatā kāye vāk ca karma vastu niṣpādayatīti |
XXhvsatssu:11193: yaduktaṃ bhavatā- vṛthācittotpādamātreṇa nāsti vipāka iti
XXhvsatssu:11198: yaduktaṃ bhavatā- nāpi praṇidhānamātreṇa vastu sādhayatīti |
XXhvsatssu:11204: yathāha bhagavān- santi vividhāni pāpāni kāyikavācikamānasapāpānīti |
XXhvsatssu:11210: yaduktaṃ bhavatā puṇyaṃ pāpañca sulabhaṃ syāditi |
XXhvsatssu:11212: cittabalasya tanutvāt janāḥ sulabhaṃ tyaktvā durlabhaṃ kurvanti |
XXhvsatssu:11216: sattvā avarajñānabalāḥ karuṇādi mānasaṃ karma carituṃ na samarthā ityato
XXhvsatssu:11221: sa yadi bodhibalayuktaḥ tadā akṣīṇaṃ kuśaladharmaṃ labhetaiva |
XXhvsatssu:11222: yaduktaṃ mānasaṃ karma na kasyacidupakaroti apakaroti vā iti |
XXhvsatssu:11229: yathā kalpādau taṇḍulāni svayamutpadyante puruṣāṇāṃ daśavarṣāyuḥkāle prāpte tatsarvaṃ nābhūta
XXhvsatssu:11256: yathāha sūtrama- śīlavrataḥ prāṇihitaṃ mano 'nuyāyi bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:11267: yasya mānasaṃ karmāviśuddham, tasya śīlamapi aviśuddham |
XXhvsatssu:11271: tat sāmānyataḥ pratyuktaṃ yaduta kāyikavācikakarmadharmabhede mānasakarmadharmabhedaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:11272: kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karma avaśyaṃ vijñāpayitrā sidhyati |
XXhvsatssu:11273: yathā caturbhiḥ pratyayaiḥ siddhaṃ prāṇātipātapāpaṃ na mānasakarma vinā bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:11274: laukikāḥ satvā vadanti kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karmākuśalaṃ na tathā mānasamiti |
XXhvsatssu:11275: mānasaṃ karma ca na janeṣūpaprayujyate nāpyupalabhyate 'stīti |
XXhvsatssu:11277: tallakṣaṇatvānmānasaṃ karmaiva gurutaraṃ na kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ vā ||
XXhvsatssu:11295: ato vaktavyaṃ kāraṇaṃ kathaṃ jñāyate karmata utpadyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:11298: padārthā nānāviprakīrṇajātaya iti jñātavyaṃ heturapi bhidyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:11299: yathā paśyāmaḥ alakasandukakodravādīnāṃ bhedaḥ tadbījamasamaṃ jñāpayati iti |
XXhvsatssu:11302: kiñca sajjanāḥ śraddhadhante yat karmopādāya kāya upādīyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:11307: yadi karmopādāya śarīramupādīyate tadā tat nivartanīyam |
XXhvsatssu:11312: īśvarādīnāṃ kāraṇatve tu na nivartayituṃ śakyate |
XXhvsatssu:11322: paśyāmaḥ khalu pratyakṣaṃ padārthāḥ karmasambhūtā iti |
XXhvsatssu:11326: ato jñāyate karmataḥ śarīramupādīyate na maheśvarādibhya iti |
XXhvsatssu:11327: laukikāḥ svayaṃ jānanti padārthāḥ karmahetasambhūtā iti |
XXhvsatssu:11332: ato jñāyate karmato vipāko labhyata iti
XXhvsatssu:11333: | janā īśvarādīn kāraṇaṃ vadanto 'pi karmāṇi niśrayante yaduta svadehaṃ khedayanta upavāsādīn svīkurvanti ca |
XXhvsatssu:11336: sarve cāryāḥ śīlādikuśaladharmān niśrayante yato jānanti karmahetorloko 'stīti |
XXhvsatssu:11344: yathā upari vṛkṣe phalaṃ dṛṣṭvā jānanti vṛkṣastaddheturiti |
XXhvsatssu:11346: durgatau mohādayaḥ prabalā iti jñātavyaṃ kleśāḥ durgatikāraṇam |
XXhvsatssu:11355: sajjānānāṃ citte yadyakuśalamutpadyate tadaiva prayatnena nigṛhyate |
XXhvsatssu:11358: tathā nocet yatheṣṭaṃ kuryaḥ idameva paramaṃ sukhamiti |
XXhvsatssu:11359: tadā hatvā sattvānāṃ bhojanaṃ paradravyāpahāraḥ yadi vā parastrīgamanaṃ imānyapi sukhāni bhaveyuḥ
XXhvsatssu:11369: catussatyajñānāt satyāśrayāḥ kleśā na kadāpi punarudbhavanti |
XXhvsatssu:11374: yathā śuṣkabhūmau bīje ca dagdhe na sarvo 'ṅkuraḥ prarohati |
XXhvsatssu:11375: evaṃ vijñānasthitikṣetre tṛṣṇāsnehānabhiṣyandite karmabīje ca tattvajñānadagdhe nordhvadehāṅkuraḥ prarohati |
XXhvsatssu:11376: vidvānetadvastu prajñāya vijñānasthitikṣetraṃ śoṣayituṃ karma bījaṃ dagdhuñca vīryamadhiṣṭhāya prayatate |
XXhvsatssu:11377: ato jñāyate karma kāyopādānasya pratyaya iti ||
XXhvsatssu:11388: pāpadharma ityapi, parihāṇidharmaḥ tirobhāvadharma paritapanadharma anupatanadharma ityādināmnāpyucyate
XXhvsatssu:11395: yathoktaṃ sūtre- kāmatṛṣṇā bhavatṛṣṇā vibhavatṛṣṇā iti |
XXhvsatssu:11397: sattvā duḥkhābhihatā skandhakāyaṃ parijihīrṣavo vibhavaṃ sukhaṃ manyante |
XXhvsatssu:11399: yathoktaṃ sūtre- aihikaṃ saumanasyamāmuṣmikaṃ saumanasyaṃ ihalaukikasukhavedanā āmuṣmikasukhavedanā ityarthamabhidadhāti iti |
XXhvsatssu:11400: kiñcāha- aihikaṃ daurmanasyamāmuṣmikaṃ daurmanasyaṃ ihalaukikaduḥkhavedanā āmuṣmikaduḥkhavedanā
XXhvsatssu:11414: yathoktaṃ sūtre- samudayasatyaṃ yaduta tarṣaṇaṃ iti |
XXhvsatssu:11428: (pṛ) yadi tarṣaṇamapi nandiḥ, rāgo 'pi nandiḥ kasmāducyate rāgaṃ
XXhvsatssu:11435: uktañca sūtre- nirodhaṃ varjayitvā rāgo daurmanasyañca sarve 'kuśalā dharmā iti |
XXhvsatssu:11438: yathocyate dveṣo daurmanasyamiti tadā jñāyate nandiḥ rāga ityupyucyata iti
XXhvsatssu:11439: | ato 'ṣṭādaśamanaupavicāreṣu na kleśā ucyante kevalaṃ vedanā ucyante |
XXhvsatssu:11445: tṛtīyavedanāyāmucyate pṛthagjanā asyā vedanāyā na jānanti samudayaṃ, na jānanti nirodhaṃ, na jānanti āsvādaṃ, na jānanti ādīnavaṃ na jānanti nissaraṇam |
XXhvsatssu:11448: ime pṛthagjanāḥ sadā pañcadharmān tān na jānantītyato
XXhvsatssu:11458: saptānuśayānāmaṅgaṃ dvidhā bhavati- kāmarāgo bhavarāga iti |
XXhvsatssu:11463: asati rāge na janma bhavati ityataḥ pṛthagucyate bhavarāga iti |
XXhvsatssu:11469: pradarśayati ca bhagavān tatra[āpi] bhavaḥ sūkṣmaḥ pravartata iti |
XXhvsatssu:11471: daśākuśalakarmapatheṣu caturṣu bandhaneṣu ca kāmarāga ityākhyā bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:11478: ayaṃ rāgo yadyadhamācaraṇaḥ tadā akuśalarāga ityākhyā |
XXhvsatssu:11481: yadyamṛtasattvasya māṃsabubhukṣā, yadi vā mātṛbhaginīsvasrācāryapatnīḥ pravrajitapatnīṃ svapatnīṃ vāmārgeṇa jigamiṣati |
XXhvsatssu:11488: bahudānasya bahudravyasya vā lipsā, sā bahurāgatā |
XXhvsatssu:11489: yadalpadravyasyālpadānaṃ labdhvā priyataraṃ kāmayate na tṛpyati |
XXhvsatssu:11494: ayañca rāgo dvividhaḥ kāmarāgaḥ upakaraṇarāga iti |
XXhvsatssu:11504: tisṛṣu vedanāsu rāgo 'sti sukhavedanāyāmasti lipsārāgaḥ, tatparipālanarāgaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:11509: yathā kaścit anena vastunā duḥkhito vastvantaraṃ paryeṣate |
XXhvsatssu:11510: yathoktam- sukhī na paryeṣate duḥkhī tu bahu paryeṣate |
XXhvsatssu:11529: tadyathā priyarūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā citte idaṃ [priya]miti vacanaṃ karoti |
XXhvsatssu:11544: yadi vā tadrūpe yadi vākāre yadi vā sparśe yadi vā subhāṣite [mithyāmanaskāramutpādayati]
XXhvsatssu:11561: tadyathā gṛdhro vā kaṅko vā iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:11562: aśucyādi vilokya apratihatālambanasya kāmarāgo vegaṃ labhate |
XXhvsatssu:11565: strīrūpādyalambane prīto nimittaṃ gṛhṇāti paricchedañca gṛhṇāti |
XXhvsatssu:11575: kāmarāgasya hitāsvādamātraṃ dṛṣṭvā tadānīnavamajānataḥ kāmarāga utpadyate
XXhvsatssu:11576: | ṛtunā ca kāmarāga utpadyate yathā vasantādayaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:11577: sthānavaśena ca kāmarāga utpadyate yathā kiñcitsthānaṃ yatra cirādārabhya kāmacāro bahuśo 'bhyastaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:11583: śubhān manohāriṇaḥ pañcakāmaguṇān yaduta supuṣpitasarārāmaprasannasnigdhavāpīkūpanavameghataṭitsurabhivātavyajanāni labdhavataḥ, pakṣiṇāṃ kalaravaṃ strīṇāṃ sukumārabhūṣaṇarutāni subhāṣitāni vā śṛṇvataḥ kāmarāga utpadyate |
XXhvsatssu:11592: alabdhacittasamādhānasya antaḥ sattvaṃ paśyato bahiḥ rūpādi paśyataśca kāmarāgo bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:11598: (pṛ) kāmarāgasya ke doṣāḥ santīti kāmaḥ prahātavyaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:11617: vidyamānāni duḥkhāni bhikṣavaḥ kasmādbhavantīti manasikṛtvā jānīdhvaṃ
XXhvsatssu:11631: tathā rāgyapi nīrase kāme mithyāviparyāsabalena manyate yadidaṃ rasāsvādamiti |
XXhvsatssu:11636: sattvānāṃ kāmarāgapratyayaṃ sukhamalpaṃ duḥkhaṃ bahu kena kim [syāt] |
XXhvsatssu:11637: kāmatṛṣṇāvān sukhahetoḥ sarvaduḥkhānyanubhavati yadutārjanakāle duḥkhaṃ rakṣaṇakāle duḥkhamupabhogakāle 'pi duḥkham |
XXhvsatssu:11638: yathā kṛṣivāṇijyasaṃgrāmarājasevāparicaryādīni arjane duḥkhaṃ hānabhītyā rakṣaṇe
XXhvsatssu:11640: iṣṭasaṅgame prītiralpā virahe ca duḥkhaṃ bahu |
XXhvsatssu:11648: kleśā rāgamupādāya bhavanti yathā kāmarāgāt kleśāḥ sarve samudbhavanti |
XXhvsatssu:11653: yathā kṛṣṇaśuklā gauḥ svayamabaddhā rajjunā paramabaddhā |
XXhvsatssu:11654: evaṃ cakṣurna rūpabaddhaṃ, rūpañca na cakṣurbaddham, kāmarāgastu tatra baddhaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:11657: avidyānīvaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ tṛṣṇāsaṃyojanānāṃ sandhāvatāṃ saṃsaratām iti |
XXhvsatssu:11658: api coktaṃ sūtre- rāgaprahāṇādrūpaṃ prahīyate yāvadvijñānaṃ prahīyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:11667: kāmarāgaḥ sadā kusumāramukhataḥ samudācaratītyataḥ paramamakuśalaṃ nāma |
XXhvsatssu:11670: sa kāmarāgo nānākāraṇaiḥ puruṣāṇāṃ cittaṃ badhnāti yaduta mātṛpitṛsvasṛbhaginīpatnīsaṃjñā dhanādayaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:11678: yathā rūpāṇāmāsvādādhyavasānamityuktaṃ yaduta rūpaṃ pratītyotpadyate sukhaṃ saumanasyam |
XXhvsatssu:11684: yasmāt sattvāḥ kāmaḥ sukhaṃ dhyānaṃ sukhaṃ samāpattiḥ sukhamiti saṃrajyante |
XXhvsatssu:11687: yathoktaṃ- yasya vairāgyaṃ sa paramaṃ sukhamanuprāpnoti iti |
XXhvsatssu:11688: kiñcāha- yaḥ sarvasukhalābhamicchati tena sarvāṇi kāmasukhāni tyaktavyāni |
XXhvsatssu:11694: yasya cittaṃ rāgatṛṣṇāviviktaṃ tasya sarve duḥkhopāyāsā niruddhāḥ |
XXhvsatssu:11701: unmattavat pramattavacca na jānāti kurūpaṃ surūpam |
XXhvsatssu:11704: kāmarāgo na vijānāti dharmaṃ andhatamasi ajñānavat |
XXhvsatssu:11712: yathoktabhāvanāyogī so 'yaṃ tarati vai tadā || iti |
XXhvsatssu:11721: kāmarāgabahulaḥ strīrūpakusumagandhamālanṛttavādyagīteṣu pramudito veśyāgṛhapānagoṣṭhīgāmī mahāsamājanāṭakarasikaḥ sānurāgālāpānanditaḥ sadā paritoṣitacittaḥ prasannavadanaḥ sākūtasakākusasmitābhilāṣī durlabhakopaḥ sulabhapramodo bhūyasā dayālucittaḥ punaḥ punarvyādhitacapalagātraḥ svadehādhyāsakta ityevamādi rāgabahulasya lakṣaṇam |
XXhvsatssu:11728: [bhikṣavo] devamanuṣyā rūparāgino rūpamuditā rūpavipariṇāme duḥkhacittā viharanti iti |
XXhvsatssu:11730: bhagavān tatra tatra sūtre nānādṛṣṭāntairimaṃ kāmarāgaṃ garhayati yaduta [āśī] viṣopamaḥ,
XXhvsatssu:11754: (u) yaḥ sarvamanityamiti prajānāti na tasya kāmarāgo 'sti |
XXhvsatssu:11756: anityasaṃjñā [bhikṣavaḥ] bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā tadā sarvaḥ kāmarāgaḥ paryādīryate sarvaḥ rūparāgaḥ paryādīryate sarvo bhavarāgaḥ paryādīryate sarvāvidyā paryādīryate sarvo 'smimānaḥ paryādīryate samuddhanyate iti |
XXhvsatssu:11757: yaḥ paśyati loko duḥkhaṃ duḥkhahetuḥ rāga iti |
XXhvsatssu:11759: yo nityaṃ smarati mayā jātijarāvyādhimaraṇānyanubhavitavyānīti sa imaṃ rāgaṃ prajahāti |
XXhvsatssu:11766: kuśalapratyayasampannasya kāmarāgaḥ prahīyate yaduta śīlaviśuddhyā dīnyekādaśasamādhyupakaraṇānīti paścānmārgasatye vakṣyate |
XXhvsatssu:11773: yathā jñāyate rūgṇasya trivastusampannasya tasminneva samaye vyādhiḥ śāmyati iti |
XXhvsatssu:11774: (pṛ) yathoktaṃ sūtre- aśubha[bhāvanayā] rāgaṃ nirvāpaya iti |
XXhvsatssu:11775: kasmāt bhavān bravīti aśubhādi anityatādi ca |
XXhvsatssu:11778: ādau aśubhayā rāgo vāryate paścādanityatājñānena prahīyate |
XXhvsatssu:11793: kaścit dveṣī parān nindituṃ daṇḍena tāḍayituñcecchati |
XXhvsatssu:11806: kaścit dveṣī sahasā kiñcit gṛhītvā nānākāraṇai[rna] tyaktumicchati |
XXhvsatssu:11811: kaścit dveṣī hitalābhinaṃ paraṃ dṛṣṭvā citte mātsaryamutpādayati |
XXhvsatssu:11813: kaścit dveṣī sadā kalahapriyo dhṛṣṭamanovāg bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:11816: kaścit dveṣī ciramātsaryeṇa śīlamupadiṣṭo 'pi punaḥ pratilomayati |
XXhvsatssu:11819: kaścit dveṣī kiñcidabhīṣṭasya amanaḥprahlādanasya vastuno lābhe kṣubhitacitto bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:11822: kaścit dveṣī asukumāravacanaḥ sadā bhrukuṭilālaso na manaḥ pūrvamālāpaṃ yojayati |
XXhvsatssu:11828: kaścit dveṣī kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ satīrthyaṃ saṃspṛṣṭopāyāsaṃ karoti |
XXhvsatssu:11831: kaścit dveṣī sadā garhāprakaṭanaprīto vigītavastupriyaśca bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:11845: durjanasahavṛttyā vā vyāpāda utpadyate yathā saunikavyādhādayaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:11846: mandajñānabalādvā dveṣa utpadyate yathā vṛkṣāṇāṃ śākhopaśākhā vāteritā bhavanti |
XXhvsatssu:11847: cirasamupacitadveṣānuśayasya āniryātanabhāvaṃ dveṣa utpadyate saunikavyādhasarpāṇāmāgamādvā dveṣa utpadyate |
XXhvsatssu:11848: paradoṣānusmṛtipremṇā vā dveṣa utpadyata iti yathā navakleśeṣūktam |
XXhvsatssu:11850: jātyā vā dveṣa utpadyate yathā sarpādīnām |
XXhvsatssu:11858: (u) uktaṃ sūtre- dveṣaḥ kāmarāgād gurutaraṃ pāpam iti |
XXhvsatssu:11871: sattvāḥ sadā duḥkhinaḥ punardveṣeṇa pīḍitāḥ vraṇe prayuktakṣāravat |
XXhvsatssu:11872: kiñca sūtre bhagavān svayaṃ dveṣadoṣānāha- dveṣabahulaḥ kutsitaḥ kharvākāro
XXhvsatssu:11878: durvimokasulabhakopaḥ sadā vyāpādopanāhamudito vigrahabhūṣaṇāyudheṣu prīto durmitrapakṣapātī sajjanavidveṣī, janānāṃ bhīṣaṇāyātathyadhyānacintano 'lpahrayapatrapa ityevamādīni dveṣalakṣaṇāni imānyanyeṣāṃ vipriyakarāṇi |
XXhvsatssu:11886: (u) yaḥ paragarhādiduḥkhaṃ kṣamate sa kuśaladharmapuṇyaṃ labhate |
XXhvsatssu:11894: yo bhikṣuḥ kṣamāvān sa pravrajyādharmā syāt |
XXhvsatssu:11897: ya ākāraveṣābhyāṃ bhikṣuḥ bhinnavyavahāro dveṣacittasahagataśca na sa bhavyo bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:11901: dveṣakārī parān vyābādhituṃ kāmayānaḥ svātmānameva vyābādhate |
XXhvsatssu:11904: ato jñāyate dveṣo mahāntamātmāpakarṣaṃ karoti iti |
XXhvsatssu:11905: ataḥ prājñenātmano hitaṃ kartukāmena mahadduḥkhaṃ mahatpāpañcāpākurvatā kṣāntirācaritavyāḥ
XXhvsatssu:11907: (u) yo 'nityatāṃ bhāvayati bahulīkaroti pratibudhyate sarvadharmā kṣaṇikāḥ, nindako vedakaḥ sarvo 'pi kṣaṇika iti |
XXhvsatssu:11909: śūnyatācittasya samyak bhāvanayā kṣamamāṇa evaṃ cintayati dharmeṣu vatustaḥ śūnyeṣu ko nindakaḥ ko vā nindāvedaka iti
XXhvsatssu:11911: ahaṃ satyato doṣavān iti pūrvapuruṣāḥ satyaṃ vadanti, kasmāt dviṣāmi |
XXhvsatssu:11915: aśubhanindāṃ śṛṇvan evaṃ cintayet sarve lokā yathākarma vipākaṃ vedayante
XXhvsatssu:11929: mayā śabdasyāsya nimittagrahaṇādeva daurmanasyopāyāsāḥ sambhavanti ityahameva duṣṭaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:11931: kasmāt dveṣādīni pāpāni na sattvānāṃ doṣāḥ, sattvā vyādhisamutthāpitacittatvādanīśvarāḥ |
XXhvsatssu:11932: yathā bhūtacikitsako bhūtoccāṭanādhyavasito bhūtameva dviṣati na tu rogiṇam |
XXhvsatssu:11936: yathā nindāpaṭavo brāhmaṇādayo buddhaṃ vividhaṃ nindanti |
XXhvsatssu:11939: kiñcedaṃ cintayet lokā akuśabahulā ātmajīvitamahṛtvaiva kaṭukaṃ kurvanti |
XXhvsatssu:11943: yathā bhagavān bhikṣūn śāsti- kāye krakaceṇa vidīrṇe 'pi vedanā kṣantavyā |
XXhvsatssu:11946: nindāyāṃ labdhāyāṃ nirvedaṃ bhūyasā mātrayā suniśritamavagamyākuśalamācarati |
XXhvsatssu:11947: sa jānāti ca nindāyā akṣamā ante duḥkhaṃvipākavedanā ityevaṃ cintayan narake mā bhūt pāta iti gurvīmapi nindāṃ vedayate |
XXhvsatssu:11951: kṣānticāribhirbodhisattvaiḥ śakrādibhiśca labhyaṃ kṣāntibalaṃ śrūyate ca |
XXhvsatssu:11959: dharmāṇāṃ samavāyaḥ kevalaṃ prajñaptyā puruṣa ityucyate |
XXhvsatssu:11981: avidyā tu vikalpinīti na tarupāṣāṇayoḥ samānā |
XXhvsatssu:11983: yathā puruṣasya cakṣuṣā rūpādarśanaṃ nādarśanadharmo bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:11988: pañcaskandheṣu asti pudgala iti mithyākalpanā ghaṭaśakale ca suvarṇasaṃjñotpadyata iti kasmādbhavati
XXhvsatssu:11993: (pṛ) na vidyā avidyā iti cet idānīṃ vidyāṃ vihāya sarve
XXhvsatssu:12000: evamiyaṃ vidyā savikalpāpi yathābhūtaṃ na prajānātītyavidyetyucyate |
XXhvsatssu:12010: vidyāyā abhāvo 'vidyeti yathā vadanti loke- adho 'rūpadarśī, badhiro
XXhvsatssu:12012: viparītā vidyā avidyeti- yathā rātrau sthāṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā puruṣa iti buddhirbhavati |
XXhvsatssu:12020: arhato buddhadharmeṣu vidyā nāstīti vidyāvidyā syāt |
XXhvsatssu:12029: yathāha- kāmarāgī na dharmaṃ paśyati, kāmarāgī na puṇyaṃ paśyati iti |
XXhvsatssu:12034: ato jñāyate sarve kleśā avidyā iti |
XXhvsatssu:12039: ato jñāyate avidyāṅgāni sarve kleśā iti |
XXhvsatssu:12043: yathā asti dravyamastyavayavī asti cit, sarve dharmā akṣaṇikāḥ, nāsti punarbhavaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:12044: śabda ātmā, sa ca nityaḥ, tṛṇavṛkṣādayaḥ sacetanā ityevamādimithyāgrahe sati avidyotpadyate
XXhvsatssu:12054: puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā astīti buddheḥ pūrvameva puruṣamanaskāra utpadyate paścānniścaya ityato 'vidyetyucyate
XXhvsatssu:12072: pṛthagjanā vedayante [sukhata] imān skandhān pañca [ye] 'śucayo 'nityā duḥkhāḥ śunyā anātmakāḥ
XXhvsatssu:12073: ya āryāḥ te tān duḥkhān vedayante |
XXhvsatssu:12075: yathoktaṃ sūtre- ātmasaṃjñā mithyāviparyāsa iti prajānato na punarutpadyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:12080: tathā sattvā api dṛṣṭe 'lpāsvādagṛddhā bahūnādīnavān na pratīkṣante |
XXhvsatssu:12081: tīrthikagranthairutpannamithyādṛṣṭikā vadanti na santi puṇyādīni iti |
XXhvsatssu:12087: buddho bhagavān sarvajñaḥ śāstā trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samyak caryāviśuddha āryavinīta ityādi tīrthikā na vivicya prajānanti |
XXhvsatssu:12093: yathā kalpādau janā āsvādastuccha ityanabhijñāya [tatra] rāgādhyavasāyamutpādayāmāsuḥ |
XXhvsatssu:12095: ato jñātavyamavidyayā sarve lābhāḥ pramuṣitā iti |
XXhvsatssu:12103: | yathoktaṃ sūtre- avidyā pāpīyasī gurvī durvimokā ca iti |
XXhvsatssu:12109: karmaṇāmanupacayādvijñānādīnyaṅgāni na punaḥ prādurbhavanti ato jñāyate avidyā sarvaduḥkhānāṃ mūlamiti |
XXhvsatssu:12110: pratyakṣaṃ dṛśyate khalu asminnaśucikāya āsaṅgaḥ, anitye nityasaṃjñā ca |
XXhvsatssu:12112: yathā ca māyā mūḍhānāṃ puraḥ pradarśayati mṛdaṃ suvarṇamiti |
XXhvsatssu:12113: prākṛtā mūḍhā dṛṣṭe pāpādhiṣṭhitā abhidhānenollapanīyā bhavanti |
XXhvsatssu:12114: tathā lokā api cakṣuṣā aśuci dṛṣṭvā tadvañcitā bhavanti |
XXhvsatssu:12124: viparyayagrāhī priyamitre sadā pratikūlaḥ tucchavastuṣu sāragrāhī alpahrayapatrapo na vicikitsāpratīkṣī, na pareṣāṃ tarpaṇa ātmanāpi durniṣevaṇo mūḍho 'vijñātā sujīrṇamalinavastro bhramati |
XXhvsatssu:12126: ātmanaivātmānaṃ mahāniti ślāghamānaḥ parasya laghūkaraṇe tṛpyati |
XXhvsatssu:12132: viparyayato gṛhītvā [tatra] paramādhyāvasito durlabhamabhyasya suvinaśvaraṃ labhate |
XXhvsatssu:12141: avidyāyā bhaiṣajyaṃ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpādabhāvanā vā iti |
XXhvsatssu:12143: hetau bhrāntā vadanti- īśvarā dayo lokakāraṇamiti |
XXhvsatssu:12157: yathā ghaṭapadaṃ śṛṇvato manasi saṃśaya udeti kiṃ rūpādiḥ ghaṭaḥ kiṃvā rūpādivyatirikto 'nyo 'sti ghaṭa iti |
XXhvsatssu:12158: evaṃ pañcaskandhātmakaḥ puruṣaḥ kiṃ vā tadvyatirikto 'nyo 'sti
XXhvsatssu:12160: samāhitacittaḥ kāya evātmā kāyādanya ātmā iti śāśvatocchadākhye 'ntadvaye na patati |
XXhvsatssu:12161: yaḥ prajānāti ghaṭaḥ pratītyasamutpanno rūparasagandhasparśamaya iti |
XXhvsatssu:12166: nāma sarvamadhvabhāvi nāma bhūyo na vidyate |
XXhvsatssu:12167: ekadharmasya nāmno 'sya sarve dharmā vaśānugāḥ || iti |
XXhvsatssu:12171: api coktam- saṃskārāṇāṃ santatiṃ pañcaskandhānāṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ vadanti |
XXhvsatssu:12174: ukta ñca sūtre- yaḥ pratītyasabhutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharmaṃ paśyati |
XXhvsatssu:12175: yo dharmaṃ paśyati sa buddhaṃ (SSS_307) paśyatīti |
XXhvsatssu:12176: evaṃ yo nāmajaṃ saṃśayaṃ prajahāti so
XXhvsatssu:12180: saṃkṣepata uktaṃ caturaśītidharmaskandhe- yā kācana prajñā sarvā sāvidyāvyāvartinīti |
XXhvsatssu:12181: avidyā ca sarvakleśānāṃ mūlaṃ sarvakleśānāṃ sahakāriṇī cetyevaṃ pratītyasamutpāda [jñāne] avidyā prahīyate ||
XXhvsatssu:12199: ātmani rūpaṃ, rūpa ātmā iti darśanam, evaṃ yāvadvijñānamapi |
XXhvsatssu:12202: yathā sthaviraḥ kṣemaka āha- na khalvāyuṣman rūpamasmīti vadāmi, na vedanā, na saṃjñā, na saṃskārā, na vijñānam,
XXhvsatssu:12204: api ca ma āyuṣman pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu anusahagato 'smīti mānaḥ asmīticchandaḥ asmītyanuśayo 'samuddhataḥ |
XXhvsatssu:12210: 'lpāsvādalābhāt saṃyojanā nuśayaṃ vyāvartayati na punaścitte samudācarati
XXhvsatssu:12217: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo bhikṣuḥ kathayati ahaṃ samuddhatavicikitsaḥ pratilabdhamārga iti |
XXhvsatssu:12218: [tasya] purata evaṃ kathayet- atigabhīraḥ pratītyasamutpādo lokottaradharma iti |
XXhvsatssu:12222: adhimānini buddhā bhagavanto mahākāruṇikā api [taṃ] dūrīkṛtya na dharmāvavādaṃ kurvanti |
XXhvsatssu:12227: tathāyamapi buddhaśāsanārṇavagataḥ alpaṃ dhyānasukhaṃ pratilabhya pāramārthikamārga iti tatrāsaṅgaṃ janayati |
XXhvsatssu:12228: adhimānī ante maraṇakāle na mārgaṃ vedayate |
XXhvsatssu:12256: kaḥ prājña imamapekṣya ucco 'smīti [manyeta] evamādikāyānusmṛtipratyaye tu nāsti mānaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:12257: prājño jānāti sarve sattvā yadi vā daridrī yadi vā dhanī yadi vā pūjyo yadi vā jadhanyaḥ sarve
XXhvsatssu:12261: ābhyantaraṃ bāhyaṃ cittaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ sarvaṃ kṣaṇikamiti paśyato na bhavati mānaḥ
XXhvsatssu:12262: cittasamādhiñca samyak bhāvayato na bhavati mānaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:12266: kiñca prājñasya śīlādiṣu satsu na bhavati mānaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:12268: śīlādayo hi sarve eṣāṃ kleśānāṃ kṣayakarāḥ |
XXhvsatssu:12271: kaḥ prājño 'nityena duḥkhena aśucinā padārthena mānaṃ kuryāt |
XXhvsatssu:12275: yathāha bhagavān sūtre- yadāhaṃ māṇavako 'bhūvam, na tadā mānalakṣaṇamājñāsiṣam ahamiti vedanāvyākaraṇaṃ kutracidutpatsyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:12292: anena rāgeṇa labdho gotrādimānastu vipulaṃ vardhate |
XXhvsatssu:12298: (u) ayaṃ samupāttadhārṣṭyo duḥsahabhāṣaṇo 'satkāracitto 'lpabhayaḥ svairācāramuditaḥ svayañca mahāduḥśāsano yatkiñcijjadhanya[mapi]svayaṃ bahumānī,
XXhvsatssu:12304: śāstramāha- vicikitsā nāma tattvārthe buddhyaviniścaḥ kimasti vimuktiḥ kiṃ vā nāsti |
XXhvsatssu:12309: (pṛ) vṛkṣe saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ sthāṇuḥ kiṃ vā puruṣa iti |
XXhvsatssu:12310: mṛtpiṇḍe saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ mṛtpiṇḍaḥ uta kokila iti |
XXhvsatssu:12311: madhukare saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ madhukaraḥ kiṃ vā jambūphalamiti |
XXhvsatssu:12312: sarpe saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ sarpaḥ kiṃ vā rajjuriti |
XXhvsatssu:12313: ghoṭakamṛge saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ prabhā kiṃ vā salilaṃ iti |
XXhvsatssu:12315: dhvanau saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ mayūrakṛta uta manuṣyakṛta iti |
XXhvsatssu:12316: gandhe saṃśayo bhavati kimutpalagandhaḥ uta saṃparkagandha iti |
XXhvsatssu:12317: rase saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ māṃsarasa uta māṃsābhāsarasa iti |
XXhvsatssu:12318: sparśe saṃśayo bhavati kimautpattikatantava uta paripakvatantava iti |
XXhvsatssu:12320: yathā kimayaṃ dharmo dravyavān uta guṇamātram |
XXhvsatssu:12321: vimastyātmā uta na ityevamādayaḥ kiṃ saṃśayā na santi |
XXhvsatssu:12323: sthāṇurvā puruṣo va ityevamādibhistu na kleśā bhavanti |
XXhvsatssu:12324: na ca te punarbhavasya pratyayā bhavanti |
XXhvsatssu:12330: pūrvaṃ dvidhāvasthitaṃ padārthaṃ sthāṇuṃ puruṣañca dṛṣṭvā paścāddūrataḥ paśyati (SSS_311) puruṣādi vastu tadā saṃśeta sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti |
XXhvsatssu:12332: dvidhāśravaṇam- yadi kaścicchṛṇoti asti puṇyaṃ pāpamiti |
XXhvsatssu:12335: dvidhājñānam- yadā deve varṣati nadī samṛddhā bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:12343: adṛśyaṃ vastu yathā vṛkṣamūlaṃ pṛthivyāmadhastāt jala[sthaṃ]vā |
XXhvsatssu:12344: kiñcidavastu adṛśyañca yathā dvitīyaṃ śiraḥ tṛtīyo bāhuḥ |
XXhvsatssu:12352: vimate vastuni yāvadviśiṣṭalakṣaṇaṃ na paśyati tāvatsaṃśayo bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:12359: | yathā bodhisattvo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇo 'vadat vyavasāyena brāhmaṇalabdhaṃ gamīraṃ dharmamabhisametya pratyayān jānan paśyaṃśca prakṣīṇasaṃśayajālo
XXhvsatssu:12362: yathā jñānī saṃskārāṇāṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ śrutvā vijñāya ca nirdhāsyati saṃsāro
XXhvsatssu:12368: sandidghaḥ pumān na kāryaṃ karma karoti |
XXhvsatssu:12379: sa tamaso rāśistrividhaḥ atīto 'nāgataḥ pratyutpanna iti |
XXhvsatssu:12383: vinā bhagavacchāsanaṃ na samyaksamādhimān iti vaktuṃ śakyate |
XXhvsatssu:12386: aṣṭakādayaḥ pañcābhijñā maharṣayaḥ saṃśayālīḍhā vipannā iti |
XXhvsatssu:12387: saṃśayānasya dānādi kurvataḥ puṇyamavipākaṃ vā syādalpavipākaṃ vā |
XXhvsatssu:12390: tasya puruṣasya cittaṃ sadā vicikitsākaluṣitamityato nāsti kuśalam |
XXhvsatssu:12391: uktañca sūtre- vicikitsitacitto dānaṃ datvā pratyantabhūmau vipākaṃ vedayata iti |
XXhvsatssu:12407: na tasmin samaye cittaṃ nirdhārayati ayaṃ sthāṇurayaṃ puruṣa iti |
XXhvsatssu:12409: mithyādarśanādasti vā nāsti veti vicikitsanna śraddadhate |
XXhvsatssu:12414: samyadgarśanasambhavā śraddhā dṛḍhā bhavati śravaṇasambhavā tu naivaṃ bhavati ||
XXhvsatssu:12421: (pṛ) pañcasu skandheṣu ātmeti nāmakaraṇe ko doṣaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:12431: evaṃ bruvataḥ pañcaskandhā eva nityāḥ syuḥ |
XXhvsatssu:12433: tathā sati pañcaskandhā eka eva syuḥ |
XXhvsatssu:12438: ātmīye sati rāgadveṣādayaḥ sarve kleśāḥ samudbhavanti |
XXhvsatssu:12446: ima ātmakalpanayā kāyaśiraścakṣurhastapādasyaudārikaṃ vivekameva na labhante |
XXhvsatssu:12455: evaṃ pṛthagjanā yāvatpāmopahataṃ kāyaṃ prārthayamānā na nirvāṇāya prayante |
XXhvsatssu:12459: tuṣṭa āyuḥkṣaye bhoti rogasyāpagame yathā || iti |
XXhvsatssu:12460: ātmāstīti yo vadati sa mithyādṛṣṭau patati |
XXhvsatssu:12461: yadyātmā nityaḥ tadā sukhaduḥkhayorvikāro na syāt |
XXhvsatssu:12462: asati vikāre nāsti puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā |
XXhvsatssu:12465: svabhāvato vimuktasyāpi nāsti puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā |
XXhvsatssu:12470: yo nairātmyaṃ paśyati tasya yātāyātaṃ samucchidyate |
XXhvsatssu:12473: | (u) martyo devaḥ pumān strī iti nāmanimittaṃ śṛṇvataḥ saṃjñāvikalpādātmabuddhirutpadyate
XXhvsatssu:12475: hetvabhāvenātmabuddhirutpadyate yaduta yadyātmā nāsti kaḥ sukhaṃ sukhaṃ
XXhvsatssu:12485: tadyathā andha[kalpa]sya śakalādi labdhvā suvarṇamaṇisaṃjñā bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:12489: (pṛ) paśyāmaḥ khalu pratyakṣaṃ rūpakāye keśanakharomādyavayavān pratyekaṃ
XXhvsatssu:12501: aṇoraṇiyān mahato mahīyān ātmā guhāyāṃ nihito 'sya jantoḥ |
XXhvsatssu:12506: madhyamacetanā āhuḥ saṃjñā ātmā, sukhaduḥkhayoratītayorapi [tat] saṃjñāvadātmeti
XXhvsatssu:12521: vedanādaya ime rūpe pratibaddhā ityata ucyate rūpa[vān] ātmeti |
XXhvsatssu:12541: tadā eka eva pumān bahvātmā syāt |
XXhvsatssu:12542: rūpādīnāṃ saviśeṣatvāt vaktuṃ śakyaṃ rūpamevā na vedanādaya iti |

XXhvsatssu:12561: paramārthato nāstīti vadan saṃvṛtito 'stīti ca vadan antadvayaṃ parityajya madhyamāyāṃ pratipadi caratītyākhyāyate |
XXhvsatssu:12569: (pṛ) yo dharmaḥ paramārthato nāsti sa sutarāṃ nāstīti syāt |
XXhvsatssu:12571: (u) sarvairlaukikairvyavahriyate astīti yaduta karma karmavipāko yadi vā bandho yadi vā mokṣa iti |

XXhvsatssu:12578: puṇyapāpādikarmabhirbandho vā mokṣo vā na sidhyet |

XXhvsatssu:12589: uktañca sūtre- yaḥ sarvadharmān niḥsvabhāvān prajānāti sa śūnyatāyāmavatarati |

XXhvsatssu:12598: yadi vā tīrthikānāṃ vacanaṃ kāya eva
XXhvsatssu:12599: jīvaḥ, yadivānyaḥ kāyo 'nyo jīva itīdamekārthakaṃ, vyañjanameva nānā |
XXhvsatssu:12600: kāya eva jīvaḥ anyaḥ kāyo 'nyo jīva itīdaṃ vacane na brahmacaryaṃ bhavati

XXhvsatssu:12602: yaḥ pratiṣedha idaṃ jarāmaraṇamiti tat jarāmaraṇasya vyāvartanam |
XXhvsatssu:12607: kiñcoktaṃ rādhasūtre- rūpaṃ rādha yūyaṃ vikirata vidhamata vidhvaṃsata vikrīḍanakaṃ kuruta [tṛṣṇā]kṣayāya [pratipadyata]
XXhvsatssu:12616: yadā tu mahāvāte opūyate jalena vā pravāhitaḥ tadā vṛkṣasaṃjñā nirudhyate |
XXhvsatssu:12617: evaṃ yadā vidhvaṃsitāni vikrīḍanakaṃ kṛtāni vikīrṇāni vidhmātāni niruddhāni pañcaskandhalakṣaṇāni,
XXhvsatssu:12619: yathāha sūtram- rādha yūyaṃ [rūpaṃ] vidhvaṃsata vikrīḍanakaṃ kuruta vikirata vidhamata bhāgaśo
XXhvsatssu:12621: asmin sūtra uktam- pañcaskandhā anityāḥ sattvaśūnyāḥ na santīti |

XXhvsatssu:12625: dharmāḥ samucchidyante vā śāśvatā vā iti yadidaṃ vacanaṃ tadanta[graha]dṛṣṭirityucyate
XXhvsatssu:12626: kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ- yadā kaścidāha ātmā śāśvato vā aśāśvato veti iyamevāntagrahadṛṣṭiḥ na sarve dharmāḥ[śāśvatā vā aśāśvatā vā] iti |
XXhvsatssu:12636: asti ca nāsti ca karma paraṃ maraṇādityatra yadastīti sa śāśvata[vādaḥ]
XXhvsatssu:12639: (pṛ) ayaṃ caturtho graho na dṛṣṭiḥ syāt |

XXhvsatssu:12646: ātmā pūrvamakarot paścātkariṣyatīti yaddarśanaṃ sā śāśvatadṛṣṭiḥ ātmā pūrvaṃ nākarot paścānna kariṣyatītīyamucchedadṛṣṭiḥ |
XXhvsatssu:12647: api cāha mithyādṛṣṭisūtram- puruṣasya saptakāyāḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyavaḥ

XXhvsatssu:12682: ato jñāyate nocchedo na śāśvata iti |
XXhvsatssu:12683: kāyādanya upalabhyata ityato naikaḥ kāyena bhavati |

XXhvsatssu:12686: santānena pravṛttatvādanya iti na vaktuṃ śakyate |
XXhvsatssu:12688: (SSS_320) ime skandhāste skandhāścānya ityabhidhānāt śāśvatavādo na bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:12689: svasantānapratyayabalena pravartata ityata ucchedavādo na bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:12691: 132 mithyādṛṣṭivargaḥ vastutaḥ satsu dharmeṣu nāstīti cittotpādanaṃ mithyādṛṣṭiḥ |
XXhvsatssu:12692: yathā vadanti na santi catussatyāni trīṇi ratnānītyādi |
XXhvsatssu:12693: ūktañcasūtre- katamā bhikṣavo mithyādṛṣṭiḥ, nāsti dattaṃ nāstīṣṭaṃ, nāsti hutaṃ, nāstisukṛtaduṣkṛtānāṃ phalaṃ vipākaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:12694: nāstyayaṃ lokaḥ nāsti paro lokaḥ, nāsti mātā nāsti pitā,
XXhvsatssu:12695: na santi sattvā aupapātikāḥ, na santi śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ samyaggatāḥ samyak pratipannā ya imaṃ lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ svayamabhijñāya sākṣātkṛtya pravedayanti- kṣīṇā me jātiruṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ
XXhvsatssu:12698: iṣṭhaṃ iti vedokto devānāṃ kṛte yāgaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:12710: sattvānāṃ saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ jñānadarśanamajñānadarśanam- idaṃ sarvamahetukam |
XXhvsatssu:12715: tadyathā anitye nityasaṃjñā, duḥkhe sukhasaṃjñā, aśucau śucisaṃjñā, anātmani (SSS_321)
XXhvsatssu:12717: vyavadānamārge avyavadānamārgasaṃjñā, avyavadānamārge ca vyavadānamārgasaṃjñā, abhāve bhāvasaṃjñā, bhāve cābhāvasaṃjñā ityevamādīni
XXhvsatssu:12719: abhidharme yāḥ pañcadṛṣṭayaḥ brahmajālasūtre ca dvāṣaṣṭidṛṣṭayaḥ sarvā[stā] mithyādṛṣṭayo bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:12727: laukikāḥ padārthā ahetukā apratyayā iti yadvadanti |
XXhvsatssu:12728: yadi vā vadanti īśvarādihetukā na tṛṣṇāhetukā iti |
XXhvsatssu:12739: atha vā manyante buddhaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ pūjyo nāsti puruṣa ityato nāsti [sa] buddha iti draṣṭavyam
XXhvsatssu:12741: samyakcaryayā taddharmapratilābhino na santītyato nāsti saṅghaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:12746: kṛpaṇastu dhanika ityādibhiḥ nāsti kāraṇairvadanti dattamiti |
XXhvsatssu:12750: nāsti sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ, nāsti ca sukṛtaduṣkṛtānāṃ
XXhvsatssu:12752: yadi jīvo nityaḥ tadā nāsti sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtam |
XXhvsatssu:12754: nāsti paro loka ityato nāsti sukṛtaṃ
XXhvsatssu:12755: duṣkṛtaṃ, nāsti sukṛtaduṣkṛtānāṃ vipākaḥ, nāstyayaṃ loka iti |
XXhvsatssu:12758: maraṇātparaṃ na bhavati pratītyasamutpāda ityato vadanti nāsti paro loka iti |
XXhvsatssu:12763: ye mastakādayaḥ śarīrāvayavāḥ, na ta eva matāpitroḥ śarīrāvayavāḥ |
XXhvsatssu:12764: dharmāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvāt mātā pitā ca kiṃ karoti |
XXhvsatssu:12771: tadā cakṣuṣā paridṛśyamāno 'yaṃ kāyaḥ khanyamāno mṛdbhavati |
XXhvsatssu:12775: akāyātmaka ityayaṃ dvividho yadi cittātmako yadi vā cittavyatirikta iti |
XXhvsatssu:12785: sa kṣudhitaḥ sarvān dṛṣṭvā annaṃ prārthayate |
XXhvsatssu:12799: paśyāmaḥ khalu sarve sattvāḥ prajñaptikāraṇakā iti |
XXhvsatssu:12801: paśyāmaśca sarvān sattvān karmakāraṇatantrān na svatantrān |
XXhvsatssu:12802: ato vadanti nāsti balaṃ nāsti vīryaṃ
XXhvsatssu:12807: vadanti ca dharmā nirudhyamānāḥ punaḥ paramāṇavo bhavantīti |
XXhvsatssu:12823: asti punaḥ sattvo yena śucīkriyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:12826: skandhānāṃ santānena pravṛttiṃ dṛṣṭvā ekalakṣaṇaṃ gṛhṇāti |
XXhvsatssu:12832: brahmā svayamāha- ahamasmi mahābrahmā prabhurdevānāṃ kartā jagata ityevamādi |
XXhvsatssu:12835: kecitpunarāhuḥ - yadi kaścidviraktaḥ prathamadhyāna[mārabhya]yāvaccaturthadhyānamupasampadya viharati ayamutkṛṣṭa dharma iti |
XXhvsatssu:12841: kecittasmin anutkṛṣṭasaṃjñāmutpādya vadanti- ayaṃ kṣatriyaḥ alpakālikaśikṣāmārgaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:12842: buddhavacanañca na cāṭukāvya[vat] kleśagurukaṃ na vedasadṛśam |
XXhvsatssu:12851: [vyavadānamārga ākhyāyeta] īśvara [prasādena] ca viśuddhiṃ labhata iti ca vadanti |
XXhvsatssu:12854: punaḥ prayataḥ snātvā brahmayajñapaṭhanatadūrdhvabhojanaṃ viśuddhimārga iti |
XXhvsatssu:12857: yat dharmā lokasatyataḥ santo 'pi abhāva ityucyante |
XXhvsatssu:12858: abhāve bhāvasaṃjñeti yaducyate santi dravyāṇi astyavayavīti |
XXhvsatssu:12875: (u) sarve doṣā vipattivyasanāni ca mithyādṛṣṭyā bhavanti |
XXhvsatssu:12876: sa āha- nāsti pāpaṃ nāsti puṇyaṃ sukṛtaduṣkṛtānāṃ phalaṃ vipāka iti |
XXhvsatssu:12877: ato dṛṣṭadharma eva na santi suvṛttāni |
XXhvsatssu:12883: sa mithyādṛṣṭikaḥ puruṣaḥ lokadūṣakaḥ satvānāṃ bhūyasāpakārāya pravartate |
XXhvsatssu:12885: tena kṛtaṃ kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ mānasaṃ karma sarvamaśubhavipākāya bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:12887: [bhikṣavaḥ] puruṣapudgalasya yatkāyakarma yathādṛṣṭisamāttaṃ samādattaṃ yacca vākkarma........yacca manaḥkarma yā cetanā yā prārthanā yaḥ
XXhvsatssu:12888: praṇidhiḥ ye ca saṃskārāḥ sarve te 'niṣṭāya akāntāya amanāpāya ahitāya
XXhvsatssu:12890: tadyathā tiktakālābubījaṃ koṣātakībījaṃ picumandabījamādrāyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ nikṣiptaṃ yaccaiva pṛthivīrasamupādīyate yaccāporasaṃ tejorasaṃ vāyurasamupādīyate sarvaṃ tat tiktakatvāya kaṭukatvāya asātatvāya saṃvartate |
XXhvsatssu:12893: evameva mithyādṛṣṭikasya puruṣapudgalasya cittacaitasikā dharmā aniṣṭāya [akāntāya (SSS_325) amanāpāya ahitāya duḥkhāya] saṃvartate |
XXhvsatssu:12895: atastasya puruṣapudgalasya kṛtamapi dānādi neṣṭaphalaṃ bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:12900: asya puruṣapudgalasya nāsti sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtamityato na yataḥ kutaścitprativiratiḥ |
XXhvsatssu:12903: yaśca vadati nāsti sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ veti sa sadā citte 'kuśalameva kāṅkṣate |
XXhvsatssu:12913: tathā ca pudgalo madhyamadeśa utpanna iṣṭāniṣṭavivekāya ṣaḍindriyasampanno 'pi na mārgapratilābhapravaṇo
XXhvsatssu:12918: yathā karmavarge narakavimocakaṃ karma ityanena kāraṇena tatpuruṣakṛtaṃ sarvaṃ narakāya saṃvartate
XXhvsatssu:12919: na ca sa pāpakamakuśalaṃ karma kṣapayati |
XXhvsatssu:12923: | samucchinnakuśalamūlasya hi yadā kuśalaṃ na pravartate tadanantaraṃ narakānnaiva vimuktiḥ
XXhvsatssu:12924: citte mithyādṛṣṭikatvāt tasya kuśalamūlaṃ kathaṃ pravarteta |
XXhvsatssu:12932: 133 parāmarśadvayavargaḥ abhūtavastuni idameva satyamanyanmithyeti vacanaṃ dṛṣṭiparāmarśa
XXhvsatssu:12935: (u) sa puruṣo nyūnaguṇaṃ labdhvā ātmānaṃ pūrṇaṃ manyate |
XXhvsatssu:12944: yathāndho ghaṭaśakale suvarṇasaṃjñāmutpādya cakṣuṣmatāṃ laghu hāsyo bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:12946: yat kaścit bodhimupekṣamāṇaḥ snānādiśīlena viśuddhiprāptiṃ kāṅkṣate tat śīlavrataparāmarśa ityucyate |
XXhvsatssu:12953: [labdhvā] sampūrṇaṃ manyate ityādinā ta eva doṣāḥ |
XXhvsatssu:12960: govratikaḥ saṃsiddha[vrata]ḥ [kāyasya bhedātparaṃ maraṇāt] gavāṃ sahavyatāmupapadyate |
XXhvsatssu:12973: kasmāt ya ādito nācarati tasya mārgacaraṇaṃ sukaram |
XXhvsatssu:12975: śatrurapi (SSS_327) na tathā pudgalaṃ glapayati yathā mithyādṛṣṭiḥ |
XXhvsatssu:12977: na hi śatrustathā pudgalaṃ paribhāvayati yathā mithyādṛṣṭayanugāmināṃ tīrthikācaritānāṃ nānāduḥśīlānāṃ nagnatānirlajjatābhasmarajaḥkāyatākeśolluñcchanādīnāṃ samādānam |
XXhvsatssu:12981: | sukhaṃ prārthayitvā duḥkhaṃ labhamāno vimuktiṃ prārthayitvā bandhaṃ labhamānaḥ puruṣaḥ kiṃ na mattaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:12985: tasya puruṣasya mithyācāracāritvāt dānāya kāyajīvite satyapi na kiñcana hitaṃ bhavati ||
XXhvsatssu:12997: yadasantaṃ guṇaṃ khyāpayati tena janā vadanti astīti |
XXhvsatssu:12999: lābhasatkārāyādbhutaṃ prakhyāpya pareṣāṃ manaḥprahlādinī vāk lapanā |
XXhvsatssu:13000: paradravyalipsayā tallipsāmupagūhya vadati idaṃ vastu sundaramityādi |
XXhvsatssu:13002: yadetatpuruṣanindāyai anyaṃ stauti- tava pitā vyavasāyī
XXhvsatssu:13008: yat puruṣasya nidrāvyādhau niratiḥ sā tandrītyucyate |
XXhvsatssu:13010: yat puruṣasya kāyasya jṛmbhaṇā adamanaṃ styānamiddhasya pratyayaḥ sā vijṛmbhikā |
XXhvsatssu:13016: yo mahāmātrāṇāṃ vacanaṃ na satkaroti na bibheti |
XXhvsatssu:13028: trayaḥ kleśā sāvānāṃ cetasi bhūyasā vartante |
XXhvsatssu:13030: sarveṣāmavītarāgāṇāṃ maśakapipīlikāparyantānāmime trayaḥ kleśā eva cittavartinaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:13036: yasya nāsti mohaḥ na tasya rāgadveṣau |
XXhvsatssu:13039: santi ca tisra eva vedanā na punarasti caturthī |
XXhvsatssu:13040: āsu tisṛṣu vedanāsu trayaḥ kleśā anuśayā bhavanti
XXhvsatssu:13056: tadā [khalvasya] tatra bhavati nirvāṇasaṃjñā vā vimuktisaṃjñā vā aduḥkhāsukhasaṃjñā vā ātmasaṃjñā vā |
XXhvsatssu:13058: (pṛ) anuśayāḥ kiṃ dharme 'nuśerate ki vā sattve 'nuśerate |
XXhvsatssu:13083: ayamanuśayo yadi prahīṇo yadi vāprahīṇaḥ sa ālambanataḥ saṃprayogataśca |
XXhvsatssu:13088: ato jñāyate sattvamātre 'nuśayo na dharma iti |
XXhvsatssu:13099: sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgo 'nuśaya iti sūtroktaṃ virudhyeta |
XXhvsatssu:13101: vaktavyaṃ khalu sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ samutpanno rāgaḥ sattve 'nuśeta iti |
XXhvsatssu:13104: (u) saṃjñānusmaraṇavikalpaprītyādinā rāga utpadyate na tu rūpādimātrāt |
XXhvsatssu:13107: sukhī na prārthayate duḥkhī tu bahu prārthayate |
XXhvsatssu:13110: duḥkhasya pīḍanātmakatvāt puruṣasya sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāmeva rāga utpadyate |
XXhvsatssu:13115: ata ucyate sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgānuśaya iti |
XXhvsatssu:13116: tāsu triṣu vedanāsu trayaḥ kleśā anuśayā ityatastraya evocyante ||
XXhvsatssu:13119: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- traya āsravāḥ- kāmāsravo bhavāsravo 'vidyāsrava iti |
XXhvsatssu:13121: (u) kāmadhātāvavidyāṃ varjayitvā anye sarve kleśāḥ kāmāsravā
XXhvsatssu:13128: (pṛ) ime traya āsravāḥ; kathaṃ vadanti saptāsravā iti |
XXhvsatssu:13135: oghāḥ, catvāro bandhāḥ, catvāryupādānāni, catvāro granthā ityādi |
XXhvsatssu:13136: (pṛ) catvāra oghāḥ kāmaugho bhavaugho dṛṣṭyodho 'vidyaugha iti |
XXhvsatssu:13138: (u) dṛṣṭimavidyāñca varjayitvā tadanye kāmadhātukakleśāḥ sarve kāmaugha ityucyate |
XXhvsatssu:13158: kiñcittīkṣṇendriya evaṃ cintayati- yadi jīvo nityaḥ tadā aduḥkhasukhavikāraḥ, tadā puṇyapāpābhāvāditi mithyādṛṣṭimutpādayati |
XXhvsatssu:13160: (pṛ) catvāro granthāḥ abhidhyākāyagrantho vyāpādaḥ kāyagranthaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ kāyagranthaḥ idaṃ satyābhiniveśaḥ kāyagrantha iti |
XXhvsatssu:13165: yaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśakaḥ kāmayate anena śīlavratena viśuddhiṃ labheya iti |
XXhvsatssu:13170: catvāra ime granthā avaśyaṃ kāyavāṅmayā iti kāyagrantha ityucyante |
XXhvsatssu:13172: catvāra ime dharmā jananamaraṇe saṅgra 'thnantīti granthāḥ |
XXhvsatssu:13178: īrṣyādayaḥ kleśāḥ kaśāśastrādiduścaritāni ca kāmacchandādutpadyante iti |
XXhvsatssu:13180: styānamiddhena kiñcidviśramya punā rāgadveṣavikṣiptacitto na dhyānasamādhiṃ labhate |
XXhvsatssu:13182: aśuddhakarmakasya puruṣasya citte sadā daurmanasyakaukṛtyaṃ bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:13190: kecit teṣāṃ nīvaraṇānāṃ varjanāya vadanti- idaṃ kuśalamidamakuśalamiti |
XXhvsatssu:13191: sa tatra vicikitsate kimasti kiṃ vā nāstīti |
XXhvsatssu:13193: eṣu pañcasu nīvaraṇeṣu trīṇi dṛḍhabalānīti kevalaṃ nīvaraṇamityucyante |
XXhvsatssu:13194: anye dve nīvaraṇe tanubale iti dvau dharmau sāṃsargikau |
XXhvsatssu:13195: ime dve nīvaraṇe jananakāraṇasahite ityataḥ sāṃsargike ityucyeta |
XXhvsatssu:13198: auddhatyakaukṛtyasya catvāro dharmāḥ pratyayāḥ- jñātivitarko janapadaḥvitarko 'maraṇavitarkaḥ,
XXhvsatssu:13210: pañcāvarabhāgīyeṣu saṃyojaneṣu kāmacchando vyāpādaḥ śīlabrataparāmarśaḥ avaragamanārthatvādavarabhāgīyāni
XXhvsatssu:13211: tadyathā govratikaḥ saṃsiddhaḥ kāyasya bhedātparaṃ maraṇāt (SSS_333) gavāṃ sahavyatāmupapadyate
XXhvsatssu:13230: tāni śaikṣajanānāṃ citta ucyante na pṛthagjanānām |
XXhvsatssu:13231: (pṛ) auddhatyaṃ kasmāt rūpārūpyadhātukaṃ saṃyojanaṃ na kāmadhātukam |
XXhvsatssu:13235: keṣāñcit rūpe ārūpye ca vimuktisaṃjñā bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:13239: [tatra] āvāsamātsaryam- ahameva atra vasāmīti nānyān prayojayati |
XXhvsatssu:13243: ahamevātra dānaṃ lapsya mānyebhyaḥ prayacchatu iti |
XXhvsatssu:13256: kaḥ punarvādaḥ (SSS_334) svīyān pañca skandhān tyajatīti |
XXhvsatssu:13261: mātsaryacittena dātarguṇaṃ pratigrahīturdeyañca samucchedayatītyato gurutaraṃ pāpaṃ labhate
XXhvsatssu:13263: tadyathā jātyandhasya sapatnabahulānāñca janma na svātantrayaprāpakam |
XXhvsatssu:13265: triṣu adhvasu daśasu dikṣu [gatānāṃ] buddhānāṃ śatruḥ san saṃsāre saṃsaran sadā mūḍho bhavati
XXhvsatssu:13275: yathoktaṃ sūtre- santyāvāsamātsaryasya pañca doṣāḥ- anāgatasya subhikṣorāgamanāya necchati
XXhvsatssu:13285: lābhamātsaryasya pañca doṣāḥ- sadā sambhārasambhavāya klamati |
XXhvsatssu:13288: varṇamātsaryasya pañca doṣāḥ- anyeṣāṃ varṇaṃ śrutvā vyākulakaṣāyacitto bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:13292: sarveṣāṃ mātsaryāṇāṃ sāmānyata ime doṣāḥ santi- prabhūtadhanasañcayaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:13294: sadaikākitā, avarakule janma ityevamādayo 'pramāṇāḥ pañcamātsaryāṇāṃ doṣāḥ |
XXhvsatssu:13295: pañca cetaḥ khilāḥ- [ihāyuṣmanto bhikṣuḥ] śāstari vicikitsate, dharme
XXhvsatssu:13297: yo bhikṣuḥ śāsturmahāpuruṣāṇāñca (SSS_335) varṇavādī, tasmin jane anāttamanā
XXhvsatssu:13301: kiṃ śāstā mahān, kiṃ vā pūraṇādayaḥ iti |
XXhvsatssu:13304: śīle vicikitsate kiṃ śāstṛproktaṃ pravacanamutkṛṣṭaṃ, kiṃ vā kukkaṭaśvādivratamiti |
XXhvsatssu:13305: śikṣāyāṃ vicikitsate kiṃ mānapānādi dharmo nirvāṇaṃ gamayati uta neti |
XXhvsatssu:13306: anāttamanā āhata [citto] vyāpādabuddhyā bhayagauravacittaṃ vinā sajjanān garhayati |
XXhvsatssu:13312: sa ca bālo mūḍho 'jño na tathāgatadharmānyadharmayorvivekaṃ prajānāti |
XXhvsatssu:13317: na ca vedadīn granthān śṛṇoti adhyeti vā |
XXhvsatssu:13319: adhvanyadhvani bahulamithyāvicikitsaḥ sadā kaluṣitacittatayā śāstrādau vicikitsate |
XXhvsatssu:13321: sa ca mithyādṛṣṭibahulaiḥ puruṣaiḥ samānakṛtyatayā vicikitsate |
XXhvsatssu:13322: kiñca vedavyākaraṇādīni mithyādṛṣṭisūtrāṇyadhīyānaḥ paribhinnasamyakprajño bhavati ityato vicikitsate |
XXhvsatssu:13323: dharmāṇāṃ [yathāśrute] 'rthe prītaḥ kusmṛtiṃ janayan na sūtrakṛdāśayaṃ labdhuṃ śaknoti
XXhvsatssu:13324: ato vicikitsate sarvadā svahitālābhapratyayataḥ śāstrādiṣu vicikitsate |
XXhvsatssu:13325: pañca cetaso vinibandhāḥ- yaḥ kāyo 'vigatarāgo sa kāya āsajyate |
XXhvsatssu:13333: abhilāṣāvyākulatayā āryavacane upaśamapradarśane dharme na prahṛṣyati |
XXhvsatssu:13334: ataḥ śīlabāhuśrutyadhyānasamādhyādiṣvalpaṃ hitaṃ vastu labdhvā tenātmānaṃ pūrṇaṃ manyate |
XXhvsatssu:13337: (SSS_336) ayaṃ yadyaṣṭākṣaṇavihīnaḥ [saḥ] puruṣakāyaṃ duṣkaraṃ labdhvavānityataścittaikāgryeṇa vīryamārabheta |
XXhvsatssu:13339: asya samagrasya pratyayasya vigame 'nye pratyayā bhavanti |
XXhvsatssu:13351: (u) sūtra uktaṃ- pṛthagjano viṃśatidhā svacittaṃ nigṛhyaivaṃ cintayet- mama vibhinnākāraveṣamātrasya vṛthā, na
XXhvsatssu:13353: tadbhayasthāne na jñāsyāmyabhayasthānaṃ, nāpi jñāsyāmi mārgaṃ, na dhyānasamādhīn lapsye, asakṛtkāyaduḥkhamanubhaviṣyāmi,
XXhvsatssu:13354: bhaviṣyantyaṣṭāvakṣaṇāḥ, śatruḥ sadānusariṣyati, sarve mārgā vivṛtāḥ,
XXhvsatssu:13356: apratibandhaḥ, anādiḥ saṃsāro nāntavān, akurvato na puṇyapāpapratilābhaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:13358: na saddharma karomi, naivāsti sukhalayaḥ kṛtayoḥ kuśalākuśalayornaiva vismṛtirvināśo vā āmaraṇaṃ na dānto bhaviṣyāmi iti |
XXhvsatssu:13380: | evaṃ krameṇa santatyā vardhata ityanuśaya ityucyate |
XXhvsatssu:13381: (pṛ) ayamanuśayaḥ kiṃ cittasamprayuktaḥ kiṃ vā cittaviprayuktaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:13389: saumanasyamidaṃ yadi sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ vartate [tadā] rāgānuśaya ityucyate |
XXhvsatssu:13397: uktaṃ hi sūtre- bālānāṃ maithunacittameva nāsti |
XXhvsatssu:13403: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- satkāyadṛṣṭisamucchede 'nuśayāḥ sahaiva samucchidyante iti |
XXhvsatssu:13406: tathā nocet āryamārgeṇa kasya samucchedaḥ syāt |
XXhvsatssu:13408: pṛthagjanāḥ śaikṣajanāśca yadā kuśalacitte 'vyākṛtacitte ca vartante |
XXhvsatssu:13427: yathā ca caturdinajvarārto dinadvaye [jvarā]nudbhave 'pi jvarārta ityucyate |
XXhvsatssu:13433: yaducyate bhavatā nāsti cetanā nāsti vikalpaḥ vijñānasyamālambanamasti iti |
XXhvsatssu:13435: yadāha bhavān- satkāyadṛṣṭiranuśayena saha samucchidyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:13446: yadavocaḥ pṛthagjanāḥ śaikṣajanāśca yadi kuśalāvyākṛtacittagatāḥ, tadā arhantaḥ syuriti |
XXhvsatssu:13449: yathā kaścinmāsavarjanadharmamasamādāno māṃsamabhuñjannapi na varjitamāṃsa ityucyate |
XXhvsatssu:13466: mithyājīvo [yena] māyāśāṭhyādayaḥ pañcadharmāḥ puṣṭiṃ labhante sa mithyājīvaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:13470: vinaye yatpratiṣiddhaṃ tena ca svātmajīvanaṃ mithyājīvaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:13478: mārgāvacara evaṃ cintayet- bhagavataḥ śāsane 'vatāro mārgācaraṇārthaḥ na (SSS_339) jīvanārtha iti |
XXhvsatssu:13489: evaṃ cintayati- ahamanena śīlena svarga utpatsya iti |
XXhvsatssu:13500: sa naihikaṃ sukhaṃ vindate, paratra ca mahadduḥkhamanubhavati |
XXhvsatssu:13507: śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ sthūladarśana ityato bahūnāṃ satvānāṃ gocaraḥ |
XXhvsatssu:13522: anena kāraṇena ca daridrāṇāṃ nīcānāṃ kutsitānāmatejasvināñca sthāne patanti |
XXhvsatssu:13537: yathā kasyacitsvata utkṛṣṭavastulābhinaṃ putrameva paśyataścittaṃ duṣprītikaṃ bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:13547: daśakleśamahābhūmikadharmāḥ tadyathā aśrāddhayaṃ kausīdyaṃ muṣitasmṛtitā vikṣepo 'vidyāsamprajanyamayoniśomanaskāro mithyādhimokṣa auddhatyaṃ pramādaśca |
XXhvsatssu:13558: ato jñāyate na sarvakleśacitteṣu te daśa dharmāḥ santīti |
XXhvsatssu:13575: | uktañca sūtre- [atha khalu kevadhaṃ] mahābrahmā taṃ bhikṣuṃ bāhau gṛhītvā ekamantamapanayitvā taṃ bhikṣumetadavocat- ahamapi na jānāmi
XXhvsatssu:13582: īdṛśānāṃ pāpakānāṃ kleśānāṃ sattvāt jñātavyamasti ca
XXhvsatssu:13584: kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ- mātāpitrupādhyāyācāryādiṣu yo rāgaḥ sa kuśalarāgaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:13592: yanmānaṃ niśritya mānaṃ samucchedayati ayaṃ kuśalamānaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:13595: kiñcāhurābhidharmikāḥ- yaḥ kuśalaḥ na [sa] kleśo bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:13613: varaṃ saṃśaya eva pātayati na mithyādṛṣṭāvatārayati |
XXhvsatssu:13627: ato jñāyate tṛṣṇayā sarve bhavasantānāṃ bhavantīti |
XXhvsatssu:13640: (u) ime sarve dvidhāpi bhavanti satyadarśanaheyā bhāvanāheyāśceti |
XXhvsatssu:13641: kenedaṃ jñāyate yathā nāthaputrādayo bhagavacchrāvakān satkāralā bhino dṛṣṭvā īrṣyācittamutpādayamāsuḥ
XXhvsatssu:13647: yathā srotaāpannasya narakapatanapratyayaḥ aṣṭamaloke kāyavedakamāyā ca satyadarśanaheyāpi
XXhvsatssu:13648: (pṛ) kleśeṣu kati duḥkhadarśanaheyāḥ kati samudayanirodhamārgadarśanaheyāḥ kati bhāvanāheyāḥ
XXhvsatssu:13661: pañcaskandhāḥ sanirodhāḥ, ātmā tvanirodhaḥ, mārga ātmadṛṣṭervirodhidharmaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:13665: yogī samudayasambhūtaṃ duḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭvā ucchedadṛṣṭiṃ vyāvartayati |
XXhvsatssu:13669: ato duḥkhaṃ paśyan prajānāti- śīlaṃ duḥkhaṃ, nānena viśuddhirlabhyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:13681: | (pṛ) rāgo māno mithyādṛṣṭiṃ varjayitvā anyāścatasro dṛṣṭayo
XXhvsatssu:13689: paścādapi vakṣyate pañcasu vijñāneṣu nāsti kleśa iti |
XXhvsatssu:13691: mātsaryantu na tathā ityatra nāsti hetuḥ |
XXhvsatssu:13693: evaṃ māno na daurmanasyendriyasamprayukta ityatrāpi nāsti hetuḥ |
XXhvsatssu:13703: mama[śāsane]mithyādṛṣṭau rāgo bhavati, nāsti duḥkhaṃ yāvannāsti mārgaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:13714: tena dharmeṇātmānamunnamayati, tatpradhānā bhavanti [rūpadhātau] na kāmadhātau |
XXhvsatssu:13715: yathā kāmadhātukakleśārūpadhātvālambanāḥ tathā rūpadhātukādṛṣṭayādayaḥ kleśā api kāmadhātvālambanāḥ
XXhvsatssu:13729: uktaṃ hi sūtre- īdṛśīṃ dṛṣṭimutpādya īdṛśaṃ vastu vadati yadasti
XXhvsatssu:13736: tathā no cet satkāyadṛṣṭyādayo 'pi pañcasu vijñāneṣu varteran |
XXhvsatssu:13738: cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā vadati ahaṃ paśyamīti |
XXhvsatssu:13742: kathamucyate pañcasu vijñāneṣu na kleśāḥ santīti |
XXhvsatssu:13746: manovijñāne hi vidyamānaṃ vikalpakāraṇaṃ na pañcasu vijñāneṣu |
XXhvsatssu:13747: ato jñāyate pañca vijñāneṣu na santi kleśā iti ||
XXhvsatssu:13750: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- kleśā navavidhā- adhamamadhyamottamā adhamādhamādhamamadhyamādhamottamā madhyamādhama
XXhvsatssu:13763: tadyathā dakṣaḥ (SSS_345) karmakaro hastena paraśumādāya cakṣuṣā muṣṭipradeśaṃ dṛṣṭvā yānyaṃśasahasrāni pratidinaṃ kṣīyamāṇāni
XXhvsatssu:13764: tānyagaṇayanannapi kṣīṇamātraṃ dṛṣṭvā prajānāti idaṃ kṣīṇamiti |
XXhvsatssu:13765: tathā sa bhikṣurapi mārgacaryāṃ bhāvayan kānyadya kṣīṇāṇyāsravasahasrāṇi kāni hyaḥ kṣīṇānyāsravahasrāṇīti agaṇayannapi kṣīṇamātre prajānāti kṣīṇa āsrava iti |
XXhvsatssu:13766: ato jñāyate 'pramāṇai jñānaiḥ kleśāḥ kṣīyanta natvaṣṭha nava vā iti |
XXhvsatssu:13767: (pṛ) kaṃ samādhiṃ niśritya kaḥ kleśa prahīyate |
XXhvsatssu:13770: yathoktaṃ sūtre bhagavatā- prathamadhyānamupādāyāsravāṇāṃ kṣayo yāvadākiñcanyāyatanamupādāyāsravāṇāṃ kṣaya iti |
XXhvsatssu:13771: tāni saptapratiśaraṇāni vināpi āsravāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ karoti |
XXhvsatssu:13773: ato jñāyate kāmadhātukasamādhiṃ niśrityāpi āsravakṣayaṃ pratilabhata iti |
XXhvsatssu:13778: (pṛ) pūrvaṃ prathamadhyānādvītarāgaḥ kiṃ krameṇa dvitīyadhyānādīn prāpnoti kiṃ vā ekakālameva
XXhvsatssu:13783: yathā ca yāmyā devāḥ pariṣvaṅge kāmaṃ sādhayanti |
XXhvsatssu:13784: tuṣitā devāḥ pāṇiṃ gṛhītvā kāmaṃ sādhayanti |
XXhvsatssu:13786: paranirmitavaśavartino devā ākāraṃ dṛṣṭvā kāmaṃ sādhayanti |
XXhvsatssu:13797: (u) yathā satyadarśanaheyāḥ sarve kleśā nirodhasatyadarśanena prahīyante |
XXhvsatssu:13798: uktapūrvamidam yat nirodhadarśanapraheyāḥ (SSS_346) satkāyadṛṣṭyādayaḥ kleśāḥ sarve
XXhvsatssu:13800: ūṣmadharmādārabhya anityādyākāraiḥ pañcaskandhalakṣaṇāni bhāvayitvā ādau praheyāḥ kleśā nirodhadarśanena kṣīyante |
XXhvsatssu:13817: bhikṣurbhāvayati idaṃ rūpaṃ, ayaṃ rūpasamudayaḥ, ayaṃ rūpanirodha iti
XXhvsatssu:13818: sarvadā mama paśyato dharmaṃ vijānataḥ kleśāḥ prahīyanta iti |
XXhvsatssu:13823: ato jñāyate skandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyataḥ kleśāḥ kṣīyanta iti |
XXhvsatssu:13850: yat satvā viśuddhaṃ paramaṃ nirvāṇasukhamupekṣante pratyutātitucchaṃ kāmasukhaṃ bhavasukhaṃ kāmayante tadidaṃ sarvaṃ kleśānāṃ doṣaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:13851: yadā kleśān (SSS_347) prajahāti tadā mahāhitaṃ pratilabhante |
XXhvsatssu:13882: bhagavatāsūtre- yaḥ pratilabdhavidyaḥ sanyastāvidyaḥ sa kiṃ pāpakaṃ karma puṇyaṃ karma āneñjyañca karma karoti na vā |
XXhvsatssu:13885: ato jñāyate prajñaptyanuyāyī kevalaṃ karmāṇi karotīti |
XXhvsatssu:13886: anāsravaṃ cittaṃ na prajñaptimavalambata iti na karmāṇi karoti |
XXhvsatssu:13888: yathoktaṃ sūtre- śaikṣajanaḥ pratyāgataṃ nācarati, niruddhaṃ na karotīti |
XXhvsatssu:13891: anāsravaṃ cittañca na caryālakṣaṇamityato nāstyanāsravaṃ karma |
XXhvsatssu:13894: ato jñāyate vidyamānaḥ kāyaḥ kleśahetu[ka] iti |
XXhvsatssu:13900: kleśavāneva (SSS_348) [jāyate] yatra bhavalakṣaṇaṃ kvarodanādi jananakāle pratyakṣamasti
XXhvsatssu:13901: ato jñāyate kleśaiḥ sahaiva sarve jāyanta iti |
XXhvsatssu:13902: pratyakṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ khalu sattvā bahavo varcaḥkuṭyādiṣu prasūyante na tu śilādiṣu |
XXhvsatssu:13910: mriyamāṇā dūrato narakaṃ dṛṣṭvā idaṃ padmasara iti tadāsaṅgāttatrotpadyante |
XXhvsatssu:13911: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo nibiḍitasthāne vipulaṃ sthānaṃ labheyamiti mriyate sa pakṣiṣūtpadyate
XXhvsatssu:13913: yaḥ śītārto mriyate sa tapananarake jāyate |
XXhvsatssu:13916: ya āhārāsaktaḥ sa kuṇapeṣu kīṭo jāyate |
XXhvsatssu:13931: muhūrtaṃ daṇḍe viramatyapi [cakram] bhramatyeva na tu
XXhvsatssu:13940: evaṃ jñānāgninā vijñānasthitiṣu dagdhāsu na vijñānabījaṃ prarohati |
XXhvsatssu:13948: arhatastveṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ vaikalyānnāyatyāṃ kāyo bhavati iti jñātavyaṃ kleśapratyayā kāyavedaneti
XXhvsatssu:13951: | ato jñāyate vigatakleśo nopapatiṃ vedayata iti |
XXhvsatssu:13959: bhavatoktaṃ yathā daśanaṃ paścātkrameṇa bhavati tathā kleśā apīti |
XXhvsatssu:13963: yathā dagdhaṃ bījaṃ na punaḥ prarohati |
XXhvsatssu:13964: pratyakṣaṃ khalu loke 'smin kleśajaḥ kāya iti |
XXhvsatssu:13967: ato jñāyate āyatyāṃ pañcaskandhā api kleśajā iti |
XXhvsatssu:13975: jñātavyamime sattvā avaśyaṃ pūrvābhyāsasañcitamaithunarāgādikleśā ityatasteṣūtpadyanta iti
XXhvsatssu:13981: tebhyaḥ pāpebhyo dṛṣṭa eva badhabandhanādiduḥkhamanu bhavanti |
XXhvsatssu:13989: kleśavivṛddhyā durgatau patati sa eva pāpakāyamanubhūya kleśān punarvardhayati |
XXhvsatssu:14001: teṣāmeva mahatvato duḥsthāne janmānuvartate yathā sūkaraśvādayaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:14002: alpakeśatvataḥ susthāne jāyata iti yathā [kaścit] kleśatanutvāt dānaśīlādikarmācaran ṣaṭsu
XXhvsatssu:14008: paśyāmaḥ khalu sattvā kudeśabhūmau ratā durjanaiḥ saha kutsitamadhivasantīti sarvamāsaṅgādbhavati
XXhvsatssu:14013: śalabhā ime na jānanti agnirduḥkhasparśa ityatastatra patanti |
XXhvsatssu:14015: yathā matsyā aṅkuśaṃ grasantaḥ, hariṇāḥ śabdānu cāriṇaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:14017: yathā ca kaścit kāmāsaktyā viprakṛṣṭāṃ vidiśaṃ gacchan na pratinivartate |
XXhvsatssu:14019: yathā vṛkṣasya mūle 'nunmūlite sa vṛkṣaḥ punaḥ prarohati |
XXhvsatssu:14022: yathāpi mūle 'nupadrute dṛḍhe cchinno 'pi vṛkṣaḥ punareva rohati |
XXhvsatssu:14023: evamapi tṛṣṇānuśaye 'nuddhṛte nirvartayati duḥkhamidaṃ punaḥ punaḥ || iti
XXhvsatssu:14025: svato 'vidyāṃ vinā ko jñānī tat vyayaduḥkhaṃ kāmayamāno vedayeta |
XXhvsatssu:14038: yathā viṣasarpasampūrṇe gṛhaprakoṣṭhe 'prajvalite ca dīpe sukhādhyavasānaṃ
XXhvsatssu:14041: tathā sattvā api avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ loke 'bhiramante |
XXhvsatssu:14046: prārthanā hi dvividhā- kāmaprārthanā bhavaprārthanā iti |
XXhvsatssu:14053: bhavapratyayā jātiriti jñātavyaṃ kleśāḥ kāyasya mūlamiti |
XXhvsatssu:14073: catasro jātayaḥ- aṇḍajo jarāyujaḥ saṃsvedaja upapāduka iti |
XXhvsatssu:14077: ato jñāyate catvāro jātivibhāgāḥ kāmatṛṣṇādhīnā iti |
XXhvsatssu:14083: rūpopagaṃ vijñānaṃ tiṣṭhat rūpapratiṣṭhitaṃ rūpārambaṇaṃ nandyupasevanam |
XXhvsatssu:14122: | kleśā vedanāniśritā ityataḥ pañca vedanā indriyāṇi bhavanti |
XXhvsatssu:14130: [te] sarve kleśānāṃ nirodhāya bhavanti jñānī taddhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā tān skandhānupāśrayate |
XXhvsatssu:14138: evaṃ kleśānāṃ kramaśo nirodhātkāyo 'pi kramaśo nirudhyate |
XXhvsatssu:14152: bhagavānāha- tatra tatra sūtre nandirāgakṣayātsamyagvimuktiṃ labhata iti |
XXhvsatssu:14172: śāstramāha- trividhacittānāṃ nirodho nirodhasatyaṃ yaduta prajñapticittaṃ dharmacittaṃ śūnyatācittam |
XXhvsatssu:14180: (u) skandhānupādāya ye vikalpā tadyathā pañcaskandhānupādāya puruṣa ityucyate |
XXhvsatssu:14185: evaṃ skandheṣu satsveva bhavati sattveti saṃvṛtiḥ || iti |
XXhvsatssu:14186: yathā ca bhagavān bhikṣūnavocat- dharmā anityā duḥkhāḥ śūnyā anātmānaḥ pratītyasamutpannā aniyatasvabhāvā nāmamātramanusmaraṇamātraṃ bhogamātram
XXhvsatssu:14187: | imāneva pañcaskandhānupādāya nānā nāma pravartate sattvo manuṣyo deva ityādi iti |
XXhvsatssu:14190: kiñcāha bhagavān- dve satye paramārthasatyaṃ saṃvṛtisatyamiti |
XXhvsatssu:14200: buddhā bhagavanto laukikānāṃ prajñaptito viyojanāya lokasatyena vyavaharanti |
XXhvsatssu:14207: purā kila janā vastūpabhogakāmanayā vahuvastunāmutpattikāle ghaṭa ityādi nāma sthāpayāñcakruḥ
XXhvsatssu:14214: na patati mithyādṛṣṭau sukhānte duḥkhānte ca |
XXhvsatssu:14218: anena dharmeṇa taccittaṃ damayitvā mārgaśāsanaṃ grāhayitvā paścātparamārthasatyamupadiśati
XXhvsatssu:14224: yathā bhagavata evaṃ cetaḥ parivitarka udabhut- paripavkāḥ khalu rāhulasya [bhikṣoḥ] vimuktiparipacanīyā dharmāḥ yannūnamahaṃ rāhulaṃ uttara āsravānāṃ kṣaye vinayeyamiti |
XXhvsatssu:14225: tadyathā ghrāṇapākaḥ tadvināśe sukhaṃ janane durbhedanam |
XXhvsatssu:14226: evaṃ lokasatyena cittaṃ damayitvātha paramārthajñānena vināśayati |
XXhvsatssu:14227: uktañca sūtre- dharmāṇāṃ pravicayapūrvakaṃ nirvāṇaṃ parijñātavyamiti |
XXhvsatssu:14229: prajñaptisantaḥ [kiṃ vā] paramārthasanta iti jñātvā paścānnirodhasatyaṃ sākṣātkaroti |
XXhvsatssu:14243: lokanirodhaṃ paśyataḥ astīti dṛṣṭirna bhavati iti |
XXhvsatssu:14245: lokasatyato bhagavataḥ śāsanaṃ sarvaṃ satyameva yaduta astyātmā nāstyātmā ityādi paryāyāḥ
XXhvsatssu:14250: asti vastutaḥ sattva iti yā dṛṣṭiḥ ayaṃ mahāmohaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:14258: jananamaraṇavedakaḥ sattvo nāstīti vacanaṃ hi mithyādṛṣṭiḥ |
XXhvsatssu:14259: yadi śūnyatābuddhipratilābhī vadati nāsti sattva iti |
XXhvsatssu:14261: yathoktaṃ sūtre- arhantī bhikṣuṇī pāpīyāṃsaṃ māramavocat-
XXhvsatssu:14262: kiṃ nu sattva iti pratyeṣi māradṛṣṭigataṃ nu te |
XXhvsatssu:14272: (u) yasya puruṣasya śūnyatātattvajñānaṃ notpannaṃ tasyāstyātmeti matirbhavati |
XXhvsatssu:14274: yathāha bhagavān- ye bālāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ śūnyo nāstyātmā, na punaḥ karoti iti śrutavantaḥ te mahābhītā bhavanti |
XXhvsatssu:14276: ato jñāyate apratilabdhaśūnyatājñānaḥ astyātmeti matyā nirvāṇādbibheti |
XXhvsatssu:14280: apratilabdhaśūnyatātattvo nāsti kiñcanetidṛ ṣṭyā durgatau patati
XXhvsatssu:14283: prajñāya asti karmaphalamiti śraddadhānaḥ paścāt saṃskārā anityā utpattinirodhalakṣaṇā iti bhāvayitvā nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti |
XXhvsatssu:14286: sa yadi nāsti kiñcaneti vacanaṃ śṛṇoti |
XXhvsatssu:14289: kecittīrthikā apavadanti śramaṇo gautamaḥ paramārthata ātmānaṃ dūṣayatīti
XXhvsatssu:14290: | ato bhagavānāha- lokasatyato vadāmi asti sattva iti |
XXhvsatssu:14291: samyagdṛṣṭiṃ prakāśayan vadāmi santi sattvāḥ sandhāvantaḥ saṃsaranta iti |
XXhvsatssu:14304: yathā citritaḥ pradīpaḥ pradīpa ityukto 'pi na pradipavṛttiko bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:14305: evaṃ ghaṭo 'stīti kathito 'pi na vastusan bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:14306: santi pañcaskandhā ityuktā api na paramārthāḥ ||
XXhvsatssu:14309: (pṛ) kathaṃ ghaṭādayaḥ prajñaptitaḥ santi na vastutaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:14311: yathā vadanti idaṃ rūpaṃ idaṃ ghaṭarūpamiti |
XXhvsatssu:14330: yathā vedanā na vedayate vijānāti ca |
XXhvsatssu:14343: yathā kaścidaśvaṃ dṛṣṭvā vadati- aśvaṃ paśyāmīti |
XXhvsatssu:14353: kaścidvadati puruṣaṃ spṛśāmīti, kaścit puruṣakāyaṃ spṛśāmīti, kaścit puruṣabhujaṃ spṛśāmiti, kaścit puruṣahastaṃ spṛśāmīti, kaścit puruṣasyāṅguliṃ spṛśāmīti, kaścit puruṣasyāṅguliparva spṛśāmiti |
XXhvsatssu:14354: manovijñānamapi sattvādau vikṣipati yaduta kāyaḥ sattvaḥ cittaṃ sattva iti |
XXhvsatssu:14355: evaṃ rūpādaya eva ghaṭa athavā rūpādivyatirikto ghaṭa ityādi |
XXhvsatssu:14356: paramārthavacane tu cittaṃ samādadhāti na vikṣipati |
XXhvsatssu:14357: rūpaṃ paśyāmīti [vat] śabdamapi paśyāmīti na vaktuṃ śakyate |
XXhvsatssu:14363: rūpādayo dharmā jñeyādāvanabhidheyā iti na vyapadiśyante |
XXhvsatssu:14370: yaḥ kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ kuśalaṃ karoti sa vidvān |
XXhvsatssu:14380: yathāha bhagavān- vidvān mūḍhaśca sarvaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vedayate |
XXhvsatssu:14392: yathāha- [kṣipraṃ] dharmaṃ vijānāti vijño jihvā sūparasaṃ yathā |
XXhvsatssu:14406: rūparasagandhasparśānupādāya hi ayaṃ ghaṭa iti vyavahāraḥ |
XXhvsatssu:14408: (13) prajñaptau ca bhavati saṃśayaḥ yathā sthāṇurvā puruṣo vā iti |
XXhvsatssu:14409: rūpādiṣu tu na saṃśayo bhavati rūpaṃ vā kiṃ vā śabda iti |
XXhvsatssu:14410: (pṛ) rūpādāvapi saṃśayo bhavati kimasti rūpaṃ kiṃ vā nāsti rūpamiti |
XXhvsatssu:14412: rūpaṃ paśyan naiva saṃśete ayaṃ śabda iti |
XXhvsatssu:14413: anyasmāt kāraṇāt saṃśayo bhavati kimasti rūpaṃ kiṃ vā nāsti rūpamiti |
XXhvsatssu:14414: yathā rūpaṃ śūnyamiti śrutvā punā rūpaṃ paśyan saṃśete kimasti kiṃ vā nāstīti |
XXhvsatssu:14417: nirodhaḥ kiṃ vā nāsti nirodha iti |
XXhvsatssu:14418: (u) abhiniviṣṭeṣu saṃśayo bhavati na tu nirodhasatye |
XXhvsatssu:14419: asti nirodha iti mataṃ nāsti nirodha iti matañca yaḥ śṛṇoti tasya bhavati saṃśayaḥ kimasti kiṃ vā nāstīti |
XXhvsatssu:14422: nirodhasatyaṃ paśyato na punaḥ saṃśayo bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:14437: snehadveṣādivikalpo yaḥ kaścana sa sarvaḥ prajñaptisan |
XXhvsatssu:14441: (17) gamyate āgamyata ityādi, ucchidyate vinaśyati ityādi, dāhyate (SSS_361) pradāhyate ityādi yā kācana kriyā sarvā sā prajñaptisatī |
XXhvsatssu:14448: prāṇātipātādi pāpaṃ prāṇātipātaviratyādi puṇyaṃ sarvaṃ na paramārthasat |
XXhvsatssu:14450: guru laghu, dīrghaṃ hrasvaṃ, mahadalpaṃ, ācāryaḥ antevāsī, pitā putraḥ ārya anārya ityādi
XXhvsatssu:14458: tathā śūnyatayā yat khaṇḍanaṃ tattu paramārthasat |
XXhvsatssu:14469: anirvacanīyatvam- rūpādaya eva vā ghaṭaḥ kiṃ vā
XXhvsatssu:14470: tadvayatirikto ghaṭa iti na nirvaktuṃ śakyate |
XXhvsatssu:14477: (u) ekatvavāde doṣo yaduta rūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pratyekaṃ vibhaktam |
XXhvsatssu:14485: (pṛ) yathā ekaikaṃ tilaṃ na kalāpaṃ sādhayati |
XXhvsatssu:14500: ato jñāyate rūpādaya eva na pṛthivīti |
XXhvsatssu:14503: na paśyāmo rūparūpamiti vadantaṃ yaṃ kañcana |
XXhvsatssu:14511: tathāpi svātmarūpeṇaiva svātmapradarśanaṃ [iti vadataḥ] ko doṣaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:14517: śilāpuruṣasya hasta iti pradarśane tadanyaḥ kāyaḥ śilāpuruṣa iti syāt |
XXhvsatssu:14520: tasmin samaye śilāpuruṣa eva na punastadanyo 'stītyucyate |
XXhvsatssu:14522: santyasmin kāye keśā romāṇi raktaṃ māṃsaṃ ityādi |
XXhvsatssu:14526: ato jñāyate śilāpuruṣa iti vacanamapi mṛṣāvacanam, iti |
XXhvsatssu:14531: ato jñāyate rūparasagandhasparśā eva, naivāstīyaṃ pṛthivīti |
XXhvsatssu:14534: rūparasagandhasparśavatī pṛthivī iti tu vaktuṃ śakyate |
XXhvsatssu:14547: puruṣa evaṃ cintayati- pṛthivīṃ paśyāmi, pṛthivīṃ rasayāmi, pṛthivīṃ spṛśāmi iti |
XXhvsatssu:14555: yathā kaścid vṛkṣaśākhāṃ chindan vadati- vṛkṣaṃ chindāmi, vanaṃ chindāmīti ca |
XXhvsatssu:14565: ato jñāyate na sarvāṇi bhautikāni śabdavantīti ||
XXhvsatssu:14588: ato jñāyate na pṛthak santi pṛthivyādayo dharmā iti |
XXhvsatssu:14593: kāyendriyeṇa spṛṣṭvāpi jānīmaḥ ayaṃ ghaṭa iti |
XXhvsatssu:14601: na hyandhakāre vivecayati ghaṭo vā jighrayate kapālaṃ vā |
XXhvsatssu:14602: ghaṭo vā rasyate kapālaṃ vā iti |
XXhvsatssu:14603: (u) yadyapi na vivecayati kiṃ ghaṭa uta kapālamiti |
XXhvsatssu:14604: tathāpi mṛdi jñānaṃ bhavati mṛdaṃ (SSS_364) jighrāmi, mṛdaṃ rasayāmīti |
XXhvsatssu:14606: tadā dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭvā vā na nirdhārayati kimayaṃ ghaṭa śarāvaḥ kiṃ vā ghataśakalamiti |
XXhvsatssu:14607: ato jñāyate cakṣurindriyaṃ kāyendriyañca na ghaṭaṃ gṛhṇīyāt iti |
XXhvsatssu:14608: andhakāre ghaṭabuddhirutpannāpi na vivecayati suvarṇaghaṭo rajataghaṭo vā iti |
XXhvsatssu:14609: ato jñāyate cakṣurindriyaṃ kāyendriyamapi na ghaṭaṃ gṛhṇīyāt |
XXhvsatssu:14612: yathā [cakṣuḥ] puṣpādi paśyati na vivicya jānāti gandhaḥ
XXhvsatssu:14614: ato yadi mataṃ cakṣuḥkāyendriyābhyāṃ jānīmo dravyaṃ na ghrāṇajihvābhyāmiti |
XXhvsatssu:14616: yathā ghrāṇajihve dravyaṃ pṛthakkṛtya na vikalpayataḥ |
XXhvsatssu:14617: tathā cakṣuḥkāyendriye api dravyamapṛthagbhūtamapi na vikalpayataḥ |
XXhvsatssu:14629: na tu sarvo rūpātpṛthagbhūto dharmo dṛśyaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:14635: yadi ca dṛśyadharmeṇa tadanyadharma upalabhya dṛśyo bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:14644: bhavatāṃ sūtre rūpamupādāya (=rūpahetukaṃ) indriyeṇa rūpaṃ dṛśyamitīdaṃ rūpalakṣaṇaṃ punaralakṣaṇaṃ bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:14656: na tatrāsti vinigamanā rūpamātramupalabdhikaraṃ nānye dharmā iti |
XXhvsatssu:14673: andha imaṃ vāyuṃ jānannapi na jānāti vāyurayaṃ kiṃ dṛśyaḥ kiṃvā adṛśya iti |
XXhvsatssu:14680: ye saṃkhyāparimāṇādayo dharmāḥ [te] adṛśyadravyagatāḥ, vāyuśca dṛśyaḥ syāt |
XXhvsatssu:14681: (u) asmanmate rūpaṃ vihāya nāstyanyo dharmo dṛśyaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:14682: ato jñāyate mate ['smin] yatra rūpamutpannamasti tatra cakṣuḥ paśyati |
XXhvsatssu:14684: yasmin dharme nāstyutpannaṃ rūpam, tatra sacakṣuṣkasyāpi notpadyate 'nyaghaṭasaṃjñā |
XXhvsatssu:14685: ato rūpadi vihāya pṛthagasti ghaṭa itīdaṃ na nyāyyam ||
XXhvsatssu:14699: yathā cakṣurvijñānena rūpaṃ jñāyate, na śabdādi |
XXhvsatssu:14711: ato jñāyate paramārthato nānirvācyāḥ dharmāḥ prajñaptāveva ekatvanānātvasatvāducyate 'nirvācya iti ||
XXhvsatssu:14715: (u) abhāvatve na puṇyapāpādīnāṃ vipāko vimuktyādayaḥ sarve dharmāḥ |
XXhvsatssu:14719: asti nāstīti vādāḥ śraddhayoktāḥ pratyakṣajñānaśraddhayā vā bhavanti anumitijñānaśraddhayā vā bhavanti |
XXhvsatssu:14721: yatkiñcana nāstīti yat vacanaṃ tadeṣu triṣu na bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:14722: sūtraṃ vānusarāma iti bhavatāmāśayo [yaḥ] nāyaṃ yujyate |
XXhvsatssu:14739: sarve dharmā abhāvā iti bhavata āśaye jñānamidaṃ kiṃ pratītya bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:14744: tadā sarve janā yathābhipretaṃ yatkiñcana kuryuḥ |
XXhvsatssu:14751: tathā ca kena kāraṇenāha- sarvamabhāva iti |
XXhvsatssu:14756: yo bhāvaḥ kāraṇena sādhyaḥ na so 'bhāva ityucyate ||
XXhvsatssu:14766: avayavinyagrāhye 'pi avayavā grāhyā iti bhavato yanmatam |
XXhvsatssu:14811: na hi cakṣuḥ sūkṣmaṃ rūpaṃ paśyati |
XXhvsatssu:14812: na ca mano gṛhṇāti pratyutpannaṃ rūpam |
XXhvsatssu:14815: manovijñānantu atīte anāgate vartate na rūpe vartate |
XXhvsatssu:14845: kiṃ rūpaṃ prāpya paśyati kiṃ vāprāpya paśyati |
XXhvsatssu:14857: (u) yadi cakṣuraprāptamapi jñānagocara ityucyate sarvasthaṃ rūpaṃ jñānagocaraḥ syāt |
XXhvsatssu:14860: yadi sati pūrvameva cakṣuṣi rūpe ca paścāccakṣurvijñānamutpadyate |
XXhvsatssu:14872: tathā hi- yadi ca cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurāśritaṃ, tadā sāyatanam |
XXhvsatssu:14873: yadi padārtho nirāyatanaḥ tadā āśritya tiṣṭhatīti na labhyate |
XXhvsatssu:14882: ekaikavijñānāvayavo na vijānāti avayavī tu vijānāti |
XXhvsatssu:14884: yadi nirāyatanaṃ, tadā na cakṣurāśritaṃ syāt ||
XXhvsatssu:14899: ato jñāyate śabdo na śrāvya iti |
XXhvsatssu:14905: 'yaṃ prāpya aprāpya vā ubhayathāpi na śravaṇīyaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:14915: ye dharmā vibhinnasvabhāvāḥ, na te saṃśliṣyante |
XXhvsatssu:14916: ye na vibhinnasvabhāvāḥ, kathaṃ teṣāṃ svataḥ saṃśleṣaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:14931: pūrvoktavat gandhaḥ prāpto vā aprāpto gṛhyata ityubhayathāsti doṣaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:14935: sūkṣmādyavayaveṣveva sparśajñānaṃ notpadyata iti yathāpūrvaṃ vaktavyam |
XXhvsatssu:14940: manovijñānaṃ hi na pratyutpannān rūparasagandhasparśān gṛhṇāti |
XXhvsatssu:14944: yadi manovijñānaṃ rūpādīn dharmān na jānāti |
XXhvsatssu:14955: (u) yathā kasyacit cittaṃ svātmānamajñātvāpi cintā bhavati
XXhvsatssu:14970: hetau pūrvaṃ san vā guṇa utpadyeta |
XXhvsatssu:14977: ato na hetau pūrvaṃ san guṇaḥ phalamutpādayati |
XXhvsatssu:14978: bhavato yadi mataṃ hetau pūrvamasan guṇaḥ phalamutpādayatīti |
XXhvsatssu:14982: dṛṣṭe paśyāmaḥ khalu śuklatantuḥ śuklapaṭaṃ sādhayati |
XXhvsatssu:14984: yadi (SSS_372) hetau pūrvamasan guṇaḥ phalaṃ sādhayati |
XXhvsatssu:14987: ato na hetau pūrvamasan guṇaḥ phalamutpādayati |
XXhvsatssu:14996: (pṛ) dṛṣṭe paśyāmaḥ khalu ghaṭaṃ kiyamāṇam kathaṃ
XXhvsatssu:15009: yadi ghaṭaḥ kriyāvān, atīto 'nāgataḥ pratyutpanno vā syāt |
XXhvsatssu:15019: hetuḥ kāryasya pūrvaṃ vā, kiṃ vā paścāt, kiṃ vā samakālam, sarvathā na yujyate |
XXhvsatssu:15022: hetau niruddhe kena phalamutpadyeta yathā avidyamānaḥ pitā kathaṃ putramutpādayet |

XXhvsatssu:15748: (pṛ) kimimāni trīṇi maitrī[rūpāṇi]ā (u) maitracittasyaiva trayaḥ prakārāḥ
XXhvsatssu:15751: na kaścidadviṣan duḥkhinaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā dayate |
XXhvsatssu:15752: yadā sarveṣu sattveṣu paramaṃ maitracittaṃ kaścidduḥkhopadravasambhrāntaṃ putraṃ dṛṣṭveva samācaratitasmin samaye pravṛttaṃ maitracittaṃ karuṇetyucyate |
XXhvsatssu:15753: atha vā kaścit parasya duḥkhe karuṇāmutpādayannapi na parasyotkarṣe pramuditacitto bhavati
XXhvsatssu:15756: kiṃ punarlabdhavijayaṃ putraṃ dṛṣṭvā [na] pramodyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:15757: yogāvacaraḥ sarvasattvān samṛddhilābhino dṛṣṭvā svābhedataḥ pramuditacitto bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:15759: ato jñāyate maitrīcittaviśeṣaḥ karuṇā muditā ceti |
XXhvsatssu:15761: (u) śatruṃ mitrañca paśyato maitracittaṃ na samamasti |
XXhvsatssu:15766: ato yogāvacaro mitre maitramupekṣya śatrau śātravamupekṣya cittasāmyaṃ cikīrṣati |
XXhvsatssu:15778: yathā vadanti uttamamaitracittena trīṇi dhyānāni bhāvayatīti |
XXhvsatssu:15788: [amanuṣyāṇāṃ priyo bhavati |] nāsmai agnirvā viṣaṃ vā śastraṃ vā kramate |
XXhvsatssu:15793: ahaṃ vyāpādamutpādya ahameva vipākamanubhavāmi nānya iti |
XXhvsatssu:15795: kiñca yogāvacaro manasi karoti ahamalpakena pāpakena anyasya kṛtena bahūni pāpakāni tacchataguṇāni tadabhinnānyanubhavāmi |
XXhvsatssu:15802: puruṣasya pūrvādhvani mātā vā syāt, garbhiṇī prasavitrī ca madarthaḥ duḥkhaṃ vyavasyamānā syāt |
XXhvsatssu:15803: atha vā syāt mama pitā bhrātā bhāryā putro vā |
XXhvsatssu:15806: anusmareccāgāminyadhvani mama pitā mātā bhrātā vā bhavet iti |
XXhvsatssu:15807: arhan pratyekabuddho buddho vā bhavediti [anusmaraṇaṃ] kuryāt |
XXhvsatssu:15811: pūrvañca nibhṛtaṃ paśyet janasya svabhāvaḥ kuśalo 'kuśala iti |
XXhvsatssu:15820: kṣāntiguṇo yogāvacaro 'nuvicintayati- ahaṃ yadi paraṃ dviṣāmi |
XXhvsatssu:15821: tadā pṛthagjanasya grāmīṇasya tasya [mama] ca nāsti bhedaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:15824: suvinīto yathā hastī sahate śaramastrakam tathā cāhamapīhaiva titikṣe sarvapāpakam || iti
XXhvsatssu:15827: na kṣametādhamaḥ sattvaḥ śilavṛṣṭiṃ yathā khagaḥ ||
XXhvsatssu:15829: kṣameta hi māhasattvaḥ puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ yathā gajaḥ || iti |
XXhvsatssu:15833: yogāvacara ime sattvā mūḍhā avijñā bālasamānā na vidveṣyā iti prajānāti |
XXhvsatssu:15838: atyantasukhāsaktān dṛṣṭvā ca cintayati- kathamahaṃ parapraṇihitaṃ hāpayeyamiti |
XXhvsatssu:15840: duḥkhinaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭadharme duḥkhitvāt duḥkhī bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:15843: ataḥ sarve sattvā duḥkhabhāgina ādāvante vā na vimuktilābhina ityanena pratyayena karuṇāyate
XXhvsatssu:15845: (u) yogāvacaraḥ parahiterṣyālutā pṛthagjanalakṣaṇamiti dṛṣṭvā muditāṃ bhāvayati |
XXhvsatssu:15862: | (pṛ) ābhidharmikāḥ kecidāhuḥ- tṛtīyadhyānādūrdhvaṃ nāsti saumanasyendriyam iti |
XXhvsatssu:15885: yaḥ sattvānāṃ sukhākāṃkṣī sa sukhavipākaṃ labhate |
XXhvsatssu:15888: ākāśe ca rūpaṃ nāstītyato vijñānānantyāyatanacittasyālambane paramasukhavihāritvāt |
XXhvsatssu:15901: bhagavānapramāṇasūtra āha- iha bhikṣurmaitrasahagatena cetasā ekāṃ
XXhvsatssu:15904: ityūrdhvamadhastiryak[sarvadā sarvatratāyai] sarvāvantaṃ lokaṃ [maitrasahagatena cetasā] sphuritvā viharati iti |
XXhvsatssu:15905: rūpārūpyakadhātukasattvā anityā bhaṅgurā durgati gāmina ityasti hetuḥ |
XXhvsatssu:15910: | (pṛ) yadi tanna jātā api upasampadya viharanti |
XXhvsatssu:15917: (u) astīdṛśaṃ karma satyapi nivṛttihetau na nivartante |
XXhvsatssu:15927: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yadi kaścidekāgracittena dharmaṃ śṛṇoti |
XXhvsatssu:15931: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- bhāvayatha bhikṣavo maitracittam, pratijānāmi anāgāmiphalaṃ prāpsyatheti
XXhvsatssu:15934: ata ucyate maitrī bhāvanayā anāgāmiphalaṃ labhata iti |
XXhvsatssu:15948: bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatkṣayāya vīryamārabhate |
XXhvsatssu:15951: duḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭvā [tat] apaneṣyāmīti niyamena cittoddhāpanaṃ mahākaruṇā |
XXhvsatssu:15955: karuṇācittaṃ hi parasya pāpakaṃ smṛtvā pratighātamutpādayet |
XXhvsatssu:15957: karuṇācittaṃ kadācit ghanaṃ, kadācit tanīyaḥ, na samaṃ bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:15959: ātmano hitaṃ tyaktvā parasya hitamātramākāṃkṣata iti mahākaruṇā |
XXhvsatssu:15964: 160 pañcāṅgāryasamādhivargaḥ uktaṃ hi sūtre- pañcāṅga[bhūtā] āryasamādhayaḥ yaduta prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittaviśuddhiḥ prakāśalakṣaṇaṃ bhāvanālakṣaṇamiti |
XXhvsatssu:15970: prakāśalakṣaṇaṃ bhāvanālakṣaṇasya hetuṃ kṛtvā pañcaskandhān paribhedayati |
XXhvsatssu:15976: svayamāha- yogī cintayati mamāyaṃ samādhirāryo nirāmiṣa iti
XXhvsatssu:15979: samādhirayaṃ śāntaḥ praṇītaḥ prītipraśrabdhilabdha iti tṛtīyajñānamutpadyate |
XXhvsatssu:15980: ayaṃ samādhiḥ pratyutpannasukha āyatyāñca sukhavipāka iti caturthajñānamutpadyate |
XXhvsatssu:15981: sa khalu punarahamimaṃ samādhiṃ smṛta eva samāpadye smṛta eva vyuttiṣṭhāmīti pañcamaṃ jñānamutpadyate
XXhvsatssu:15987: samādhiṃ kṛtvā āryaṃ nirāmiṣaṃ chandayāmītīdaṃ prathamajñānamucyate |
XXhvsatssu:15998: tāpavinirmuktaṃ sukhaṃ pratyutpannasukhamāyatīsukham, pratyutpannaṃ sukhaṃ kleśavinirmuktaṃ
XXhvsatssu:16003: ato nityaṃ smṛto vyuttiṣṭhati smṛtaḥ samādhimusampadyate |
XXhvsatssu:16009: (pṛ) uktaṃ sūtre- samādhayaḥ ṣaṭ aṣṭyekalakṣaṇabhāvanā ekalakṣaṇatvāya saṃvartate |
XXhvsatssu:16023: ekalakṣaṇā bhāvanā ekalakṣaṇanānālakṣaṇatvāya saṃvartata iti yadi kaścit samādhimupādāya dhyānasamādhiṃ pañcaskandhopāya ñcotpādayati |
XXhvsatssu:16025: (pṛ) kecidārmidharmikā āhuḥ- ekalakṣaṇā bhāvanā ekalakṣaṇatvāya saṃvartata iti yadi kaścit caturthadhyānamupādāya arhatphalaṃ sākṣātkaroti tat |
XXhvsatssu:16026: ekalakṣaṇā bhāvanā nānālakṣaṇāya saṃvartata iti yat kaścit caturthadhyānamupādāya pañcābhijñāḥ sākṣātkaroti tat |
XXhvsatssu:16027: ekalakṣaṇā bhāvanā ekalakṣaṇanānālakṣaṇāya saṃvartata iti yat kaścit caturthaṃ dhyānamupādāyārhatphalaṃ pañcābhijñāśca sākṣātkaroti tat |
XXhvsatssu:16028: nānālakṣaṇā bhāvanā nānālakṣaṇāya saṃvartata iti yat kaścit pañcāṅgabhūtasamādhīnupādāyārhatphalaṃ pañcābhijñāśca sākṣātkaroti |
XXhvsatssu:16045: (u) kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ yogī nirodhasamāpattāvatāramicchatītyato dhyāneṣu samāpatti (= praveśa) vyutthāne kramike |
XXhvsatssu:16046: tasmānna syāt yadi vānulomyena yadi vā prātilomyena yadi vānulomyaprātilomyena vyutkramādiḥ
XXhvsatssu:16048: yogī nirodhasamāpattiṃ prāpayituravaśyaṃ kramaśo 'vataret kramaśaśca vyuttiṣṭhet |
XXhvsatssu:16052: yathā ca vidagdho jano na punarabhiramate mūḍhe |
XXhvsatssu:16056: sūtre kevalamuktaṃ kramikā dhyānasamādhīnāṃ (SSS_398) samāpattaya iti |
XXhvsatssu:16060: yathā kaścit śreṇimāruhya ekaṃ sopānaṃ vyutkramet na dvau |
XXhvsatssu:16066: sūtre yadyapyuktaṃ bhagavatā nirvāṇaṃ samāpadyamāno 'nulomapratilomaṃ vyutkramya dhyānasamādhīn samāpadyata iti
XXhvsatssu:16072: yadi yogino nirodhasamāpattāvatāraṃ vadati tadānulomyena samāpattiḥ syāt naikakṣaṇe pañcadhā
XXhvsatssu:16073: yogī yadi sākṣānnirodhasamāpattyavatāramicchati tadā naikakṣaṇe syāt |
XXhvsatssu:16074: yadi dhyānasamādhiṣu svacittaṃ bubhukṣati, vaśitvāparihāṇitvāt anulomapratilomaṃ vyuttiṣṭhati samāpadyate vyutkrāmati ca |
XXhvsatssu:16075: yathā kaścidaśvamārūḍho yadi pratibalaruddhaḥ, tadā nāvaśyaṃ pratinivartate |
XXhvsatssu:16082: yaduktaṃ yathā na kaścit bālakrīḍāyāmabhiramata iti |
XXhvsatssu:16084: yathā kaścidvṛddho naṭaḥ sarvadā nṛtyati na tṛpto bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:16086: evamāryaḥ anulomapratilomaṃ dhyāneṣu vyuttiṣṭhati samāpadyate vyutkrāmati ca devamanuṣyāṇāṃ pradarśanakāmitvāt maharṣīṇāṃ samādhiṣu vaśitābalācca |
XXhvsatssu:16087: bhagavān parinirvāṇagamanakāle paramapraṇītadhyānasamādhibhirvāsitaśarīratvāt svatantraṃ samāpadyata vyudatiṣṭhat anulomaṃ pratilomaṃ vyudakrāmīt |
XXhvsatssu:16094: bodhisattvapiṭaka uktaṃ vyuktrāntilakṣaṇam- prathamadhyānāt vyutkramya nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate |
XXhvsatssu:16099: śāstramāha- sapta niśrayāḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ niśrityāsravakṣayaṃ labhate |
XXhvsatssu:16105: samādhimimaṃ niśritya āsravāṇāṃ kṣayākhyaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ dharmaṃ prārthayīta |
XXhvsatssu:16109: bhagavānāha- yogī yenākāreṇa yenālambanena prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate
XXhvsatssu:16110: sa yogī tadākāraṃ tadālambanaṃ na punaḥ smarati |
XXhvsatssu:16111: kintu paśyati prathamadhyāne yadrūpāṇi yadi vā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghato 'nityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmataḥ |
XXhvsatssu:16116: yogī kāmadhātumohitaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ nirvāṇamiti paśyati |
XXhvsatssu:16123: atikramya sapta niśrayān asti āryamārgapratilambhanam iti |
XXhvsatssu:16139: kasmādāha bhagavān saptaniśrayāḥ sapta saṃjñāsamādhaya iti |
XXhvsatssu:16141: sarve niśryāḥ saṃjñākaluṣitā na vimokṣāya bhavanti ityataḥ saṃjñāsamādhirityākhyā |
XXhvsatssu:16142: āryāstu saṃjñāṃ bhaṅktvā samādhimimaṃ niśritya āsravāṇāṃ kṣayamupādadate |
XXhvsatssu:16144: yathoktaṃ yogī dharmānimān paśyati rogato gaṇḍata iti |
XXhvsatssu:16148: śāstramāha- sūtra uktaṃ- aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ- adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā
XXhvsatssu:16156: ato jñāyate yogāvacaraḥ prathamavimokṣe krameṇa kāyarūpamabhibhavatīti |
XXhvsatssu:16160: ato na paśyati adhyātmaṃ bahirdhā rūpañca |
XXhvsatssu:16164: antarbahiśca no paśyan ahaṃ pṛcchāmi vastvidam || iti |
XXhvsatssu:16167: ṣaḍdhātusūtre- yo bhikṣavaḥ pañcasu dhātuṣu atyantanirviṇṇaḥ, [tasya]
XXhvsatssu:16187: (u) tīrthikā vimokṣādhimuktyā rūpalakṣaṇaṃ vināśayanti na tu śūnyabhāvanayā |
XXhvsatssu:16189: yathābhāvanādhimuktiprayogaṃ mṛtaparityaktaṃ kāyaṃ śmāśānikakṛmayo bhakṣayanti ityādi paśyanti
XXhvsatssu:16195: āryāḥ punarārūpyasamādhimupādāya caturaḥ skandhān rogata ityādyaṣṭabhirākāraiḥ paśyanti |
XXhvsatssu:16204: na tu vivicya ayaṃ cittanirodhaḥ ayaṃ kleśakṣaya iti |
XXhvsatssu:16205: yathoktaṃ sūtre- nirodho dvividhaḥ [kṣaya]nirodhaḥ anupūrvanirodha iti |
XXhvsatssu:16212: kiñcoktaṃ (SSS_402) sūtre nirodhasamāpattimupasampanno bhikṣuḥ kṛtakaraṇīya iti |
XXhvsatssu:16219: yogāvacaro yadi kṣayanirodhaṃ pratilabdhvā na dhyānasamādhīn samāpadyate
XXhvsatssu:16221: yadi dhyānasamādhīn samāpadyate na kṣayanirodhaṃ labhate |
XXhvsatssu:16230: (pṛ) anupūrva[vihāre]ṣu nirodho vimokṣeṣu nirodhaśca kiṃ nānā |
XXhvsatssu:16244: naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ samāpannasya ākiñca nyāyatanasaṃjñā niruddhā bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:16245: nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpannasya saṃjñā ca vedanā ca niruddhā bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:16247: eṣu nirodheṣu nirodho viśiṣṭo yaduta yogāvacaro rāgadveṣamohebhyo nirviṇṇo vimucyate |
XXhvsatssu:16248: (pṛ) kathaṃ jñāyate anupūrveṣu cittacaittānāṃ nirodhaḥ vimokṣeṣu kleśānāṃ nirodha iti |
XXhvsatssu:16259: jñātavyaṃ nirvāṇaṃ sakṣātkurvataḥ sarve kleśā nirudhyanta iti |
XXhvsatssu:16268: kathaṃ sa kāyacittaśūnyatāṃ labhate kleśāṃśca kṣapayati |
XXhvsatssu:16272: yathoktaṃ sūtre- mama bhikṣavaścīvaramupāditsoḥ kleśo bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:16284: samāpattiḥ dhyānavimokṣasamādhiṣu vaśitābalalābhaḥ yathāha- śāriputraḥ- saptabodhyaṅgeṣu samāpattiṃ vyutthānañca vaśīkaromi iti |
XXhvsatssu:16292: yadyupekṣācittaṃ nāsti tadāsamāpattiṃ samāpadyate iti nāsti dūṣaṇam |
XXhvsatssu:16293: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yogāvacaraścatura ṛddhipādān samyagabhyasan himavantaṃ parvatarājaṃ tathā dhamati yathā
XXhvsatssu:16296: ato jñāyate aṣṭavimokṣeṣūcyate āsravakṣayanirodhaḥ na nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyata iti
XXhvsatssu:16297: uktañca sūtre- asti vidyāsvabhāvaḥ asti śūnyasvabhāvaḥ,
XXhvsatssu:16307: pañcaskandhān prajñaptilakṣaṇān yo na paribhedayati tasyāvidyā bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:16311: bhikṣumanuśāsti- śūnyeṣu sarvasaṃskāreṣu saṃskārān śūnyān bhāvayitvā damaya svacittam iti
XXhvsatssu:16312: yathā kaścitpradīpamādāya śūnyāgāraṃ praviśya paśyati sarvaṃ śūnyamiti |
XXhvsatssu:16321: (pṛ) ime svabhāvāḥ kaṃ samādhiṃ niśritya pratilabhyante |
XXhvsatssu:16323: vidyāsvabhāvo yāvat naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasvabhāvaḥ sarvaṃ khayaṃ samādhisamāpattiviharaṇātpratilabhate yaduta saṃskṛtamārgaviharaṇātpratilabhata iti |
XXhvsatssu:16329: yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasvabhāvaḥ, sarve saṃskṛtadharmāḥ śūnyā iti nirodhasamāpattyā nirodhaṃ pratilabhate |
XXhvsatssu:16331: ato jñāyate atrokto nirodhaḥ kṣayanirodho nirvāṇamiti |
XXhvsatssu:16333: (u) yogāvacaro rūpaparibhedecchayā kāmadhātupratilabdhaṃ samādhiṃ vā rūpadhātupratilabdhaṃ vā samādhiṃ niśrayamāṇo rūpaṃ śūnyaṃ pratilabhate |
XXhvsatssu:16339: 164 aṣṭābhibhvāyatanavargaḥ adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī [eko] bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni suvarṇadurvarṇāni
XXhvsatssu:16343: adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati adhimātrāṇi[suvarṇadurvarṇānīti vistaro yāvat]
XXhvsatssu:16345: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni [suvarṇadurvarṇānīti yāvat] idaṃ tṛtīya[mabhibhvāyatana]m
XXhvsatssu:16346: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhī rūpāṇi paśyati adhimātrāṇi [suvarṇadurvarṇānīti yāvat] idaṃ [caturthamabhibhvāyatana]m |
XXhvsatssu:16347: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanirbhāsāni tadyathā umakāpuṣpaṃ[sampannaṃ] vārāṇaseyaṃ vā vastraṃ[nīlaṃ nīlavarṇaṃ nīlanidarśanaṃ nīlanirbhāsam |
XXhvsatssu:16356: na kevalaṃ santīmāni nīlādīni catvāri rūpāṇi |
XXhvsatssu:16366: (u) pūrvaṃ sāsravāṇi santi śūnyatayā rūpāṇāṃ paribhede 'nāsravāṇi bhavanti |
XXhvsatssu:16369: ato bhagavān śrāvakāṇāṃ kṛta āha- abhibhvāyatanamiti |
XXhvsatssu:16373: navānupūrvavihārāḥ- catvāri dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ nirodhasamāpattiśca |
XXhvsatssu:16383: na hi kaściccakṣuṣā rūpaṃ na paśyati |
XXhvsatssu:16384: śrotreṇa śabdaṃ na śṛṇoti, ghrāṇena gandhaṃ na jighrati, rasanayā rasaṃ na
XXhvsatssu:16388: yathoktam- rūpādayaḥ padārthā na kāmā iti |
XXhvsatssu:16390: vyavasāyī khalu rūpādiṣu sthitvaiva kāmaṃ prajahāti |
XXhvsatssu:16391: yathoktaṃ sūtre- rūpādayastadbhāgā na kāmā bhavanti iti |
XXhvsatssu:16393: yasya rāgacittaṃ bhavati sa kāmān paryeṣate |
