XXhvsatssu:18848: prītipratisaṃvedī praśvasiṣyāmīti śikṣate || sukhapratisaṃvedī āśvasiṣyāmīti śikṣate |
XXhvsatssu:18849: sukhapratisaṃvedī praśvasiṣyāmīti śikṣate || cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasiṣyāmīti śikṣate
XXhvsatssu:18852: praśrambhayan cittasaṃskāraṃ praśvasiṣyāmīti śikṣate || cittapratisaṃvedī āśvasiṣyāmīti śikṣate |
XXhvsatssu:18853: cittapratisaṃvedī praśvasiṣyāmīti śikṣate || abhipramodayan cittamāśvasiṣyāmīti śikṣate |
XXhvsatssu:18854: abhipramodayan cittaṃ praśvasiṣyāmīti śikṣate || samādadhan cittamāśvasiṣyāmīti śikṣate |
XXhvsatssu:18855: samādadhan cittaṃ praśvasiṣyāmīti śikṣate || vimocayan cittamāśvasiṣyāmīti śikṣate |
XXhvsatssu:18856: vimocayan cittaṃ praśvasiṣyāmīti śikṣate || anityānudarśī āśvasiṣyāmīti śikṣate |
XXhvsatssu:18857: anityānudarśī praśvasiṣyāmīti śikṣate || virāgānudarśī āśvasiṣyāmīti śikṣate |
XXhvsatssu:18860: nirodhānudarśī praśvasiṣyāmīti śikṣate || pratinissargānudarśī āśvasiṣyāmīti śikṣate |
XXhvsatssu:18866: tathā yogyapi audārike citte pravṛtte hrasvaṃ [śvasati]
XXhvsatssu:18868: dīrghaṃ śvasatīti yadi yogī sūkṣmacitte sthitaḥ, [tadā] tasyāśvāsapraśvāsā dīrghā bhavanti
XXhvsatssu:18871: yathā tasyaiva klāntasya viśrāntasya āśrāsapraśvāsā sūkṣmā anupatanti |
XXhvsatssu:18872: tasmin samaye dīrghā aśvāsa praśvāsā bhavanti |
XXhvsatssu:18874: yogī kāye tucchādhimuktaḥ sarvaromakūpeṣu vāyumantarbahiścāriṇaṃ paśyati |
XXhvsatssu:18876: dhātubalalābhino vyupaśāntacittasya yogina audārikā āśvāsapraśvāsā vyupaśāntā bhavanti |
XXhvsatssu:18885: prītamanasaḥ kāyaḥ praśrabhyate, praśrabdhakāyaḥ sukhaṃ vindate
XXhvsatssu:18893: vedanāyāṃ rāgo jāyata ityato vedanāṃ cittasaṃskāraṃ paśyati |
XXhvsatssu:18899: yogī praśrambhayan vedanāsvādaṃ paśyati cittaṃ śāntaṃ na līnaṃ noddhatam |
XXhvsatssu:18915: (pṛ) kasmādānāpānasmṛtirāryavihāra iti divyavihāra iti brahmavihāra iti
XXhvsatssu:18927: (u) aśubhabhāvanayā alabdhavairāgyasya ātmadurviṇṇasya kāyacitte vyāmohite syātām |
XXhvsatssu:18930: yathā valgumuttitīrṣayā bhikṣavo 'śubhabhāvanayā atīva nirviṇṇā viṣapānabhṛgupatanādibhirvividhairātmānaṃ dhnanti sma |
XXhvsatssu:18931: na tathā ime ṣoḍaśākārā vairāgyaprāpakā api na durnivedajanakā bhavantītyato viśiṣyante
XXhvsatssu:18939: sarve hi kleśā vitarkaṃ pratītya jāyante |
XXhvsatssu:18950: yathā anyadvastu smarati citte sadā āśvāsapraśvāsā bhavanti |
XXhvsatssu:18952: yathā ca pratibimbaṃ svayaṃ pravartate na puruṣaḥ karoti |
XXhvsatssu:18978: [ṣaṭ pratyayā] yaduta gaṇanā anubandhanā śamatho vipaśyanā vivartanaṃ pariśuddhiḥ |
XXhvsatssu:18980: triprakārā gaṇanā samā vā atiriktā vā nyūnā vā |
XXhvsatssu:18981: samā nāma daśasu satsu daśeti gaṇayati |
XXhvsatssu:18985: vipaśyanā nāma yogī āśvāsapraśvāsān kāyānubaddhān maṇiṣu sūtravatpaśyati |
XXhvsatssu:18987: vivartanaṃ nāma cittaṃ pratītya kāyasya pravṛttiḥ, cittaṃ pratītya ca vedanāyāḥ |
XXhvsatssu:18989: pariśuddhirnāma yogini sarvakleśaiḥ sarvākṣaṇaiśca vimukte cittaṃ pariśudhyati |
XXhvsatssu:18993: yato yogī kevalamānāpāne cittaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayan sarvān vitarkānupacchedayati |
XXhvsatssu:18994: yaḥ ṣoḍaśavidhamācarituṃ samarthaḥ sa paripūrṇa ityucyate |
XXhvsatssu:19004: pañcaskandheṣu nirākṛteṣu prajñaptirnirākṛteti kaḥ punarupayoga ānāpānasmṛtyā |
XXhvsatssu:19015: uktañca sūtre yogī ānāpānaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ dīrgha[māśvasan] vā [śikṣate] hrasvaṃ vā sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī vā praśrambhayan kāyasaṃskāraṃ vā [śikṣate] |
XXhvsatssu:19022: sūtretūktam- yogī ānāpāne [sthitaḥ] kāye samudayadharmānudarśī vyayadharmānudarśī, samudayavyayadharmānudarśī viharatīti |
XXhvsatssu:19035: (u) yoginaḥ śūnya tāmanusmarato na prītipramodyaṃ jāyate |
XXhvsatssu:19036: asti sattva iti saṃjñayā hi prītiprāmodyaṃ jāyate |
XXhvsatssu:19037: pañcasu skandheṣu nāsti sattvaḥ, kathaṃ prītiprāmodyaṃ bhaviṣyati |
XXhvsatssu:19038: yogī evamanusmaret- hetupratyayai vividhā dharmā jāyate yadutātapālokādayo dharmāḥ |
XXhvsatssu:19040: ye prītiprāmodyakarā dharmāḥ te sarve parimārgitā vyagravikṣepakā iti paśyato yogina audārikaṃ prītiprāmodyaṃ nirudhyate |
XXhvsatssu:19046: ayaṃ yogī upaśamaṃ bhāvayan kleśānāṃ kṣayamicchati |
XXhvsatssu:19051: | loke yāni bhairavasthānāni tāni sarvāṇi yogī paśyati |
XXhvsatssu:19052: tāni sarvāṇi anityaṃ vikṣepakamiti parīkṣya [tāni] nānuvidadhīta |
XXhvsatssu:19062: na hiṃsāprayogapratyaya ityanusmarato na bhavati bhīrutā |
XXhvsatssu:19087: yathā vā dāntā vīṇāyāstantryo 'tyāyatā vātiśithilā vā ubhayathā na svaraṃ sādhayanti |
XXhvsatssu:19089: yathā bhagavānanuruddhamāha- atyārabdhavīryasya kausīdyaṃ bhavet iti |
XXhvsatssu:19114: punastrividhaṃ samādhau samāpattilakṣaṇaṃ sthitilakṣaṇaṃ vyutthānalakṣaṇam iti |
XXhvsatssu:19117: yadāha- ahameva samādhimupasampadya viharāmi na tu sa itīdaṃ mānaṃ bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:19118: yadāha- sa evopasampadya viharati nāhamitīdaṃ mānakalpaṃ bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:19123: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo bhikṣurekadharmeṇa samanvitaḥ sa na paśyati cakṣuranityamiti |
XXhvsatssu:19125: (pṛ) sarve 'vītarāgāḥ sattvā kiṃ na paśyanti cakṣuranityamiti |
XXhvsatssu:19128: pratyutpanne (SSS_474) samutpannarāgo na paśyati cakṣuranityamiti iti vaktavyam |
XXhvsatssu:19135: sūtre coktā srayodaśa kṛṣṇadharmāḥ samādhipratikūlāḥ trayodaśa śukladharmāḥ samādhyanukūlāḥ
XXhvsatssu:19142: atha santi trayo dharmāḥ ayoniśomanaskāro duścaritamatilīnacittatā |
XXhvsatssu:19145: atha santi trayo dharmā auddhatyamindriyeṣvaguptadvāratā śīlavipannatā |
XXhvsatssu:19146: atha santi trayo dharmāḥ asrāddhyaṃ dauśśīlyaṃ kausīdyamiti |
XXhvsatssu:19147: atha santi trayo dharmāḥ sajjane 'ratiḥ saddharmaśravaṇe dveṣaḥ paradoṣaprakaṭane prītiḥ
XXhvsatssu:19148: ata santi trayo dharmaḥ agauravatā saṃkathyadūṣaṇaṃ duṣprajñasevanam |
XXhvsatssu:19149: trīn dharmānaprahāya na prajahāti asatkāraṃ saṃkathyadūṣaṇaṃ duṣprajñasevanam
XXhvsatssu:19151: ahrīkyamanapatrāpyaṃ pramādaṃ prahāya prajahāti asatkāraṃ saṃkathyadūṣaṇaṃ duṣprajñasevanam
XXhvsatssu:19152: [evaṃ] yāvatsatkāyadṛṣṭiṃ śīlavrataparāmarśaṃ vicikitsāṃ prajahan prajahāti rāgadveṣamohān jarāvyādhimaraṇāni ca tarati |
XXhvsatssu:19157: muṣitasmṛtyasaṃ prajanyavikṣiptacittānāṃ samuccheda eva yat caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ bhāvanā
XXhvsatssu:19161: ahrīkyānapatrāpyapramādānāñca samuccheda eva yat gṛhiṇaḥ pariśuddhiḥ |
XXhvsatssu:19163: yat kaścit rahogataḥ pāpakaṃ kṛtvā na lajjate tadāhrīkyam |
XXhvsatssu:19164: yat sa pāpakacittapravṛtterūrdhvaṃ saṅghamadhye 'pi pāpakaṃ kṛtvā nāpatrapate
XXhvsatssu:19170: evaṃ sati ācāryaṃ parivarjya ciraṃ durjanopasadanaṃ duṣprajñasevanam |
XXhvsatssu:19177: durjanaṃ sevamānaḥ [ārya]śāsanamaśraddadhāna āha- nāsti duṣkṛtasya vipāka iti |
XXhvsatssu:19178: duṣkṛtamācaran vipākaṃ vindata iti śṛṇvanmātro vā kukkaṭaśvādidharmaṃ samādāyātyantikapāpameva kāṅkṣate |
XXhvsatssu:19180: kausīdyāt sajjane 'prīto bhavati yat tattvato nāsti samyak caryāvihārīti |
XXhvsatssu:19181: saddharmaśravaṇaṃ dviṣan āha samyak caritadharmā mithyādharmāḥ nāsti tataḥ kaścanopakāra iti
XXhvsatssu:19182: | cittakaṣāyāt paradoṣaprakaṭane prīta āha- parasya dharmacaryāto matsadṛśaṃ nāsti kiñcilabdhamiti
XXhvsatssu:19191: cittasya mohāt na trīṇi saṃyojanāni samucchedayati |
XXhvsatssu:19196: tasmin varṣe māse ayane samādhimamukaṃ nālabha iti cintayato yoginaḥ śoko jāyate |
XXhvsatssu:19201: saṃkṣipya yāvaccīvarapiṇḍapātādayo dharmāḥ kuśalamūlāpakarṣaḥ akuśalamūlaprakarṣaśca sarvāṇi samādherapakṣālāni bhavanti |
XXhvsatssu:19205: (pṛ) bhagavān tatra tatra sūtre bhikṣūnāmantryāha- [iha bhikṣuḥ]
XXhvsatssu:19206: araṇyagato vāyatanagato vā vṛkṣamūlagato vā śūnyāgāragato vā manasi kuryāt dvau dharmau yaduta śamatho vipaśyanāca iti |
XXhvsatssu:19211: sarve ca kuśaladharmā bhāvanājātā iti dvāvimau parigṛhītau |
XXhvsatssu:19244: laukikāḥ sattvāḥ sarve sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā iti dvayorantayoḥ patitāḥ |
XXhvsatssu:19275: (pṛ) yadi śamatho vipaśyanā cittaṃ bhāvayati prajñāṃ bhāvayati |
XXhvsatssu:19288: yathoktaṃ sūtre- śamatho bhāvito rāgaṃ prajahātīti |
XXhvsatssu:19293: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yogī nirāmiṣāṃ prītiṃ labhamānaḥ sāmiṣāṃ prītiṃ jahāti iti |
XXhvsatssu:19296: avidyāprahāṇāddhi rāgādayaḥ kleśāḥ prahīyante nirudhyante nāvaśiṣyante |
XXhvsatssu:19302: asti ca dvidhā vimuktiḥ sāmayikavimuktiḥ akopyavimuktiriti |
XXhvsatssu:19310: | samayavimukto hi yat adhikabalena kañcitkālaṃ saṃyojanāni vighnayati nātyantaṃ prajahāti
XXhvsatssu:19330: ato māraḥ śaikṣo vivṛttakāyaskandhaṃ mṛta iti ācaturdigantaṃ tadvijñāpanāya yena bhagavān tenopasaṃkramya bhagavantametadavocat |
XXhvsatssu:19333: atha khalu bhagavān [māra iti viditvā ta]mavocat |
XXhvsatssu:19350: nāsti tu kaścit [kevalaṃ] śamathaṃ spṛṣṭvā rāgamātyantikaṃ prajahātīti |
XXhvsatssu:19351: tathā cet tīrthikā api rāgamātyantikaṃ prajahyuḥ |
XXhvsatssu:19366: yadi smṛtyupasthānādīni nirvedhabhāgīyāni spṛṣṭvā cittaṃ parigṛhṇāti |
XXhvsatssu:19368: sarve ca yogino dvāvimau dharmau niśritya cittaṃ nirudhya vimuktiṃ spṛśanti ||
XXhvsatssu:19375: pratyakṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ khalu kāyikaṃ karma pratikṣaṇavināśyapi bhāvanāvaśādvibhinnakauśalaṃ bhavati
XXhvsatssu:19376: bhāvanāvaśāt ciraṃ punaḥ punaḥ pravartyamānaṃ sat sukaraṃ bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:19378: anuvihitāvṛtti āvṛttyā ca praguṇīkṛtaṃ dṛḍhībhūtañca susmaraṇaṃ bhavati yathādhyayanādi |
XXhvsatssu:19379: mānasaṃ karma ca kṣaṇikamapi bhāvayitavyamiti jñātavyam
XXhvsatssu:19385: yathā kaścit punaḥ punarmaithunacittaṃ bhāvayan bahūn kāmānabhinirvartayati |
XXhvsatssu:19387: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo yadvastucittaṃ manasi karoti sa tatra pratipannaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:19391: ato jñāyate cittamidaṃ kṣaṇikamapi bhāvayitavyaṃ bhavatīti |
XXhvsatssu:19394: yathoktaṃsūtre- yogī khalu ayoniśo manasikārāt kāmādīnāsravānanutpannānutpādayati |
XXhvsatssu:19398: tadyathā bījādaṅkuramaṅkurātkāṇḍaṃ kāṇḍānnāḷaṃ nāḷāt patraṃ patrātpuṣpaṃ puṣpātphalamiti pratyakṣato hetuto 'nupūrvaṃ vivardhate |
XXhvsatssu:19400: pratyakṣato dṛṣṭaṃ khalu vāsitatilasya gandhaḥ saṃṅgkrātyā vardhata iti |
XXhvsatssu:19402: ato jñāyate kṣaṇikā dharmā api bhāvayitavyā iti |
XXhvsatssu:19407: (u) nāsti kaścidvidyamānadharmaḥ sarve ca dharmāḥ kṣaṇikā iti pūrvameva sādhitam |
XXhvsatssu:19410: svarūpata eva sadāsthitasya bhāvanayā ka upakāraḥ |
XXhvsatssu:19420: ato 'prāptaṃ na bhāvyata iti tava vacanaṃ na dūṣaṇāya bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:19421: pratyakṣato dṛśyate ca hetuphalayorayaugapadye 'pi bhavatyeva hetoḥ phalaṃ bhavatīti |
XXhvsatssu:19424: evaṃ prajñā pūrvacitaṃ bhāvayati tadūrdhvacittamupacitaṃ bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:19436: yathā bhavatāṃ sūtra uktaṃ- agnisaṃyogādaṇuṣu kṛṣṇavarṇe niruddhe raktavarṇaṃ jāyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:19439: yadyādāvagnisaṃyuktadharmasya raktavarṇamutpadyata iti punaḥ paścādagnisaṃyuktadharmaḥ kimartham
XXhvsatssu:19444: yadi bhavatāmabhisandhiḥ raktavarṇaṃ kramaśo jāyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:19447: sarve dharmā sahetusapratyayā api kramaśo jāyante |
XXhvsatssu:19449: evaṃ prajñāsamādhyādayo dharmāḥ kṣaṇikā api avaramadhyottamadharmakrameṇa jāyante |
XXhvsatssu:19451: yathā pakṣacchadasyoṣmaṇi mṛdunyapi aṇḍaṃ kramaśo vikriyate |
XXhvsatssu:19458: ātmacetanayā sarva, sarva pāke kālamapekṣate || iti |
XXhvsatssu:19460: yathā bahubhiḥ puṣpairekasmin samaye tilaṃ vāsayati na yathā puṣpālpāni kramaśaściraṃ vāsayanti
XXhvsatssu:19461: medasā paripuṣṭiḥ jale [naukā] nimajjanaṃ bhittinirmāṇaṃ ityādirapi tathā |
XXhvsatssu:19465: bālakādīnāṃ śarīraṃ stanyapānādinā paripacyata itīdamapi tathā syāt |
XXhvsatssu:19466: ato jñāyate dharmabhāvanā sūkṣmā praṇītā duravabodhā ceti |
XXhvsatssu:19475: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yaḥ kuśaladharmeṣu na bhāvanāyogamanuyuktaḥ kuśaladharmānanupādāya kevalaṃ praṇidadhāti āsravebhyaścittavimokam |
XXhvsatssu:19484: kintu pariśuddhatailaṃ pariśuddhavartikāñcobhayamapekṣya [anya]vastusaṃsparśacāñcalyarāhitye ca tatprakāśaḥ pariśuddho bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:19487: nāpi ca praṇidhānamātrāt deho rūpaṃ balañca labhate |
XXhvsatssu:19491: ko jñānī hetoḥ phalaṃ jāyata iti prajānan taddhetumupekṣya anyasmātphalamākāṃkṣeta |
XXhvsatssu:19492: dharma bhāvayan dṛṣṭa eva phalavipākaṃ paśyati |
XXhvsatssu:19494: tiṣṭhantu saptadināni mayā śāsitāḥ śrāvakā muhūrtaṃ tāvatkuśaladharmaṃ bhāvayanto 'pramāṇavarṣeṣu nityaṃ sukhāṃ vedanāṃ spṛśanti iti |
XXhvsatssu:19499: bhikṣūnāmantryāha- aśaṭhasya māmupasaṅkramato yanmayā prātarupadiṣṭo dharmaḥ tadartha sāyaṃ vindate |
XXhvsatssu:19500: yat sāyamupadiṣṭo dharmaḥ prātastaddhitaṃ vindata iti |
XXhvsatssu:19501: yaccārhanmārgaṃ spṛśati na tat parapudgalaḥ prayacchati |
XXhvsatssu:19504: anuttaraṃ buddhamārga eva nanu kuśaladharmasyopacitabhāvanayā spṛśati |
XXhvsatssu:19506: sūtre- bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantryāha- dvau dharmau niśrityāhamanuttaraṃ
XXhvsatssu:19507: mārgaṃ samāpannaḥ yat śubhābhiratāvanirvedo mārgabhāvanāyāmaklāntiśca iti
XXhvsatssu:19521: ataḥ prājñena bhāvanārabdhavyā, mā parikhedo janayitavyaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:19522: yogī sucaritacaryāyā asti phalavipāka ityanusmṛtya alabhamāno 'pi na viṣādaṃ karoti |
XXhvsatssu:19523: kiñca yogī manasi kuryāt- mayā bhāvanāyāḥ phalavipāko 'nuprāpta eva |
XXhvsatssu:19529: ahaṃ mārgasamāpattipratyayasampannaḥ yat manuṣyadehaprāptiravikalendriyatā puṇyapāpavijñātṛtā vimuktāvapi cādhimuktatā abhyāgatasambuddhitā ityetaiḥ pratyayaiḥ samanvitaḥ kathaṃ na bhāvanāphalavipākamanuprāpsye vīryasamācaraṇamamoghameva |
XXhvsatssu:19531: (SSS_484) kleśānāṃ prahāṇamatisūkṣmaṃ dūravabodhaṃ vāśījaṭāyāṃ kramaśaḥ kṣayavat |
XXhvsatssu:19534: ato jñāyate kuśalaṃ bhāvayituṃ vīryamuttamaṃ bhavatīti |
XXhvsatssu:19535: alpīyasī prajñāpi kleśān vināśayati yathā alpīyān prakāśo 'ndhakāramapanayati |
XXhvsatssu:19543: yogī samanucintayet samādhisamāpattiratikṛcchrā yathā purā bodhisattvaḥ puṇyena prajñayā ca ghaniṣṭhaḥ ṣaṭvarṣāṇi vyavasyan ante 'nuprāptaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:19544: anyeṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ samādhisamāpattirapi kṛcchrā, kiṃ punarmama pṛthagjanasya mandendriyasya vegenānuprāptiriti |
XXhvsatssu:19546: yogibhiravaśyaṃ kartavyaṃ yat samādhibhāvanā, nāsti punaḥ karmāntaram |
XXhvsatssu:19556: sadā kuśalasya bhāvayitā dṛṣṭa eva kāyena āsravāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ spṛśet |
XXhvsatssu:19557: yadi vā maraṇakāle spṛśet yadi vā āyuṣo 'nte susthāna upapadya tadantarā spṛśet |
XXhvsatssu:19559: yogī adhyātmaṃ cittaṃ vīralakṣaṇaṃ puraskṛtyaivaṃ cintayati ahaṃ kleśāvaraṇamaparyādāya na kadācidvṛthā pratinivarta iti |
XXhvsatssu:19560: kiñca yogī mānacittamāśrityaivaṃ cintayati- śraddhādīni kuśalendriyāṇi santīti anye samādhiṃ pratipadyante |
XXhvsatssu:19563: yathā purā bodhisattvaḥ arāḍādibhyo munibhyo dharmaṃ śrutvaivamacintayat ime śraddhādikuśalendriyatvāt dharmamanuprāpnuvan |
XXhvsatssu:19565: yogī prajānāti- kleśā durbalāḥ prajñā balavatī |
XXhvsatssu:19567: yathoktaṃ- bhikṣuḥ ṣaḍbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato mukhamārutena himavantaṃ [parvatarājamapi] pradalayet |
XXhvsatssu:19569: kiñca yogī cintayati- ahaṃ pūrvādhvani na samādhiṃ bhāvitavān |
XXhvsatssu:19575: api ca yogī cintayati- yadyahaṃ sadā vīryamārabhe yadi cānanuprāptamanuprāpnomi |
XXhvsatssu:19583: prajñāptau prajñeti saṃjñā na tu jñānam |
XXhvsatssu:19586: āryaśrāvakāḥ prajñāsinā saṃyojanānubaddhān anuśayaparyavanaddhān sarvān kleśān samucchedayati
XXhvsatssu:19605: ayaṃ maitrīdharmaḥ paramārthato na saṃyojanaṃ samucchedayati |
XXhvsatssu:19607: yathoktaṃ- jñānāsiḥ sarvān kleśān samucchedayati iti |
XXhvsatssu:19608: ato jñāyate maitrī saṃyojanaṃ samucchedayatīti saṃjñāvacanam |
XXhvsatssu:19611: yat anityaṃ rūpaṃ anityamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
XXhvsatssu:19612: anityā vedanā, saṃjñā, saṃskārā, vijñānamanityamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
XXhvsatssu:19619: tattvajñānameva kleśān samucchedayatītyataḥ prajñaiva tattva[jñāna]miti jñāyate |
XXhvsatssu:19622: yogī paśyati vai loke sarve devāśca mānuṣāḥ |
XXhvsatssu:19624: laukikā bhūyasā tucchakaṃ nityaṃ sukhaṃ subhamityādi dṛṣṭvā tattvajñānādbhaṣṭā bhavanti |
XXhvsatssu:19628: āha ca bhagavān sūtre- yasya dhanaṃ vinaṣṭhaṃ, tasyālpīyān lābho vinaṣṭaḥ
XXhvsatssu:19629: | yasya prajñā vinaṣṭā, tasya mahīyān lābho vinaṣṭa iti |
XXhvsatssu:19632: āhaca- pradyotānāṃ candrasūryapradyota alpīyān prajñāpradyoto 'gra iti |
XXhvsatssu:19645: ato jñāyate prajñā vastutaḥ paramārthālambanā bhavatīti |
XXhvsatssu:19657: uktaṃ hi sūtre- kiṃ vijānāti vijñānam |
XXhvsatssu:19662: ato laukikaṃ cittaṃ prajñaptimātramālambate na tattvamiti bhavadvacanamayuktam |
XXhvsatssu:19668: yadāryaśrāvakāṇāṃ duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgānālambya anāsravasmṛtyā samprayuktā prajñā lokottarā
XXhvsatssu:19671: adhvanāṃ śatasāhasraṃ na yāvaddurgatau gataḥ || iti |
XXhvsatssu:19672: uktañca sūtre- mithyācāriṇaḥ susthāne janma bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:19679: āha ca bhagavān- trividhā prajñā śrutamayī prajñā, cintāmayī prajñā, bhāvanāmayī prajñā
XXhvsatssu:19684: āha ca pañcadharmā aparipavkaṃ vimukticittaṃ vipācayanti iti |
XXhvsatssu:19695: api cāha- dharmāṇāṃ sthitijñānaṃ nirvāṇajñānaṃ bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:19700: (pṛ) yo dharmo bhave pātakaḥ sa sāsravaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:19706: yadbhavatoktam- asti laukikaṃ cittamaprajñaptyavalambanaṃ yadviṣayādīnāṃ vijñānamiti |
XXhvsatssu:19709: āha khalu bhagavān- pṛthagjanāḥ satataṃ prajñaptimanudhāvantīti |
XXhvsatssu:19711: sarvapṛthagjanacittaṃ prajñaptiṃ na paryādātītyataḥ sadā asmitālakṣaṇamanudhāvati |
XXhvsatssu:19716: ato jñāyate sarvaṃ laukikaṃ cittaṃ prajñaptimavalambata iti |
XXhvsatssu:19717: yaduktaṃ bhavatā- laukikī prajñā yaduta dvidhā samyagdṛṣṭirityādi iti |
XXhvsatssu:19718: tatredaṃ prativaktavyam- asti cittadvaividhyaṃ mohacittaṃ jñānacittamiti |
XXhvsatssu:19724: pūrvāparakarmavipākājñānaṃ ityādi tatra tatra yathābhūtasyājñānamadarśanamanabhisamayaḥ tamaḥ saṃmohaḥ [avidyā]ndhakāraḥ
XXhvsatssu:19727: idaṃ pṛthagjanacittaṃ sadā prajñaptigataṃ sat prajñaptimavalambate |
XXhvsatssu:19731: idānīṃ yadi sarvaṃ laukikaṃ jñānaṃ prajñaptimavalambate |
XXhvsatssu:19747: pṛthagjanā yadvadanti ghaṭa iti pudgala iti |
XXhvsatssu:19749: śaikṣā ātmadṛṣṭivihīnā api samyaksmṛtipramoṣat pañcasu skandheṣu asmimānalakṣaṇena vadanti- ayaṃ pudgalaḥ ayaṃ ghaṭa iti |
XXhvsatssu:19752: yathā mahākāśyapaḥ saṅghāṭiṃ dṛṣṭvā āha- iyaṃ mameti [yat] divyarddhau vicikitsāṃ janayati
XXhvsatssu:19753: bhagavān tadvivṛṇvannāha- ayamatyantasamuddhatamānendriyaḥ pradagdhahetupratyayaḥ kathaṃ sābhimānaḥ syāt |
XXhvsatssu:19758: dve samyagdṛṣṭī ityādī sūtraṃ kathaṃ neyam |
XXhvsatssu:19760: bhagavān dharmāṇāṃ tattvalakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī vineyasattvānanusṛtya vividhaṃ nāma sthāpayati
XXhvsatssu:19763: api cāha anityādisaṃjñā bhāvitā sarvān kleśān paribhedayatīti |
XXhvsatssu:19776: vaktavyā ca dvividhā saṃjñā lokaṃ pratītya satyaṃ, paramārthaṃ pratītya satyamiti |
XXhvsatssu:19779: kācit mohakāṣṭhātmikā saṃjñā yāvat laukikakuśalākuśalāni na vijānāti |
XXhvsatssu:19783: itīyaṃ saṃjñā skandhalakṣaṇaparibhedakaṃ jñānamanukūlayatītyato bhagavānupadiśati jñānamiti
XXhvsatssu:19784: iyañca saṃjñā tattvajñānasya hetuṃ karotītyato jñānami tyucyate |
XXhvsatssu:19791: saptāsravasūtre ca vacanaprahāṇavṛttiprahāṇādaya āsravahetava āsravā ityucyante |
XXhvsatssu:19799: (pṛ) smṛtyupasthāneṣu uṣmādiṣu ca gataṃ cittaṃ tattvadharmamālambate |
XXhvsatssu:19802: ato yatra prajñaptividhamanaṃ cittaṃ tadanu samāgataṃ cittamanāsravaṃ bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:19810: anātmasaṃjñayā cittaṃ bhāvayatāṃ kṣipraṃ rāgadveṣamohebhyo vimucyate ityādi |
XXhvsatssu:19812: anātmasaṃjñayā hi cittaṃ bhāvayatāṃ duḥkhasaṃjñā pratitiṣṭhati |
XXhvsatssu:19814: ato yo dharmo 'nityo 'nātmā, sa duḥkho 'pi iti prajānan akuśalānnirvidyate |
XXhvsatssu:19828: ataḥ pañcaskandhā anityā iti paśyan anātmāna iti prajānāti |
XXhvsatssu:19834: ātmā ma utpadyate vyeti cetyasyāgataṃ bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:19859: kiṃ jānataḥ kiṃ paśyata āsravāṇāṃ kṣayo bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:19866: evameva bhāvanānuyogamanuyuktasya bhikṣornaivaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati etāvatko bata me 'dyāsravāṇāṃ kṣīṇam |
XXhvsatssu:19868: atha khalvasya kṣīṇe kṣīṇānta eva jñānaṃ bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:19876: ato jñāyate smṛtyupasthānādigato mārgāṅgabhāvanānuyogamanuktaḥ srotaāpattiphalapratipannaka iti |
XXhvsatssu:19877: yadyekasmin kṣaṇe yadi vā pañcadaśasu kṣaṇeṣu na bhāvanānuyogaṃ vindate |
XXhvsatssu:19879: (pṛ) iti rūpaṃ, iti rūpasya samudayaḥ iti rūpasyāstaṅgamaḥ, iti vedanā iti
XXhvsatssu:19890: ataḥ smṛtyupasthānādau pūtibhūtaḥ san pṛthagjano bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:19894: ato jñāyate smṛtyupasthānādigataḥ viprakṛṣṭaḥ pratipannaka ityucyate |
XXhvsatssu:19895: kiñcogreṇa saṅghe nimantrite devatā upasaṅkramya ārocayanti- amuko gṛhapate arhan yāvadamuka ādyaphalapratipannaka iti |
XXhvsatssu:19899: kiñcoktaṃ bhagavatā sūtre- yasya [khalu bhikṣava imāni] pañcendriyāṇi
XXhvsatssu:19901: tamahaṃ bāhyaḥ pṛthagjanapakṣe sthita iti vadāmīti |
XXhvsatssu:19906: ayamābhyantaraḥ pṛthagjana ārya ityupyucyate pṛthagjana ityapyucyate |
XXhvsatssu:19910: pṛthagjano nānusmarati rūpaṃ śūnyamanātmā, vedanā, saṃjñā (SSS_493)
XXhvsatssu:19920: (u) yo nirodhaṃ paśyati sa tattvataḥ pratipannakaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:19921: yo dūrabhāgīyakuśalendriyagataḥ paśyati pañcaskandhā anityāḥ duḥkhā śūnyā anātmāna iti |
XXhvsatssu:19925: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhikṣavo bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti- kathaṃ dharmaṃ paśyema
XXhvsatssu:19928: tatsahabhuvo vedanāsaṃjñā cetanādayaḥ sarve [dharmā] anityā vipariṇāmadharmāṇaḥ aśraddheyāḥ
XXhvsatssu:19937: yoginaścitta evaṃ bhavati- idaṃ praṇītamupaśamapadaṃ yat
XXhvsatssu:19938: sarveṣāṃ mṛṣābhūtānāṃ kāmatṛṣṇānāmapagamaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho nirvāṇam |
XXhvsatssu:19939: yadasmin dharme cittaṃ praskandati adhimucyate neñjate na parāvartate na śocate na paritrāsate
XXhvsatssu:19941: ato jñāyate yogī anityādyākāraiḥ pañcaskandhānavalokayan viprakṛṣṭaḥ pratipannaka ityucyate
XXhvsatssu:19942: teṣāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyan sannikṛṣṭaḥ pratipannaka iti |
XXhvsatssu:19943: yathā channaḥ sthavirān prativadati- mamāpyevaṃ bhavati- rūpamanityaṃ
XXhvsatssu:19946: atha ca punarme] sarvasaṃskārasamarthe tṛṣṇākṣaye nirodhe nirvāṇe cittaṃ na praskandati, na prasīdati, na vimucyate [paritarṣaṇā |
XXhvsatssu:19949: atha kastarhi ma ātmeti |] na khalvimaṃ dharmaṃ paśyato bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:19951: kiñcāha- yogī yadasmin dharme mṛduprajñayā kṣāntiṃ śraddadhate sa
XXhvsatssu:19954: yastīkṣṇaprajñayā kṣāntiṃ śraddadhate sa dharmā[nusārī] pratipannakaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:19957: ato jñāyate nirodhaṃ paśyan sannikṛṣṭaḥ pratipannako bhavatīti |
XXhvsatssu:19963: bhagavān dvādaśanidānānāṃ nirodhaṃ dṛṣṭvā anuttaramabhisambuddho 'bhūt iti
XXhvsatssu:19965: śūnyāṃśca paśyato yogino jñānadarśanamaviśuddhaṃ bhavati iti |
XXhvsatssu:19966: sūtramidamanta āha- yogina evaṃ bhavati- yanmayā dṛśyate śrūyate
XXhvsatssu:19967: ājighryate rasyate spṛśyate manyate tat sarvaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ vijñānam |
XXhvsatssu:19968: yadasya vijñānasya hetupratyayā nityā vā anityā vā iti |
XXhvsatssu:19970: anityebhyo hetupratyayebhya utpannaṃ vijñānaṃ kathaṃ nityaṃ bhavet |
XXhvsatssu:19971: ataḥ sarve pañcaskandhā anityāḥ pratītyasamutpannāḥ kṣayalakṣaṇāḥ vipariṇāmalakṣaṇā viyogalakṣaṇā nirodhalakṣaṇā iti paśyati |
XXhvsatssu:19982: sūtre hi bhagavatoktam- caturṇāmaryasatyānāṃ yathābhūtamananubodhāt evamidaṃ dīrghamadhvānaṃ [sandhāvitaṃ] saṃsaritaṃ mama ca yuṣmākañca idānīmimāni catvāri satyānyanubaddhāni |
XXhvsatssu:19991: ca- ye hi kecit dharmakañcukā ninditakāyāḥ samyakpravrajyāṃ śraddadhante |
XXhvsatssu:19993: ye hi kecit srotaāpattiṃ sakṛdāgāmitāmanāgāmitāñca lipsanti |
XXhvsatssu:19995: ye hi kecit arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhatāṃ buddhamārgañca lipsanti |
XXhvsatssu:20001: idaṃ duḥkhamayaṃ duḥkhasamudayaḥ ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipaditi paśyato mama teṣu cakṣurudapadyata jñānamudapadyata vidyodapadyata bodhirudapadyata iti, evaṃ triparivartaṃ catvāryāryasatyānyavocat |
XXhvsatssu:20004: evamayaṃ puruṣa ekatra niṣaṇṇaścatvāri satyāni paśyati iti |
XXhvsatssu:20007: evaṃ paśyataḥ kāmāsravāt bhavāsravādavidyāsravāt cittaṃ vimucyate |
XXhvsatssu:20012: bhagavānāha catvāri jñānāni duḥkhajñānaṃ samudayajñānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ mārgajñānamiti |
XXhvsatssu:20015: yathā bhiṣak rogaṃ jñātvā roganidānaṃ rogavināśaṃ rogavināśauṣadhañca jānīyāt |
XXhvsatssu:20016: evaṃ yogī duḥkhānāṃ nissaraṇamicchan duḥkhaṃ duḥkhanidānaṃ duḥkhanirodhaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminīṃ pratipadañca jānīyāt |
XXhvsatssu:20017: yadi na jānāti duḥkhaṃ kena jñāsyati duḥkhanidānaṃ duḥkhanirodhaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminīṃ pratipadañca
XXhvsatssu:20023: skandhadhātvāyatanādiṣūktam- yadidaṃ rūpaṃ ityādi ayaṃ rūpasya samudaya
XXhvsatssu:20024: ityādi ayaṃ rūpasya vyaya ityādi prajānata āsravāḥ kṣīyanta iti |
XXhvsatssu:20029: nagaropamasūtre coktam- yadā mama na jñānamabhūt- [iti] jarāmaraṇaṃ jarāmaraṇasamudayo jarāmaraṇanirodho jarāmaraṇanirodhagāminī pratipat |
XXhvsatssu:20030: yāvat saṃskārāḥ saṃskārasamudayaḥ saṃskāranirodhaḥ saṃskāranirodhagāminī pratipat iti |
XXhvsatssu:20038: (pṛ) nāhaṃ vadāmi- ayamucyate darśanamārgādhigama iti; kintu ayaṃ sammarśana kālīna iti
XXhvsatssu:20041: tathā no cet nidānaṃ vaktavyaṃ- catussatyadarśanaṃ mārgādhigamakālīnaṃ pañcaskandhādidarśanaṃ sammarśanakālīnamiti |
XXhvsatssu:20044: pañcaskandhādīnāṃ sammarśanaṃ na kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:20054: kecit dvādaśāyatanāni vā aṣṭādaśadhātūn vā dvādaśanidānāni vā anyāni vā paśyanto mārgamadhigacchanti iti |
XXhvsatssu:20057: yadi bhavato mataṃ satyapyasmin vacane naitaddarśanena kleśān prajahātīti |
XXhvsatssu:20060: catussatyavibhaṅga uktam- jātirapi duḥkhaṃ jarāpi duḥkhaṃ vyādhirapi duḥkhaṃ maraṇamapi duḥkhaṃ vipriyasaṃyogo duḥkhaṃ priyaviyogo duḥkhaṃ yadiṣṭaṃ na labhyate tadapi duḥkhaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkhamiti |
XXhvsatssu:20061: kiñcāha duḥkhasamudayo yeyaṃ tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī tatra tatrābhinandinī iti |
XXhvsatssu:20063: idaṃ sarvaṃ lokasatyaṃ na tu paramārthasatyam |
XXhvsatssu:20069: pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkhamiti paśyataścittameva vikṣipyate na mārgo 'dhigamyate |
XXhvsatssu:20077: ato jñāyate yogī cittata eva saṃskṛtadharme vartate na paramārthata iti |
XXhvsatssu:20078: yathoktaṃ sūtre- saṃskṛtadharmā anṛtā māyopamā jvālopamā svapnopamā ṛṇopamā iti |
XXhvsatssu:20081: asat dṛṣṭaṃ sadābhāsaṃ asadvai parayā dhiyā || iti |
XXhvsatssu:20082: strī puruṣa iti dharmo yathābhūtaṃ nāsti |
XXhvsatssu:20083: pañcaskandhānāṃ kalāpamātre strī puruṣa iti sudṛḍhaṃ kīrtayantaḥ pṛthagjanā viparyayamugdhā vadanti |
XXhvsatssu:20086: yogī tu ime pañcaskandhāḥ śūnyā anātmāna iti bhāvayati |
XXhvsatssu:20088: yathoktaṃ dharmamudrāsūtre- yogī bhāvayati rūpamanityaṃ śūnyaṃ viyogalakṣaṇamiti |
XXhvsatssu:20091: śūnyamiti yathā ghaṭe jale 'sati śūnyo ghaṭa iti
XXhvsatssu:20093: evaṃ pañcaskandheṣu nāstyātmā ityataḥ śūnyā bhavanti |
XXhvsatssu:20097: ante tu nirodhaṃ paśyati yaduta yogina evaṃ bhavati yanmayā dṛṣṭaṃ śrutamityādi |
XXhvsatssu:20098: ato jñāyate nirodhaṃ paśyata eva kleśāḥ kṣīyanta iti |
XXhvsatssu:20104: yathā kasyacit prathamadhyāne prītisukhamalabdhavato na pañcakāmaguṇeṣu nirvedasaṃjñā jāyate
XXhvsatssu:20105: yathā ca avitarkāvicārasamādhimalabdhvā na savitarkasavicārasamādhau doṣaṃ manyate |
XXhvsatssu:20107: ato jñātavyaṃ nirodhasatyaṃ paśyata eva duḥkhasaṃjñā sampannā bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:20114: yasmin samaye nirodhasya nirodhalakṣaṇamadhigatam, tasminneva samaye duḥkhasaṃjñā sampadyate
XXhvsatssu:20117: yogī [yat] samudayalakṣaṇaṃ tat nirodhalakṣaṇamiti prajānan suviśuddhaṃ dharmacakṣuranuprāpnoti
XXhvsatssu:20120: skandhā anityā duḥkhā iti paśyannapi na nirodhamanuprāpnoti |
XXhvsatssu:20123: kasmāt bhagavān pudgalaḥ sukumāramatirityādi dṛṣṭvā catussatyānyudeśayati, na tu nirodhasatyamātram
XXhvsatssu:20128: (pṛ) mārgalābhasamaya eva yadi satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ prahīyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:20130: (u) yogī mārgamanuprāpya dharmāḥ śūnyā anātmāna iti dṛṣṭataḥ paśyan na punarvicikitsate
XXhvsatssu:20132: mārgasatyaṃ paśyan prajānāti idamekameva tattvaṃ nānyadastīti |
XXhvsatssu:20134: (pṛ) yadi mārgalābhakāla eva satyadarśanapraheyāḥ kleśāḥ kṣīyante |
XXhvsatssu:20137: yathā bhagavān bhīkṣūn pṛcchati- kena vastunā kiṃ vastūpādāya kiṃ vastvabhiniviśya īdṛśī dṛṣṭirbhavati |
XXhvsatssu:20138: asmin kāye mriyamāṇa eva īdṛśādayaḥ sarvā dṛṣṭayo nirudhyante |
XXhvsatssu:20139: bhikṣava āhuḥ- bhagavanmūlā hi (SSS_499) no bhagavan dharmāḥ |
XXhvsatssu:20141: bhagavānāha- rūpe khalu sati rūpamupādāya rūpamabhiniviśya saktāyadṛṣṭirbhavati |
XXhvsatssu:20144: ato jñātavyaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭimupādāya sarve kleśāḥ sambhavantīti |
XXhvsatssu:20146: satyāṃ hi satkāyadṛṣṭau vadanti- ayamātmā nityo vānityo veti |
XXhvsatssu:20150: tadā na karma, na vipākaḥ, duḥkhavimokṣaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:20165: dharmalakṣaṇaṃ sākṣātkurvato yogino na vicikitsā bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:20171: śīlavratasamucchedāt mārgaṃ prayujya jñāne jñeyadharmeṣu ca na vicikitsate |
XXhvsatssu:20173: sa eva samudayaṃ prahāya nirodhamadhigacchan catussatyasampanna ityucyate |
XXhvsatssu:20174: ata eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ vacanameva nirvicikitsālakṣaṇaṃ pradarśayati |
XXhvsatssu:20177: ādyābhisambodhilakṣaṇaṃ yaduta dharmaṃ paśyati dharmaṃ pratilabhate dharmaṃ prajānāti dharmaṃ pratisaṃvedayate |
XXhvsatssu:20186: āyataneṣu dhātuṣu cokteṣu padārthā ālambanāni viṣayā jñeyā ityādayaḥ sarve dharmā bhavanti
XXhvsatssu:20195: (pṛ) uktaṃ hi sūtre- dvābhyāṃ pratyayābhyāṃ vijñānamutpadyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:20200: (u) yat bhavānāha- dvābhyāṃ pratyayābhyāṃ vijñānamutpadyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:20204: kiñcit ṣaṣṭhasya vijñānasya svakalāpe sarvathā asadālambanaṃ bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:20217: na vastutaḥ sparśasya ṣaḍāyatanāni pratyayā bhavanti |
XXhvsatssu:20220: evaṃ caturaḥ pratyayān pratiṣidhyāha bhagavān dve āyatane iti |
XXhvsatssu:20224: (pṛ) anenaiva hetunā atītānāgatādayoḥ dharmāḥ santaḥ syuḥ |
XXhvsatssu:20235: yo dharma utpadya niruddhaḥ sa smaraṇīyaḥ
XXhvsatssu:20237: kiṃ smaryeta yathā dharmaḥ pūrvaṃ sattvākhya idānīmatīto 'pi sattvākhyaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:20238: evaṃ tasmin dharme pūrvaṃ smṛtyutpādāt tadeva cittaṃ punaḥ smaryate |
XXhvsatssu:20243: yo dharmastasya citte jāyate sa dharmo vinaṣṭaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:20244: paścāt [ta]nmanovijñānaṃ tat vastu vijānāti ida[meva] nimittālambanaṃ vijñānamityākhyayate
XXhvsatssu:20256: yathā āryā anāgataṃ vastu jñātvā vadanti- idaṃ vastu tathā syāt, idaṃ vastu tathā na syāditi
XXhvsatssu:20257: (u) āryajñānabalaṃ hi tathā dharmamasantamapi prāk prajānāti |
XXhvsatssu:20258: yathā āryāḥ pāṣaṇabhittiṃ bhittvā apratihatamunmajjanti nimajjanti ca |
XXhvsatssu:20261: yathā cakṣurvijñānaṃ na strīti puruṣa iti vā vikalpayati |
XXhvsatssu:20269: yathā devadatta iti vacane naikaṃ vijñānaṃ catvāryakṣarāṇi vijānāti |
XXhvsatssu:20273: yathā ca puruṣasya svarūpaṃ naikakṣaṇena parijñeyamam |
XXhvsatssu:20277: bhavānavādīḥ- dṛṣṭāntaṃ pratītya nāsti kiñcit svātmālambanaṃ jñānamiti |
XXhvsatssu:20279: yogī cittavipaśyanāmanusarati atīte 'nāgate tu cittaṃ nāsti iti vacanāt |
XXhvsatssu:20281: no cet na jātu kaścitpratyutpannacittasamprayukta dharmaṃ vijānāti |
XXhvsatssu:20283: sarve dharmā anātmānaḥ prajñayā yadi paśyati |
XXhvsatssu:20284: atha nirvindate duḥkhe eṣa mārgo viśuddhaye || iti |
XXhvsatssu:20285: iyaṃ prajñā ātmānaṃ sahabhūdharmānanyāni sarvadharmālambanāni cāpanayati |
XXhvsatssu:20288: tasyāṃ hi gāthāyāmuktam- atha nirvindate duḥkha iti |
XXhvsatssu:20305: bhagavānāha- sādhu sādhu khalu bhikṣava iti |
XXhvsatssu:20310: bahirdhā vā audārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā [hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā] yaddūre 'ntike
XXhvsatssu:20312: evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā paśyati iti |
XXhvsatssu:20313: āha ca- rūpaṃ nātmā, vedanā, saṃjñā, saṃskārā vijñānañca nātmā iti paśyati |
XXhvsatssu:20314: rūpamanityaṃ tucchaṃ māyāvat bālālāpanaṃ vadhakaṃ steyakamanātmā anātmīyamiti |
XXhvsatssu:20316: 'vidyāṇḍagato 'vidyāndhībhūtaḥ parityajya buddhaśāsanamimāṃ mithyādṛṣṭimutpādayati- yadi rūpaṃ nātmā, vedanā, saṃjñā, saṃskārā,
XXhvsatssu:20318: kathamanātmā karma kṛtvā ātmanā anubhavati iti |
XXhvsatssu:20320: sūtre ca anātmajñānaṃ sarvadharmanālambata iti vacanasthānaṃ na kiñcanāsti |
XXhvsatssu:20329: kiñcāha- sarve saṃskārā anityā duḥkhā, sarve dharmā anātmāna iti |
XXhvsatssu:20332: sarve dharmā anātmāna ityuktatvāt jñātavyaṃ yat saṃskārā iti vacanaṃ tat saṃskṛtābhidhāyakam
XXhvsatssu:20333: yat dharmā iti vacanaṃ tat sarvā[bhidhāyaka]miti |
XXhvsatssu:20334: āha ca- ka ekalakṣaṇadharmaṃ lakṣaṇāntaradharmañcābhimukhaṃ samprajānāti yathā vidyācakṣuṣā rūpaṃ (SSS_504) paśyati |
XXhvsatssu:20335: kevalaṃ buddhā bhagavantaḥ samyak sambuddhā vimuktilābhina ekalakṣaṇadharmaṃ lakṣaṇāntaradharmañcābhimukhaṃ samprajānanti yathā vidyācakṣuṣā rūpaṃ paśyanti iti |
XXhvsatssu:20341: sarvasaṅgrāhakamiti yathā bhagavānāha- aśaṃ sarvajña iti |
XXhvsatssu:20355: ayamucyate sāmānyalakṣaṇajñaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ, na tu viśeṣalakṣaṇajña iti |
XXhvsatssu:20357: bhikṣurayaṃ sāmānyena sarve dharmā anityā iti prajānātītyataḥ sarvajño bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:20381: ato jñāyate sarvamanātmeti vacane satyapi pañcopādānaskandhāna[bhisandhāya] uktaṃ, na tu sarvadharmāniti draṣṭavyam |
XXhvsatssu:20389: (pṛ) laukikī śūnyatā sarvadharmānālambate na tu anāsravaśūnyatā |
XXhvsatssu:20392: (pṛ) uktaṃ hi dharmamudrāsūtre- śūnyatā laukikī śūnyateti |
XXhvsatssu:20393: (u) iyaṃ lokottaraśūnyatā na tu laukikī śūnyatā |
XXhvsatssu:20395: atroktaṃ jñānadarśanasyāviśuddhatvāt jñāyata iyaṃ laukikī śūnyateti |
XXhvsatssu:20399: paścānnirodhasatyaṃ dṛṣṭvā abhimānaṃ vihāya jñānadarśanaṃ viśuddhaṃ bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:20401: yadbhavānāha- sarve saṃskārā anityāḥ sarve dharmā anātmāna iti |
XXhvsatssu:20402: evaṃ hi syāt- yogī yadā nairātmyasaṃjñāsamanvitaḥ tadā dharmasaṃjñāsamanvitatvāt nairātmye dharma iti sa saṃjñocyate |
XXhvsatssu:20403: yathoktaṃ darśanavarge- yo duḥkhaṃ na paśyati, sa ātmadarśī bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:20404: yo yathābhūtaṃ duḥkhaṃ paśyati, na sa punarātmānaṃ paśyati |
XXhvsatssu:20407: ataḥ sarve dharmā anātmāna iti vacanaṃ duḥkhasatyamātramālambya anātmā saṃskāra ityabhidadhāti
XXhvsatssu:20412: 192 āryavihāravargaḥ asti dvividho vihāraḥ śūnyavihāra anātmavihāra iti |
XXhvsatssu:20413: pañcaskandheṣu nāsti sattva iti darśanaṃ śūnyavihāraḥ |
XXhvsatssu:20416: uktaṃ hi sūtre- rūpaṃ niskhabhāvaṃ paśyati [yāvat] vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ niḥskhabhāvaṃ paśyatīti |
XXhvsatssu:20418: ato jñāyate rūpasvabhāvo na vastusan yāvadvedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānasvabhāvā na vastusanta iti |
XXhvsatssu:20420: coktaṃ sūtre- pañcaskandhāḥ śūnyā māyāvat iti |
XXhvsatssu:20422: yadi māyā vastusatī, na māyeti bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:20426: ato jñāyate pañcaskandhā na vastusanta iti |
XXhvsatssu:20428: tathā pañcaskandhā api, naikaḥ [tādṛśaḥ] paramārthiko dharmo 'sti |
XXhvsatssu:20435: nirodhaḥ sa niyataṃ yathābhūta ityataḥ paramārthasan iti |
XXhvsatssu:20441: sūtra uktam- yaḥ sattvaṃ paśyati sa pañcopādānaskandhān paśyati iti |
XXhvsatssu:20444: ato jñāyate anāsravān skandhānupādāyāpi sattva ityucyante |
XXhvsatssu:20455: | yathoktaṃ sūtre- avidyānivṛtatṛṣṇāsaṃyojanayā pratibaddho mūḍha imaṃ kāyamanuprāpnoti |
XXhvsatssu:20460: (u) sarve skandhā upādānādutpannā ityata upādānaskandhā ityucyante |
XXhvsatssu:20463: skandhā upādānaskandhaiḥ sahopādānādutpannā ityata upādānaskandhā ityabhidhīyante |
XXhvsatssu:20469: uktaṃ hi sūtre- rūpaṃ paśyati śūnyamanātmā
XXhvsatssu:20480: (u) yogī sattvakāraṇe na sattvaṃ paśyatītyata eva śūnyacittamutpādya tataḥ śūnyaṃ paśyati
XXhvsatssu:20481: pañcaskandhānāṃ nirodhe ca na paśyati rūpasvabhāvaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānasvabhāvam |
XXhvsatssu:20496: pañcavijñānasamprayuktā ca prajñā jñānameva ca darśanam |
XXhvsatssu:20503: uktañca sūtre- yat dharmeṣu dharmān parīttaṃ prajñayā vipaśyati |
XXhvsatssu:20508: prathamā cānāsravā prajñā prāthamikaṃ darśanaṃ kṣāntiḥ |
XXhvsatssu:20522: parīttavacane ca kevalamuktaṃ vipaśyanā kṣāntiriti na jñānam
XXhvsatssu:20524: yadi manyase yogino jñānavata eva kṣāntirbhavatīti |
XXhvsatssu:20526: uktañca sūtre- [evaṃ] jānan paśyan āsravādvimucyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:20532: bhagavān vimuktyarthamāha- yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti jñānam iti |
XXhvsatssu:20536: na vayaṃ vadāmaḥ pūrvaṃ kṣāntiḥ paścāt jñānamiti |
XXhvsatssu:20551: na savikalpikeyaṃ kṣāntiḥ idaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:20552: yathā laukikī vipaśyanā catussatyānusāriṇī kṣāntirityapyucyate jñānamityapyucyate |
XXhvsatssu:20556: (pṛ) sūtre hi pṛthugucyate samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyak jñānamiti |
XXhvsatssu:20558: (u) tathā cet samyagdṛṣṭirna samyag jñānaṃ bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:20559: yadi bhavato mataṃ samyag (SSS_509) dṛṣṭiḥ samyag jñānamiti |
XXhvsatssu:20561: pañcāṅgadharmakāye prajñāskandhāt pṛthaguktaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaṃ na prajñā bhavet |
XXhvsatssu:20562: tathā ca kṣayajñānamamutpādajñānamapi na prajñā bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:20587: prathamata ālambanagatatvāt na dṛṣṭiriti yadi matam |
XXhvsatssu:20590: bhavatāṃ hi śāsanaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ santānālambanaṃ yathā manovijñānamiti |
XXhvsatssu:20601: dṛṣṭiḥ jñānaṃ prajñā ityādi sarvaṃ nāsti |
XXhvsatssu:20609: santyaṣṭadṛṣṭayo yaduta pañcamithyādṛṣṭayo laukikī samyagdṛṣṭiḥ śaikṣadṛṣṭiraśaikṣadṛṣṭiḥ
XXhvsatssu:20610: etā aṣṭadṛṣṭirvarjayitvā anyā prajñā na dṛṣṭirityucyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:20612: (u) jñānadarśanaṃ vimuktilābhaḥ pratisaṃvedanaṃ sākṣātkāra itīdaṃ sarvamekārthakam |
XXhvsatssu:20613: iyaṃ dṛṣṭiriyaṃ na dṛṣṭiriti yat vacanam |
XXhvsatssu:20616: uktaṃ nanu sūtre- jānan paśyan āsravādvimucyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:20618: (u) yat jñātvā ādau prajñaptiṃ vidārayati tat
XXhvsatssu:20625: 194 trividhaprajñāvargaḥ tisraḥ prajñā, śrutamayī prajñā, cintāmayī prajñā, bhāvanāmayī prajñeti
XXhvsatssu:20630: vedādīn vyāvahārikagranthān śṛṇvannapi nānāsravāṃ prajñāmutpādayatītyato na [sā] śrutamayī prajñā bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:20631: yat sūtrāṇāmarthaṃ cintayati sā cintāmayī prajñā |
XXhvsatssu:20632: yathocyate- yogī dharmaṃ śrutvā tadarthagatiṃ cintayati |
XXhvsatssu:20639: yūyaṃ bhikṣavo dhyānasamādhiṃ bhāvayanto yathābhūtajñānadarśanamabhimukhaṃ labhadhve |
XXhvsatssu:20653: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- trīṇyāyudhāni śrutāyudhaṃ vivekāyudhaṃ prajñāyudhamiti |
XXhvsatssu:20686: api coktaṃ sūtre- bhagavān dharmamupadiśati ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇamante kalyāṇamityādi
XXhvsatssu:20687: taṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇoti satpuruṣastaruṇo vṛddho vā |
XXhvsatssu:20690: tadaiva bhogaskandhaṃ prahāya jñātiparivṛttaṃ prahāya agārādanāgāraṃ
XXhvsatssu:20699: | tatra yat dharmaṃ śṛṇoti taruṇo vā vṛddho vā iti |
XXhvsatssu:20701: | śrutvā yat pratisañcikṣati- sambādho gṛhāvāso 'bhyavakāśā pravrajyeti |
XXhvsatssu:20715: tatra niṣevya santaṃ puruṣaṃ saddharmamupaśrutya cetīyaṃ śrutamayī prajñā |
XXhvsatssu:20724: evamādinā tatra tatra sūtre bhagavān trividhāṃ prajñāmavocat |
XXhvsatssu:20738: (u) kena pratyayena kāmadhātau nāsti bhāvanāmayī prajñā |
XXhvsatssu:20739: (pṛ) na kāmadhātukamārgeṇa sarvāṇi nīvaraṇāni sarvāṇi paryavasthānāni
XXhvsatssu:20741: (u) bhavatāṃ śāsane nedaṃ vacanamasti yat na kāmadhātukamārgeṇa nīvaraṇāni paryavasthānāni prajahāti yena kāmadhātukaparyavasthānaṃ nābhimukhībhavediti |
XXhvsatssu:20745: yathoktaṃ sūtre- aśubhabhāvanāṃ bhāvayan kāmarāgaṃ samūhanti iti |
XXhvsatssu:20754: (u) dauṣṭhulyādinā kleśān prajahāti nāśubhādinā iti nāsti kiñcana sūtravacanam |
XXhvsatssu:20755: uktaṃ hi sūtre- aśubhādinā kleśān samūhanti iti |
XXhvsatssu:20761: vaktavyaṃ kāraṇaṃ kasmādasti aśubhādiḥ, na dauṣṭhulyādiriti |
XXhvsatssu:20764: atrāpi kāraṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ kasmāt kāmadhātau na samucchedayati |
XXhvsatssu:20782: (u) tīrthikāḥ prahīṇasaṃyojanā api punaḥ kāmadhātau samutpadyante |
XXhvsatssu:20789: api coktaṃ sūtre- kṣīṇatrisaṃyojanastrīṇi viṣāṇi samūhantīti |
XXhvsatssu:20790: prākṛto na trīṇi saṃyojanāni kṣapayatītyato na vītarāgo bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:20793: yadi prākato vairāgyakuśalaḥ, sarve 'pi kleśā na syuḥ |
XXhvsatssu:20805: yathoktaṃ sūtre- dvāvimau bhikṣavaḥ aśanyā phalantyā na santrasataḥ |
XXhvsatssu:20817: vastutastu pṛthagjanasya vītarāga iti kathyamānasyāpi nedaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ syāt |
XXhvsatssu:20824: āha ca arāḍaḥ kalāma udrako rāmaputro rūpe vītarāga ārūpya utpadyata iti |
XXhvsatssu:20832: bhavānapyāha- pṛthagjanasya sarvāṇi vidyamānāni prahīṇānīti idaṃ vastutaḥ pratiṣiddhamityataḥ kṣīṇo vīta ityucyate |
XXhvsatssu:20834: ahaṃ mameti yā cintā mriyamāṇo jahāti tām ayameva vītarāgo nāma |
XXhvsatssu:20837: yo bālaḥ svabhūmiṃ tyajati taṃ satkṛtavatāmapi nāsti mahāvipākaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:20841: ato jñāyate pṛthagjano vastutaḥ prahīṇa[kleśo] vīta[rāga] iti |
XXhvsatssu:20844: yadi satkāyadṛṣṭiṃ vyāvṛttavān tadā pūrvokto doṣaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:20849: ataḥ pṛthagjano na vastutaḥ prahīṇasaṃyojana iti jñāyate |
XXhvsatssu:20860: na tatrāsti kāraṇamāsannabhūmiṃ niśrayate na kāmadhātukasamādhimiti |
XXhvsatssu:20867: kintu dharmasthitijñānamavaśyaṃ pūrvaṃ kṛtvā paścādāsravakṣayo bhavatīti |
XXhvsatssu:20884: uktañca sūtre- yogī śubhaṃ pratilabhamāno 'śubhaṃ tyajati tadyathā nandaḥ apsaratṛṣṇāmupādāya pūrvatanakāmaṃ jahau iti |
XXhvsatssu:20892: yadyāryaśrāvakaḥ kadācit pañcakāmaguṇā na prītisaumanasyajanakā ityanusmarati |
XXhvsatssu:20908: yadbhavatoktaṃ- śubhaṃ praṇītaṃ pramodamupaśamarasañca pratilabhamāna iti |
XXhvsatssu:20916: yathā sūtre bhagavānāha- bhikṣūṇāṃ cīvaraṃ gṛhṇatāṃ triṣu [kleśa] viṣeṣu satsvapi cīvarāsaṅgo niruddha eveti |
XXhvsatssu:20933: ataḥ satyadarśanamārge na laukikaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvayati |
XXhvsatssu:20941: yathoktaṃ sūtre- janapadaniruktau nābhiniveśeta yogī iti |
XXhvsatssu:20947: santi catvāro bhāṣitadharmāḥ kiñcidbhāṣitaṃ sārthagati nākṣayakaram |
XXhvsatssu:20954: yathāha- santi catvāro bhāṣitadharmāḥ kaścidarthopāyaḥ na vyañjanopāyaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:20958: ya etaccatuḥpratisaṃvitprāptaḥ sa upāyasampanno duṣpradhṛṣyo duradhigamyo dharmabhāṣaṇe |
XXhvsatssu:20975: (pṛ) catasra imāḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ kasmin dhātau vartante |

XXhvsatssu:21052: ghaṭe vinaṣṭe tu ghaṭo vinaṣṭa iti vaktuṃ śakyate |

XXhvsatssu:21083: yathā yatra yannāsti tatra tena śūnyamiti jñānam |
XXhvsatssu:21099: yena jñānena na raṇāyate pareṇa saha |
XXhvsatssu:21113: tathā cet bhagavato buddhasya kevalamidaṃ jñānaṃ syāt |
XXhvsatssu:21119: yat yogī prakṛṣṭamuttamaṃ jñānaṃ sarvadhyānasamādhibhiḥ paribhāvitaṃ parivardhitaṃ pratilabhya [sva]jīvitasya bṛddhau hrāse vaśitāṃ vindate |

XXhvsatssu:21181: (pṛ) divyacakṣuṣaḥ saṃsthānaṃ kiṃ mahat kiṃ vālpam |
XXhvsatssu:21200: yathā sāsraveṇa sāsravaṃ jānāti anāsraveṇa anāsravaṃ jānāti iti |

XXhvsatssu:21233: yadi cittaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ, rūpālambanaṃ cittaṃ bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:21237: yadi na jānātyālambanaṃ, katamat cittaṃ jānīyāt |

XXhvsatssu:21324: yatprayojanamanusṛtya sākṣātkāraḥ sākṣātkṛtaṃ vastu, [sa] sarva ṛddhipādaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:21327: tathāgate loka utpanne supuruṣā dharmaṃ śrutvā pravrajitāḥ śīlaṃ samādadānā apanītapañca nīvaraṇāḥ samādhiṃ bhāvayantaḥ satyaṃ paśyanti ityādi sarvamāsravakṣayasyopāyāḥ |
XXhvsatssu:21330: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yogino dānaṃ kṣīṇāsravaśūnyānātmajñānaṃ sādhayatīti |
XXhvsatssu:21342: dvitīyajñānādinā ka upayogaḥ (u) nimittāni niruddhānyapi punarutpadyante |
XXhvsatssu:21348: yathā paśyāmaḥ stanyaṃ śuṣyat punaḥ prasravati |

XXhvsatssu:21357: yasmin samaye nimittāni niruddhāni na punarutpadyante |

XXhvsatssu:21382: prākṛtā ajñā vadanti- te vastusanta iti |
XXhvsatssu:21383: śaikṣāḥ punaḥ prajānanti- te tucchā riktā māyāvaditi |
XXhvsatssu:21385: ato jñāyate yayā prajñayā dharmāṇāṃ nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti iyamāsravakṣayajñānasākṣātkriyābhijñeti
XXhvsatssu:21391: (u) saptopāyā nāma śrutamayī prajñā cintāmayī prajñā ca |
XXhvsatssu:21393: | asamāhitacitta evaṃ vicārayati- yadidaṃ rūpam, ayaṃ rūpasamudayaḥ ayaṃ
XXhvsatssu:21399: (u) yadyapīyaṃ śrutamayī cintāmayī prajñā tathāpyevaṃ pañcaskandhān vikalpayan ātmamatiṃ vibhedayati |
XXhvsatssu:21401: trividhāvalokanajñānaṃ yaduta saṃskārā anityā duḥkhā anātmāna iti |
XXhvsatssu:21402: skandhadhātvāyatanamukhena saṃskārān paśyato nāstyartho hitaṃ vā |
XXhvsatssu:21404: tathā cet pūrvamādīnava uktameva- anityā duḥkhā iti |
XXhvsatssu:21409: trividhāḥ śikṣate- pūrvaṃ śrutamayīṃ cintāmayīṃ prajñām |
XXhvsatssu:21411: pūrvaṃ śrutamayyāṃ cintāmayyāṃ prajñāyāmuktāḥ sapta prakārāḥ |
XXhvsatssu:21414: yadanityaṃ tat duḥkhamiti lakṣaṇasya bhaṅgo (SSS_529) nāma anityasya bhaṅgaḥ nānityasaṃskārāṇāṃ bhaṅgaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:21421: (pṛ) yogino 'pi buddhe dharme saṅghe śīladiṣu kṣāntirasti |
XXhvsatssu:21427: pūrvaṃ hi mārgānukūlāṃ cintāmayīṃ prajñāṃ prayujya paścātpratyakṣajñānamanuprāpnoti |
XXhvsatssu:21428: yathā hastipakaḥ pūrvaṃ hastipadaṃ dṛṣṭvā tena jñānena prajānāti- atra vartata iti |

XXhvsatssu:21431: ataḥ sūtra uktam- [evaṃ] jānan[evaṃ] paśyan āsravakṣayamanuprāpnotīti ||

XXhvsatssu:21435: nava jñānāni prāpnoti yaduta kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ kuśalamavyākṛtaṃ
XXhvsatssu:21457: (u) anāgataṃ karma akṛtamabhūtaṃ na vipākaṃ prāpayati |

XXhvsatssu:21472: ayamanāgate samyaksaṅkalpaṃ samyagvācaṃ samyakkarmāntaṃ samyagājīvaṃ prāpnoti |
XXhvsatssu:21481: tathā no cet phalāni gaṇayitvā gaṇayitvānuprāpnuyāt |

XXhvsatssu:21503: tadā prāptiḥ prayoga iti nāsti bhedaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:21513: yathā samāpattapañcaśīlaḥ punaḥ pravrajyāsaṃvaramanuprāpnuvannapi na maulikaśīlebhyaḥ parihīyate
XXhvsatssu:21522: (pṛ) imāni laukikajñānāni kṣayajñānena sahārhataḥ samādhisamāpattivyutthānacittakriyāṃ prāpayanti
XXhvsatssu:21526: tathā no cet na navajñānāni prāpnuyāt |
XXhvsatssu:21527: uktañca- anāgatabhāvanāyā nāsti hetuḥ pratyayo vā iti |
XXhvsatssu:21529: | ete hi vadanti- satyadarśanamārge kevalaṃ nimittābhāsaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvayati |

XXhvsatssu:21538: navānantarya[mārgeṣu] aṣṭavimokṣamārgeṣu saṃvṛtaṃ mārgaṃ na bhāvayati |
XXhvsatssu:21542: ato bhavān yadi vā samyagdyetuṃ brūyāt yadi vā śraddhāpayet |
XXhvsatssu:21544: ūṣma[gatā]diṣu sthitikāle uttamāni sarvāṇi kuśalamūlāni bhāvayati |
XXhvsatssu:21547: ata ūṣmagatādidharmakālāt yāvat kṣayajñānaṃ sarveṣāṃ bhāvanā bhavati |
XXhvsatssu:21550: 200 daśajñānavargaḥ daśa jñānāni- dharmajñānaṃ anvayajñānaṃ, paracittajñānaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ,
XXhvsatssu:21554: bhagavānānandamāmantryāha- asmin dharme evaṃ jñānena dṛṣṭvā evaṃ

XXhvsatssu:21575: dharmajñānamanvayajñānaṃ paracittajñānaṃ duḥkhajñānaṃ samudayajñānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ mārgajñānañca sarvaṃ sāsravamanāsravamasti |

XXhvsatssu:21582: rūpārūpyasampratiyukteṣu saṃskāreṣu yadanāsravaṃ jñānaṃ rūpārūpyasampratiyuktānāṃ (SSS_533) saṃskārāṇāṃ hetau yadanāsravaṃ
XXhvsatssu:21583: jñānaṃ rūpārūpyasampratiyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nirodhe yadanāsravaṃ jñānaṃ rūpārūpyasampratiyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ prahāṇāya mārge yadanāsravaṃ jñānam,
XXhvsatssu:21590: | kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- yogī anusmaret- ahamidānīṃ dṛṣṭarūpeṇopadruto bhavāmi |

XXhvsatssu:21597: yathā ca tat duḥkhamidañca duḥkhaṃ tathānāgatamapyavehi |
XXhvsatssu:21598: [bījasvabhāvo hi yatheha dṛṣṭo bhūto 'pi bhavyo 'pi tathānumeyaḥ |]
XXhvsatssu:21599: patyakṣataśca jvalano yathoṣṇo bhūto 'pi bhavyo 'pi tathoṣṇa eva || iti |
XXhvsatssu:21604: yogī hi atīte 'nāgāmini pratyutpanne ca duḥkhe nirvidyate |
XXhvsatssu:21619: ata ekasmin samaya ubhayajñānaṃ na sambhavati |
XXhvsatssu:21630: yogī anityaṃ duḥkhamiti paśyan śūnyamanātmeti paśyati |
XXhvsatssu:21638: yathoktam- adhyātmavimuktatvāt tṛṣṇāyāḥ kṣaye nirodhe svata evārhan prāpta ityucyate |
XXhvsatssu:21640: (pṛ) nanu sūtre kiṃ noktaṃ sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ prahāṇaṃ prahāṇalakṣaṇamiti |
XXhvsatssu:21641: (u) ayaṃ yogī adhyātmanirodhaṃ sākṣātkṛrvan sarvatra nirviṇṇaḥ |
XXhvsatssu:21647: (u) evaṃ darśane sati skandhānāmanityatādidoṣamapi dṛṣṭvā duḥkhanātmasaṃjñāṃ janayati |
XXhvsatssu:21648: yathoktaṃ sūtre- [yat] duḥkhaṃ tadanityam, yadanityaṃ tadānātma iti |
XXhvsatssu:21652: ātmana utpādo vyayaḥ syādityato jñāyate anātmeti |
XXhvsatssu:21658: evaṃ yoginaḥ samyak anityamanātma ca bhāvayataḥ kāyacittamupaśāmyati |
XXhvsatssu:21659: sarvasaṃskāreṣu samutpanneṣu teṣāṃ vihiṃsāmanubhavato duḥkhasaṃjñā samutpadyate |
XXhvsatssu:21662: mūḍhastu ātmasaṃjñāvaśātsatyapi mahati duḥkhe na tadupāyāsamanubhavati |
XXhvsatssu:21673: abhūtanimittamidamabhūtaṃ saṃjñāmātramiti prajānato duḥkhāni kṣīyanta iti
XXhvsatssu:21677: yathoktaṃ sūtre- kaścidarhan tathāgatasya purato vyākaroti- bhagavatā deśitāni na santi mama
XXhvsatssu:21679: sadā mama samāhitaikāgrasya samyak caryāmanusmarataḥ kāmādīnyakuśalāni na cittasyāsravā bhavanti iti |
XXhvsatssu:21684: yathā sthāṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā ayaṃ puruṣa iti saṃśerate |
XXhvsatssu:21686: sadā animittavihāricittatvāt pūrvaṃ sattvaśūnyatāṃ dṛṣṭvā pañcasu skandheṣu na paśyatyātmānam
XXhvsatssu:21700: yathā kaścit tatra tatra pratibaddha ekasmānmukto 'pi na vimukta ityucyate |
XXhvsatssu:21703: arhan vaśitābalaprāptatvāt prajānāti- kṣīṇāni [me] saṃyojanāni, na punarutpatsya iti |
XXhvsatssu:21709: kṛtaṃ karaṇīyamiti karaṇīyāni sarvāṇi kṛtvā prajānāti- asmādbhavāt nāsti bhavāntaramiti
XXhvsatssu:21710: ato jñāyate arhanneva sarveṣu karaṇīyeṣu vaśitāṃ prāptaḥ kṣayajñānenānutpādajñānena ca samanvitaḥ syāt, (SSS_536) na tu śaikṣā iti |
XXhvsatssu:21714: jitvā mṛtyorhi senāñca viharāmi anāsravaḥ || iti |
XXhvsatssu:21720: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- sarve sattvāḥ samaṃ jñānasamanvitā iti |
XXhvsatssu:21723: yo jinauraso jānāti dharmāḥ pratītyasamutpannā iti |
XXhvsatssu:21731: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- catuścattvāriṃśat jñānāni yaduta jarāmaraṇe jñānaṃ,
XXhvsatssu:21743: [tatra] kiñcit dūtayugamekasmāt dvārādāgatyopasṛtya nagarasvāmino yathābhūtaṃ vacanaṃ
XXhvsatssu:21752: dūtā nānādvārebhya āgatā api ekameva sthānamupasarpanti |
XXhvsatssu:21754: yathā rāhula ekānte niṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ cintayan evaṃ prajānāti- īdṛśo dharma parikīrtitaṃ nirvāṇaṃ prati anuprayātīti |
XXhvsatssu:21755: kiñca bhagavān dharmasyāniśaṃsāyāmāha- dharmo 'yaṃ sarvān kleśāgnīna nirodhayatīti nirodha ityucyate |
XXhvsatssu:21764: ato jñāyate pañcaskandhādayo dvārāṇi nirvāṇaparāyaṇāni bhavanti |
XXhvsatssu:21787: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- saptasaptatijñānāni yaduta jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇamiti
XXhvsatssu:21793: [tadapi] anityaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ kṛtakaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ kṣayadharma, vipariṇāmadharma,
XXhvsatssu:21796: tatra kasmānnoktaṃ- jarāmaraṇasya svabhāvo nirodho mārga ityādi |
XXhvsatssu:21799: tīrthikā bahavo nidāne bhrāntā vadanti- laukikānāṃ padārthānāṃ heturlokātmaka ityādi |
XXhvsatssu:21815: pratyutpannamatītādhvanaḥ kadācidbhinnadharma bhavati yadutātītānāṃ sattvānāmāyurapramāṇaṃ prabhāvaśca devatulya ityevamādi |
XXhvsatssu:21816: āyurādi bhinnaṃ jarāmaraṇapratyayo 'pi bhinno bhavediti janā vadeyuriti bhītyā niyama
XXhvsatssu:21826: kasmāt tatra rūpasya svarūpaṃ nirodhaḥ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya ca svarūpaṃ nirodhaḥ |
